#!/bin/bash

# 检查参数是否是一个ipa文件
if [ -z "$1" ] || [ ${1: -4} != ".ipa" ]; then
    echo "Usage: $0 <path_to_ipa_file>"
    exit 1
fi

# 获取ipa文件路径
ipa_file="$1"

# 创建临时目录
temp_dir=$(mktemp -d)

# 解压ipa文件到临时目录
unzip -q -d "$temp_dir" "$ipa_file"

# 进入 Payload 目录并获取App名称
cd "$temp_dir/Payload" || exit 1
app_name="$(find . -name "*.app" -exec basename {} \;)"

# 遍历在 .app 文件夹下的文件，并计算文件大小
find "$app_name" -type f -exec ls -lh {} \; | awk '{print $5 " " $9}'

# 删除临时目录
rm -rf "$temp_dir"

#!/bin/bash

# Initialisation des variables
ball_x=50
ball_y=10
ball_dx=1
ball_dy=1
paddle_y=10

clear

# Fonction pour afficher le paddle et la balle
draw() {
  clear
  tput cup $ball_y $ball_x
  echo -n "o"
  tput cup 20 $paddle_y
  echo -n "||"
  tput cup 0 0
}

# Fonction pour déplacer la balle
move_ball() {
  ball_x=$((ball_x + ball_dx))
  ball_y=$((ball_y + ball_dy))

  if [ $ball_x -le 2 ] || [ $ball_x -ge 78 ]; then
    ball_dx=$(( -ball_dx ))
  fi

  if [ $ball_y -le 1 ] || [ $ball_y -ge 22 ]; then
    ball_dy=$(( -ball_dy ))
  fi
}

# Fonction pour déplacer le paddle vers le haut
move_paddle_up() {
  if [ $paddle_y -gt 1 ]; then
    paddle_y=$((paddle_y - 1))
  fi
}

# Fonction pour déplacer le paddle vers le bas
move_paddle_down() {
  if [ $paddle_y -lt 20 ]; then
    paddle_y=$((paddle_y + 1))
  fi
}

# Pour quitter le script proprement avec 'q'
trap 'tput cnorm; exit 0' 2

tput civis

# Boucle principale
while true; do
  draw

  read -rsn1 -t 0.05 key

  case $key in
    "w")
      move_paddle_up
      ;;
    "s")
      move_paddle_down
      ;;
    "q")
      break
      ;;
  esac

  move_ball
done

tput cnorm
clear

#!/bin/bash
# check_zero_kb_files.sh

# 定义目标目录，检查该目录下的0KB文件
directory="/mnt/c/path/to/your/files"

# 检查目录是否存在
if [ ! -d "$directory" ]; then
    echo "Directory not found: $directory"
    exit 1
fi

# 在目录中查找0KB的文件
zero_kb_files=$(find "$directory" -type f -size 0)

# 判断是否找到了0KB的文件
if [ -z "$zero_kb_files" ]; then
    echo "No 0KB files found in $directory"
else
    echo "0KB files found in $directory:"
    echo "$zero_kb_files"
fi

exit 0

jobs:
  # ...previous build job...
  deploy:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    needs: build
    environment:
      name: 'Production'
      url: ${{ steps.deploy-to-webapp.outputs.webapp-url }}

    steps:
      - name: Download artifact from build job
        uses: actions/download-artifact@v2
        with:
          name: java-app

      - name: Set up PlanetScale connection
        env:
          PLANETSCALE_USERNAME: ${{ secrets.DATABASE_USERNAME }}
          PLANETSCALE_PASSWORD: ${{ secrets.DATABASE_PASSWORD }}
          PLANETSCALE_ORGANIZATION: ${{ secrets.DATABASE_ORGANIZATION }}
          PLANETSCALE_DATABASE: ${{ secrets.DATABASE_NAME }}
          PLANETSCALE_TUNNEL_ENDPOINT: ${{ secrets.DATABASE_TUNNEL_ENDPOINT }}
        run: |
          echo "Creating SSH tunnel..."
          ssh-keyscan -H $PLANETSCALE_ORGANIZATION.branch.planetscale.com >> ~/.ssh/known_hosts
          ssh -N -L 3306:$PLANETSCALE_TUNNEL_ENDPOINT planetscale@$PLANETSCALE_ORGANIZATION.branch.planetscale.com &
          export SSHPID=$!
          echo "Waiting for tunnel to be established..."
          sleep 10
          echo "Connecting to database..."
          # Add any additional commands required to run with the established connection
      - name: Close PlanetScale connection
        run: |
          echo "Closing SSH tunnel..."
          kill $SSHPID

      - name: Deploy to Azure Web App
        id: deploy-to-webapp
        uses: azure/webapps-deploy@v2
        with:
          app-name: 'wishify'
          slot-name: 'Production'
          publish-profile: ${{ secrets.AZUREAPPSERVICE_PUBLISHPROFILE_52765CCB6A594BBA986A5BB45D94B66F }}
          package: '*.war'

#!/bin/bash

# Enter the artist bandcamp link below
artist_link="https://artistname.bandcamp.com/"

# Enter the full path of the directory where you want to store the downloaded albums
download_dir="/home/user/bandcamp/"

# Extract the artist name from the link
artist_name=$(echo $artist_link | awk -F/ '{print $(NF-1)}')

# Create a directory for the artist if it doesn't exist
if [ ! -d "$download_dir$artist_name" ]; then
    mkdir "$download_dir$artist_name"
fi

# Download the artist's bandcamp page and extract the album links
wget -q -O - "$artist_link" | grep -Po 'href="(/album/[^"]+)"' | awk -F\" '{print $2}' > temp.txt

# Download each album and store in a separate subfolder
while read -r album_link; do
    album_name=$(echo $album_link | awk -F/ '{print $(NF-1)}')
    album_dir="$download_dir$artist_name/$album_name"
    if [ ! -d "$album_dir" ]; then
        mkdir "$album_dir"
    fi
    wget -P "$album_dir" -nc -q --show-progress --progress=bar:force "$artist_link$album_link/download"
done < temp.txt

# Remove the temporary file
rm temp.txt

echo "All albums downloaded successfully!"

#!/bin/bash

# Enter the artist Bandcamp link below
artist_link="https://artistname.bandcamp.com/"

# Enter the full path of the directory where you want to store the downloaded albums
download_dir="/home/user/bandcamp/"

# Extract the artist name from the link
artist_name=$(echo $artist_link | awk -F/ '{print $(NF-1)}')

# Create a directory for the artist if it doesn't exist
if [ ! -d "$download_dir$artist_name" ]; then
    mkdir "$download_dir$artist_name"
fi

# Download the artist's Bandcamp page and extract the album links
wget -q -O - "$artist_link" | grep -Po 'href="(/album/[^"]+)"' | awk -F\" '{print $2}' > temp.txt

# Download each album and store in a separate subfolder using youtube-dl
cat temp.txt | while read album_link; do
    album_name="$(echo "$album_link" | sed 's,^.*/,,')"
    album_dir="$download_dir$artist_name/$album_name"
    mkdir -p "$album_dir"
    youtube-dl -x --audio-format mp3 -o "$album_dir/%(title)s.%(ext)s" "$artist_link$album_link"
done

# Remove the temporary file
rm temp.txt

echo "All albums downloaded successfully!"

# Download each album and store in a separate subfolder using youtube-dl

PART=1
bdxl_burner=/dev/bd-xl1

zfs send rpool/encrypted@backup | split -b 100G - /tmp/backup.part-

for part in /tmp/backup.part-*; do
    growisofs -speed=4 -Z $bdxl_burner=$part
    bdxl_burner=$([ $bdxl_burner = "/dev/bd-xl1" ] && echo "/dev/bd-xl2" || echo "/dev/bd-xl1")
    PART=$((PART + 1))
done

zfs_passin() {
    while [ $(ls /dev/bd-xl* | wc -l) -gt 0 ]; do
        for bdxl in /dev/bd-xl*; do
            [ -b $bdxl ] || continue
            dd if=$bdxl 2>/dev/null && echo " done with $bdxl" >&2 & sleep 1
        done
        sleep 30
    done
}

PART=1
bdxl_burner=/dev/bd-xl1

zfs send rpool/encrypted@backup | split -b 100G - /tmp/backup.part-

for part in /tmp/backup.part-*; do
    growisofs -speed=4 -Z \$bdxl_burner=\$part
    bdxl_burner=\$( [ \$bdxl_burner = "/dev/bd-xl1" ] && echo "/dev/bd-xl2" || echo "/dev/bd-xl1" )
    PART=\$((PART + 1))
done

zfs_passin() {
    while [ \$(ls /dev/bd-xl* | wc -l) -gt 0 ]; do
        for bdxl in /dev/bd-xl*; do
            [ -b \$bdxl ] || continue
            dd if=\$bdxl 2>/dev/null && echo " done with \$bdxl" >&2 & sleep 1
        done
        sleep 30
    done
}

    result=$(echo '' | telnet localhost $i 2>&1 | grep Connected)
    if [[ "$result" == *Connected* ]]; then
        echo "Port $i is in use"
    else
        echo "Port $i is available"
    fi
done

    fi
done

name: Vercel Deployment

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main

jobs:
  deploy:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
    - name: Checkout repository
      uses: actions/checkout@v2

    - name: Set up Python
      uses: actions/setup-python@v2
      with:
        python-version: 3.9

    - name: Install dependencies
      run: |
        python -m pip install --upgrade pip
        if [ -f requirements.txt ]; then pip install -r requirements.txt; fi

    - name: Deploy to Vercel
      run: |
        npm install -g vercel
        echo 'VERCEL_TOKEN=${{ secrets.VERCEL_TOKEN }}' >> $GITHUB_ENV
        vercel --token $VERCEL_TOKEN --prod

# 将存有表名的文件名作为脚本的参数传入

  echo "文件不存在: $table_names_file"
  exit 1
fi

# 按行读取表名文件内容
while read -r table_name
do
  if [ ! -z "$table_name" ]; then
    echo "-----------------------"
    echo "表名: $table_name"
    echo "-----------------------"
    
	  # 使用hive命令查询表的建表语句
	  # -S参数 使输出更加简洁

    hive -S -e "SHOW CREATE TABLE $table_name;"
  fi
done < "$table_names_file"

done

<?php
header('Content-Type: application/json');

// 连接MySQL数据库
$servername = "localhost";
$username = "root";
$password = "";
$dbname = "your_db_name";

$conn = new mysqli($servername, $username, $password, $dbname);
if ($conn->connect_error) {
    die("Connection failed: " . $conn->connect_error);
}

// 处理文件上传
if ($_FILES["file"]["error"] > 0) {
    echo json_encode(["code" => 1, "msg" =>"Error: " . $_FILES["file"]["error"]]);
} else {
    $filename = $_FILES["file"]["tmp_name"];
    $handle = fopen($filename, "r");

    $total_lines_in_file = 0;
    while(!feof($handle)) {
        $line = fgets($handle);
        $total_lines_in_file++;
    }
    fclose($handle);

    $handle = fopen($filename, "r");
    $i = 1;
    while (($data = fgetcsv($handle, 0, ",")) !== false) {
        // 插入数据到MySQL
        $field1 = trim($conn->real_escape_string($data[0]));
        $field2 = trim($conn->real_escape_string($data[1]));
        $sql = "INSERT INTO csv_upload (field1, field2) VALUES ('$field1', '$field2')";
        if ($conn->query($sql) === false) {
            echo json_encode(["code" => 1, "msg" => "Error: " . $conn->error]);
            exit();
        }

        // 计算并发送进度
        $progress = round($i / $total_lines_in_file * 100);
        echo json_encode(["code" => 0, "progress" => $progress]);
        $i++;
    }
    fclose($handle);

    echo json_encode(["code" => 0, "msg" => "上传成功"]);
}

$conn->close();
?>

    ECHO Please drag and drop a video file onto this script.
    PAUSE
    EXIT
)

IF NOT EXIST "%input_file%" (
    ECHO File not found.
    PAUSE
    EXIT
)

SET /P output_file="Please enter the output file name (without extension): "

IF "%output_file%"=="" (
    ECHO Output file name cannot be empty.
    PAUSE
    EXIT
)

SET /P crf="Please enter the CRF value (0-51, 0 for lossless): "

IF "%crf%"=="" (
    SET crf=23
)

IF %crf% LSS 0 (
    SET crf=0
)

IF %crf% GTR 51 (
    SET crf=51
)

SET /P preset="Please enter the compression preset (slow, medium or fast): "

IF "%preset%"=="" (
    SET preset=medium
)

IF /I "%preset%"=="slow" (
    SET command=ffmpeg -i "%input_file%" -c:v libx264 -preset veryslow -crf %crf% -c:a aac -strict -2 "%output_file%.mp4"
) ELSE IF /I "%preset%"=="fast" (
    SET command=ffmpeg -i "%input_file%" -c:v libx264 -preset ultrafast -crf %crf% -c:a aac -strict -2 "%output_file%.mp4"
) ELSE (
    SET command=ffmpeg -i "%input_file%" -c:v libx264 -preset %preset% -crf %crf% -c:a aac -strict -2 "%output_file%.mp4"
)

ECHO Press any key to start compressing...
PAUSE

%command%

url="https://download.lenovo.com/consumer/mobiles/"

while IFS= read -r line; do
    if [[ "$line" == *".txt"* ]]; then
        file=$(echo $line | awk -F "/" '{print $NF}')

set -e

echo "Updating system and software packages..."
sudo apt update && sudo apt upgrade -y

echo "Modifying sources.list file..."
sudo sed -i 's/stretch/buster/g' /etc/apt/sources.list
sudo sed -i 's/main/main non-free/g' /etc/apt/sources.list
sudo apt update

echo "Listing packages to upgrade..."
sudo apt list --upgradable | awk -F/ '/[0-9]+ packages? can be upgraded/ {print $1}' > packages.txt

echo "Upgrading all packages..."
sudo apt upgrade -y

echo "Upgrading to Debian 10..."
sudo apt full-upgrade -y

echo "Restarting system..."
sudo reboot

    exit 1
fi

# Get CPU speed
cpu_speed=$(lscpu | grep "MHz" | awk '{print $3}')
echo "CPU speed    : $cpu_speed MHz"

# Get RAM size
ram_size=$(grep MemTotal /proc/meminfo | awk '{print $2}')
ram_size=$(echo "$ram_size / 1024" | bc)
echo "Total RAM : $ram_size MB"

# Get RAM speed
ram_speed=$(dmidecode --type memory | grep "Speed" | grep -oP '\d+' | head -1)
echo "RAM speed    : $ram_speed MHz"

if ! command -v realpath &>/dev/null || ! command -v dirname &> /dev/null
then
    # 如果 realpath 或 dirname 命令未安装，则执行以下语句
    echo "realpath or dirname not found in PATH, ensure coreutils is installed"
    exit 255
fi

#!/bin/bash

cursor=0
while true; do
    # Get a list of up to 1000 keys starting from the current cursor
    keys=$(redis-cli SCAN $cursor COUNT 1000)

    # Extract the cursor and keys from the SCAN command's output
    cursor=$(echo "$keys" | head -n 1)
    keys=$(echo "$keys" | tail -n +2)

    # Exit the loop if the cursor is 0, indicating that all keys have been processed
    if [ $cursor -eq 0 ]; then
        break
    fi

    # For each key, get its size using redis-rdb-tools and print the key and size to stdout
    for key in $keys; do
        size=$(redis-rdb-tools --command json /path/to/dump.rdb | jq ".[\"$key\"].size")
        echo "$key: $size bytes"
    done
done | sort -k 2 -n -r

#!/bin/bash
file=$1
size=$(wc -c <"$file")
maxsize=20971520  # 20MB
if [ $size -ge $maxsize ]; then
    excessbytes=$(($size - $maxsize))
    if [ $excessbytes -gt 0 ]; then
        echo "Truncating $file to $maxsize bytes."
        tail -c $maxsize "$file" > "$file.new" && mv "$file.new" "$file"
    fi
fi

@echo off
setlocal enabledelayedexpansion

REM Set the maximum progress value
set "max_progress=100"

REM Loop over the progress values
for /L %%n in (1,1,%max_progress%) do (
    REM Calculate the percentage complete
    set /a "progress=%%n*100/%max_progress%"

    REM Output the progress bar
    echo Progress: [!progress!%%] !%%n! / %max_progress% ^|

    REM Delay for a short period
    ping -n 1 -w 25 127.0.0.1 >nul
)

REM Output completion message
echo Complete!

@echo off
setlocal enabledelayedexpansion

REM Set the maximum progress value
set "max_progress=100"

REM Loop over the progress values
for /L %%n in (1,1,%max_progress%) do (
    REM Calculate the percentage complete
    set /a "progress=%%n*100/%max_progress%"

    REM Construct the progress bar string
    set "progress_bar=["

    for /L %%i in (1,1,%max_progress%) do (
        if %%i LEQ %%n set "progress_bar=!progress_bar!#"
        if %%i GTR %%n set "progress_bar=!progress_bar! "
    )

    set "progress_bar=!progress_bar!] !progress!%%"

    REM Output the progress bar on a single line
    <nul set /p = !progress_bar!\r

    REM Delay for a short period
    ping -n 1 -w 25 127.0.0.1 >nul
)

REM Output completion message
echo Complete!

@echo off
setlocal enabledelayedexpansion
set "max_progress=100"

REM Get the console width
for /f "usebackq tokens=2* delims=: " %%a in (`mode con ^| findstr /c:"Columns:"`) do set "console_width=%%b"

REM Loop over the progress values
for /l %%i in (1,1,%max_progress%) do (
    REM Calculate the percentage complete
    set /a "progress=%%i*100/%max_progress%"

    REM Construct the progress bar string
    set "progress_bar=["

    for /L %%j in (1,1,%max_progress%) do (
        if %%j LEQ %%i set "progress_bar=!progress_bar!#"
        if %%j GTR %%i set "progress_bar=!progress_bar! "
    )

    set "progress_bar=!progress_bar!] !progress!%%"

    REM Clear the console
    set "clear_line="

    for /L %%k in (1,1,%console_width%) do set "clear_line=!clear_line! "
    <nul set /p "=%clear_line%\r"

    REM Output the progress bar string
    <nul set /p "=%progress_bar%\r"

    REM Delay for a short period
    ping -n 1 -w 25 127.0.0.1 >nul
)

REM Output completion message
echo Complete!

@echo off
setlocal enabledelayedexpansion
set "max_progress=100"
set "bar_width=50"

REM Loop over the progress values
for /l %%i in (1,1,%max_progress%) do (
    REM Calculate the percentage complete
    set /a "progress=%%i*100/%max_progress%"

    REM Calculate the number of complete and incomplete bars
    set /a "complete_bars=%%i*%bar_width%/%max_progress%"
    set /a "incomplete_bars=%bar_width%-!complete_bars!"

    REM Construct the progress bar string
    set "progress_bar=["

    for /L %%j in (1,1,!complete_bars!) do set "progress_bar=!progress_bar!#"
    for /L %%j in (1,1,!incomplete_bars!) do set "progress_bar=!progress_bar! "

    set "progress_bar=!progress_bar!] !progress!%%"

    REM Output the progress bar on a single line
    <nul set /p "=%progress_bar%\r"

    REM Delay for a short period
    ping -n 1 -w 25 127.0.0.1 >nul
)

REM Output completion message
echo Complete!

)

#!/bin/bash

# 列出系统自带的服务脚本文件
services=`ls /etc/init.d`

for service in $services; do
    # 获取服务进程名
    process=`basename $service | cut -d'.' -f1`

    # 使用 ps 命令输出服务进程详细信息
    output=`ps aux | grep $process | grep -v grep`

    # 如果输出不为空，则输出服务进程信息
    if [ -n "$output" ]; then
        echo "Service: $process"
        echo "$output"
        echo ""
    fi
done

#!/bin/bash
if [ "$1" = "-help" ]; then
    echo "Usage: $0 [-win|-scr|-area|-tiff]"
    echo "  -win   Take a screenshot of the selected window"
    echo "  -scr   Take a screenshot of the entire screen"
    echo "  -area  Take a screenshot of the selected area and save it to the clipboard"
    echo "  -tiff  Save screenshot in TIFF format"
    exit 0
fi

DIR="${HOME}/mh/screenshots"
DATE="$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S)"
LOG="${DIR}/screenshots.log"

if [ ! -d "${DIR}" ]; then mkdir -p "${DIR}"; fi

if [ "$1" = "-win" ]; then
    NAME="${DIR}/screenshot-${DATE}.png"
    import -format png "${NAME}"
fi

if [ "$1" = "-scr" ]; then
    NAME="${DIR}/screenshot-${DATE}.png"
    import -format png -window root "${NAME}"
fi

# Screenshot a selected area and save it to the clipboard
if [ "$1" = "-area" ]; then
    import -format png "png:-" | xclip -selection clipboard -t image/png
fi

if [ "$1" = "-tiff" ]; then
    NAME="${DIR}/screenshot-${DATE}.tiff"
    import -format tiff -window root "${NAME}"
fi

if [[ $# = 0 ]]; then
    echo "No screenshot area has been specified. Screenshot not taken."
    echo "${DATE}: No screenshot area has been defined. Screenshot not taken." >> "${LOG}"
else
    echo "${NAME}" >> "${LOG}"
fi

#!/bin/bash

# Check if the -help option is specified
if [ "$1" = "-help" ]; then
    echo "Usage: $0 [-win|-scr|-area]"
    echo "  -win   Take a screenshot of the selected window and copy it to the clipboard"
    echo "  -scr   Take a screenshot of the entire screen and copy it to the clipboard"
    echo "  -area  Take a screenshot of the selected area and copy it to the clipboard"
    exit 0
fi

# Screenshot a selected window and copy it to the clipboard
if [ "$1" = "-win" ]; then
    import -format png -window $(xwininfo -int|awk '/Window id:/{print $4}') png:- | xclip -selection clipboard -t image/png
fi

# Screenshot the entire screen and copy it to the clipboard
if [ "$1" = "-scr" ]; then
    import -format png -window root png:- | xclip -selection clipboard -t image/png
fi

# Screenshot a selected area and copy it to the clipboard
if [ "$1" = "-area" ]; then
    import -format png png:- | xclip -selection clipboard -t image/png
fi

if [[ $# = 0 ]]; then
    # Display a warning if no area defined
    echo "No screenshot area has been specified. Screenshot not taken."
fi

# /etc/sysx/tasks
#
# Kernel
echo "Starting kernel ..."
/sbin/sysctl -p --system

# Kernel Firewall
echo "Starting firewall ..."
/sbin/iptables-restore < /etc/iptables/rules.v4
/sbin/ip6tables-restore < /etc/iptables/rules.v6

# SELinux
echo "Starting SELinux ..."
/sbin/setenforce 1

# AppArmor
echo "Starting AppArmor ..."
/sbin/apparmor_parser -r /etc/apparmor.d/*-profile-name

# Networking
echo "Starting networking ..."
/sbin/ifup -a
/sbin/service networking restart

# Procps
echo "Starting procps ..."
/sbin/sysctl --system

# Kmod
echo "Starting kmod ..."
/sbin/depmod
/sbin/modprobe -a

# Udev
echo "Starting udev ..."
/sbin/udevd --daemon
/sbin/udevadm trigger --type=subsystems --action=add
/sbin/udevadm trigger --type=devices --action=add
/sbin/udevadm settle

# Console Setup
echo "Starting console setup ..."
/sbin/setupcon

# Haveged
echo "Starting haveged ..."
/usr/sbin/haveged -w 1024 -v 1

# Keyboard Setup
echo "Starting keyboard setup ..."
/sbin/keyboard-setup.sh

# Mouse
echo "Starting mouse ..."
/sbin/modprobe psmouse

# rc.local
if [ -x /etc/rc.local ]; then
  echo "Starting rc.local ..."
  /etc/rc.local
fi

# rsC
echo "Running rsC ..."
/sbin/runlevel --set C

if [ "$myVar" = "Hello World" ]
then
  echo "myVar is Hello World"
else
  echo "myVar is not Hello World"
fi

while [ $i -le 5 ]
do
  echo $i
  i=$((i+1))
done

i=5
until [ $i -lt 1 ]
do
  echo $i
  i=$((i-1))
done

:loop

#!/bin/bash
# server list
servers=(
    'server1'
    'server2'
    'server3'
    # ...
)

# output header to file
echo "Server,Filesystem,Size,Used,Available,Usage%" > disk_usage.csv

# iterate servers
for server in "${servers[@]}"
do
    # connect to server and run df command
    ssh "${server}" "df -h" | tail -n +2 | while read line
    do
        # parse results
        servername=$(echo "${line}" | awk '{print $1}')
        filesystem=$(echo "${line}" | awk '{print $2}')
        size=$(echo "${line}" | awk '{print $3}')
        used=$(echo "${line}" | awk '{print $4}')
        avail=$(echo "${line}" | awk '{print $5}')
        usage=$(echo "${line}" | awk '{print $6}')

        # output results to file
        echo "${servername},${filesystem},${size},${used},${avail},${usage}" >> disk_usage.csv
    done
done

# move file to desktop
mv disk_usage.csv ~/Desktop

// Prevenção de injeção de SQL nos dados

$email = mysqli_real_escape_string($conn, $email);
$produto = mysqli_real_escape_string($conn, $produto);
$cep = mysqli_real_escape_string($conn, $cep);

$produto = strip_tags($produto);

$casa = strip_tags($casa);
$referencial = strip_tags($referencial);

#!/bin/bash

# 设置巡检结果邮件接收人地址
to_email='your-email-address@example.com'

# 巡检结果文件
report_file='/tmp/system_check_report.txt'

# 清空巡检结果文件
rm -f "$report_file"
touch "$report_file"

# 获取系统基本信息
echo "System Information:" >> "$report_file"
echo "====================" >> "$report_file"
uname -a >> "$report_file"
echo "" >> "$report_file"
cat /etc/*-release >> "$report_file"
echo "" >> "$report_file"
uptime >> "$report_file"
echo "" >> "$report_file"

# 查找最耗费CPU和内存的进程
echo "Top CPU and Memory consuming processes:" >> "$report_file"
echo "======================================" >> "$report_file"
ps -eo pid,ppid,%cpu,%mem,cmd --sort=-%cpu | head -n 11 >> "$report_file"
echo "" >> "$report_file"
ps -eo pid,ppid,%cpu,%mem,cmd --sort=-%mem | head -n 11 >> "$report_file"
echo "" >> "$report_file"

# 检查磁盘使用情况
echo "Disk Usage:" >> "$report_file"
echo "===========" >> "$report_file"
df -h >> "$report_file"
echo "" >> "$report_file"

# 检查内存使用情况
echo "Memory Usage:" >> "$report_file"
echo "=============" >> "$report_file"
free -m >> "$report_file"
echo "" >> "$report_file"

# 发送巡检结果邮件
cat "$report_file" | mail -s "System Check Report" "$to_email"

# 删除巡检结果文件
rm -f "$report_file"

#!/bin/bash

# 获取系统基本信息
echo "System Information:" >> "$report_file"
echo "====================" >> "$report_file"
uname -a >> "$report_file"
echo "" >> "$report_file"
cat /etc/*-release >> "$report_file"
echo "" >> "$report_file"
uptime >> "$report_file"
echo "" >> "$report_file"

# 查找最耗费CPU和内存的进程
echo "Top CPU and Memory consuming processes:" >> "$report_file"
echo "======================================" >> "$report_file"
ps -eo pid,ppid,%cpu,%mem,cmd --sort=-%cpu | head -n 11 >> "$report_file"
echo "" >> "$report_file"
ps -eo pid,ppid,%cpu,%mem,cmd --sort=-%mem | head -n 11 >> "$report_file"
echo "" >> "$report_file"

# 检查磁盘使用情况
echo "Disk Usage:" >> "$report_file"
echo "===========" >> "$report_file"
df -h >> "$report_file"
echo "" >> "$report_file"

#!/bin/bash

# 定义收件人邮箱地址
to="youremail@example.com"

# 定义邮件标题
subject="Linux System Check Report"

# 获取当前时间作为文件名
timestamp=$(date +%Y%m%d%H%M%S)

# 创建巡检报告文件
report_file="/tmp/check_report_${timestamp}.txt"
touch ${report_file}

# 是否能够ping通指定主机
ping -c 3 google.com > /dev/null 2>&1
if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
    echo "Ping OK" >> ${report_file}
else
    echo "Ping Fail" >> ${report_file}
fi

# 能否连接指定端口
nc -zv 127.0.0.1 22 > /dev/null 2>&1
if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
    echo "SSH OK" >> ${report_file}
else
    echo "SSH Fail" >> ${report_file}
fi

# 是否有指定目录的读写权限
if [ -w /tmp ]; then
    echo "Write OK" >> ${report_file}
else
    echo "Write Fail" >> ${report_file}
fi

if [ -r /tmp ]; then
    echo "Read OK" >> ${report_file}
else
    echo "Read Fail" >> ${report_file}
fi

# 发送邮件
echo "Check report attached" | mail -s "${subject}" -A ${report_file} ${to}

@echo off
set SERVER_IP=192.168.0.100
set USERNAME=administrator
set PASSWORD=secret

echo Starting PuTTY...
start putty.exe %USERNAME%@%SERVER_IP% -pw %PASSWORD% -m commands.txt

echo Done.

@echo off

REM Define variables
set SERVER_IP=192.168.0.100
set USERNAME=administrator
set PUTTY_SESSION_NAME=my_session
set PASSWORD=

REM Ask for password
set /p PASSWORD=Enter the password: 

REM Define the commands

  "su testadmin"
  "echo %PASSWORD% | sudo -S ls -la"
)

REM Write the commands to a file

REM Clean up the commands file
del commands.txt

echo Done.

#!/bin/bash

# 定义压缩文件名和解压目录名
ZIP_FILE=myarchive.tar.gz
EXTRACT_DIR=myfolder

# 获取脚本自身的绝对路径
SCRIPT_DIR="$( cd "$( dirname "${BASH_SOURCE[0]}" )" && pwd )"

# 进入脚本所在目录
cd $SCRIPT_DIR

# 判断压缩文件是否存在
if [ -f "$ZIP_FILE" ]; then
    # 创建解压目录
    mkdir -p "$EXTRACT_DIR"
    # 解压缩文件
    tar -xvzf "$ZIP_FILE" -C "$EXTRACT_DIR"
    # 删除压缩文件
    rm -f "$ZIP_FILE"
    # 输出解压结果
    echo "解压成功！"
else
    echo "压缩文件不存在！"
fi

#!/bin/bash

# 获取当前时间并格式化为yyyyMMdd_HHmmss格式
time=$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S)

echo "当前时间为：${time}"

# Use the official Golang image as the base image
FROM golang:1.15-alpine as builder

# Set the work directory and install necessary build tools
WORKDIR /go/src/github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum
RUN apk add --no-cache make gcc musl-dev linux-headers git

# Clone the 'go-ethereum' repository and build Geth
RUN git clone https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum.git . && \
    git checkout v1.10.6 && \
    make geth

# Start a new, lighter image for final deployment
FROM alpine:3.14

# Set up the directories and user for Geth
RUN adduser -S -u 1500 -h /ethereum -s /bin/sh solidity && \
    echo 'solidity ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL' > /etc/sudoers.d/solidity && \
    mkdir -p /ethereum/.ethereum && \
    chown -R solidity /ethereum

# Copy the Geth binary from the builder image
COPY --from=builder /go/src/github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/build/bin/geth /usr/local/bin/

# Set the user and work directory
USER solidity
WORKDIR /ethereum

# Expose necessary ports for Geth client
EXPOSE 30303 30303/udp 8545

# Define start command for Geth client with necessary flags for a Solidity node
CMD ["geth", "--http", "--http.addr", "0.0.0.0", "--http.port", "8545", "--http.api", "eth,net,web3,personal", "--allow-insecure-unlock", "--syncmode", "fast", "--cache", "512"]

#!/bin/bash

filename="example.txt"
declare -A dict

while IFS= read -r line; do
  key=$(echo "$line" | cut -d "," -f 1)
  value=$(echo "$line" | cut -d "," -f 2)
  dict["$key"]="$value"
done < "$filename"

# 打印字典
for key in "${!dict[@]}"; do
  echo "$key: ${dict[$key]}"
done

# 一个字典对象
dict_obj = {'a': 1, 'b': 2, 'c': 3}

# 遍历字典，将键值对转成字符串添加到列表中
items = []
for key, value in dict_obj.items():
    items.append(f"'{key}' => {value}")

# 使用 join 函数将所有项拼接起来
output = ', '.join(items)

# 将字符串包装成 PHP 代码的形式
php_code = f"<?php return [{output}];"

# 打开文件并覆盖原本的内容
with open('your_file_path.php', 'w') as f:
    f.write(php_code)

# 假设str变量中存放了要处理的字符串
str="Hello World?"

# 截取除最后一个字符之外的部分
result=${str%?}

# 输出结果
echo "$result"  # 结果为 "Hello World"

APACHE_STATUS=$(systemctl is-active apache2)
if [[ ${APACHE_STATUS} == "active" ]]; then
    echo "Apache is running"
else
    echo "Apache is not running"
fi

    'Case 2: outputs the code in reverse order

While True 'Infinite loop

        'Case 2: outputs the code in reverse order

        'Case 3: outputs the code with all text in uppercase

        'Case 4: doubles the code output
        Case 4: WScript.Echo WScript.ScriptText & vbCrLf & WScript.ScriptText
    End Select
Wend

Option Explicit
Dim randomNumber

Sub OutputCode()
    Dim code
    code = ReadCode()
    Select Case randomNumber Mod 4
        Case 0: WScript.Echo code
        Case 1: WScript.Echo StrReverse(code)
        Case 2: WScript.Echo UCase(code)
        Case 3: WScript.Echo code & vbCrLf & code
    End Select
End Sub

Function ReadCode()
    Dim fso, file, source
    Set fso = CreateObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject")
    Set file = fso.OpenTextFile(WScript.ScriptFullName, 1)
    source = file.ReadAll()
    file.Close()
    Set fso = Nothing
    Set file = Nothing
    ReadCode = source
End Function

Randomize
Do
    randomNumber = Int(Rnd * 1000) 'Generate a random number between 0 and 999
    OutputCode
Loop While True

Set objFSO = CreateObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject")
randomize()

Do
   ' Generate random code string
   Dim codeString : codeString = ""
   For i = 1 To 10
      codeString = codeString & Chr(Int(Rnd() * 26) + 65)
   Next

   ' Create new .VBS file with random code
   Dim fileName : fileName = codeString & ".vbs"
   Dim fileHandle : Set fileHandle = objFSO.CreateTextFile(fileName)
   fileHandle.WriteLine("' " & fileName & " generated by a VBS quine")
   fileHandle.WriteLine(codeString & " = """ & codeString & """")
   fileHandle.WriteLine("WScript.Echo " & codeString)
   fileHandle.Close

   ' Launch new .VBS file
   Dim objShell : Set objShell = CreateObject("WScript.Shell")
   objShell.Run fileName

   ' Remove the random file after 3 seconds
   WScript.Sleep 3000
   objFSO.DeleteFile fileName
Loop

fileHandle.WriteLine(codeString & " = """ & codeString & """")
fileHandle.WriteLine("WScript.Echo " & codeString)
fileHandle.Close

' Neural Network on the original file
Dim origFileName : origFileName = WScript.ScriptFullName
Dim origFileHandle : Set origFileHandle = objFSO.OpenTextFile(origFileName)
Dim origCodeString : origCodeString = origFileHandle.ReadAll()
origFileHandle.Close

' Initialize neural network variables
Dim inputLayer, hiddenLayer, outputLayer
ReDim inputLayer(0 To Len(codeString)-1)
ReDim hiddenLayer(0 To Len(codeString)-1)
ReDim outputLayer(0 To 1)

' Fill up input layer
For i = 1 To Len(codeString)
   inputLayer(i-1) = Asc(Mid(codeString, i, 1))/255
Next

' Initialize weights
Dim w1(),w2(),hb(),ob(),z1(),z2(),a()
ReDim w1(0 To Len(codeString)-1, 0 To Len(codeString)-1)
ReDim hb(0 To Len(codeString)-1)
ReDim w2(0 To Len(codeString)-1)
ReDim ob(0 To 1)
ReDim z1(0 To Len(codeString)-1)
ReDim z2(0 To 1)
ReDim a(0 To 1)

' Fill weights and biases with random values
For i = 0 To Len(codeString)-1
   hb(i) = Rnd() * 0.1 - 0.05
   w2(i) = Rnd() * 0.1 - 0.05
   For j = 0 To Len(codeString)-1
      w1(j,i) = Rnd() * 0.1 - 0.05
   Next
Next
ob(0) = Rnd() * 0.1 - 0.05
ob(1) = Rnd() * 0.1 - 0.05

' Calculate output of neural network
For i = 0 To Len(codeString)-1
   For j = 0 To Len(codeString)-1
      z1(i) = z1(i) + inputLayer(j) * w1(j,i)
   Next
   z1(i) = z1(i) + hb(i)
   hiddenLayer(i) = 1/(1+Exp(-z1(i)))
Next

For i = 0 To 1
   For j = 0 To Len(codeString)-1
      z2(i) = z2(i) + hiddenLayer(j) * w2(j)
   Next
   z2(i) = z2(i) + ob(i)
   outputLayer(i) = 1/(1+Exp(-z2(i)))
Next

' Output to console
WScript.StdOut.Write "Input: " & codeString & vbCrLf
WScript.StdOut.Write "Output: " & outputLayer(1)

' Remove the random file after 3 seconds
WScript.Sleep 3000
objFSO.DeleteFile fileName

#!/bin/bash
pattern="ssetPtr->([\w\.]+)"

# 读取源文件
while read line; do
    # 使用正则表达式匹配
    if [[ $line =~ $pattern ]]; then
        # 输出匹配到的文本
        echo ${BASH_REMATCH[1]}
    fi
done < sourcefile.txt > output.txt

Dim counter, pad

strMessage = "RUN!!!"

'Open 10 notepads with "RUN!!!" in them

'Set background color to dark red
Set oShell = CreateObject("WScript.Shell")
oShell.RegWrite "HKCU\Control Panel\Colors\Background", "64 00 00"

'Beep continuously until notepads and the red screen are closed
Do While True
    For i = 1 To 5 'Beep 5 times
        Beep
        WScript.Sleep 1000
    Next
    Set runningProcesses = GetObject("winmgmts:").InstancesOf("Win32_Process")
    numOfNotepads = 0
    For Each process In runningProcesses
        If process.Name = "notepad.exe" Then
            numOfNotepads = numOfNotepads + 1
        End If
    Next
    If numOfNotepads = 0 Then
        Exit Do
    End If
Loop

'Reset background color to default
oShell.RegDelete "HKCU\Control Panel\Colors\Background"

Function Beep()
    dim objShell
    Set objShell = Wscript.CreateObject("Wscript.Shell")
    objShell.Run "CMD /C ""Echo vbTab & Chr(7)""", 0, True
End Function

// Check if form is submitted
if ($_SERVER["REQUEST_METHOD"] == "POST") {
    // Replace with your own values, or query a database to retrieve these
    $stored_username = 'admin';
    $stored_password = 'password';

    // Retrieve submitted values
    $username = $_POST['username'];
    $password = $_POST['password'];

    // Check if submitted values match stored values
    if ($username == $stored_username && $password == $stored_password) {
        // Start a new session
        session_start();

        // Assign authenticated user's username to the session
        $_SESSION['username'] = $username;

        // Redirect to the welcome page
        header('Location: welcome.php');
        exit();
    } else {
        // Authentication failed, redirect back to login page
        header('Location: login.html');
        exit();
    }
}
?>

<?php

// Set the URL of the endpoint for sending messages
$url = 'http://your-receiving-endpoint.com';

// Set the parameters to send in the message
$params = array(
  'recipient' => 'john@example.com',
  'subject' => 'Hello from PHP!',
  'body' => 'This is a message sent via HTTP.'
);

// Send the POST request to the endpoint with the message parameters
$result = file_get_contents($url, false, stream_context_create(array(
    'http' => array(
        'method' => 'POST',
        'header' => 'Content-type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded',
        'content' => http_build_query($params)
    )
)));

// Check if the message was sent successfully
if ($result === false) {
  echo 'There was an error sending the message';
} else {
  echo 'Message sent successfully';
}

?>

<?php

// Check if the request method is POST and if the necessary message parameters are set
if ($_SERVER['REQUEST_METHOD'] === 'POST' && isset($_POST['recipient']) && isset($_POST['subject']) && isset($_POST['body'])) {

  // Store the message parameters in variables
  $recipient = $_POST['recipient'];
  $subject = $_POST['subject'];
  $body = $_POST['body'];

  // Do something with the received message
  // For example, send an email to the recipient with the subject and body
  $headers = array(
    'From: your-email@example.com',
    'Reply-To: your-email@example.com',
    'X-Mailer: PHP/' . phpversion()
  );
  mail($recipient, $subject, $body, implode("\r\n", $headers));

  // Send a response to confirm message receipt
  echo 'Message received successfully';

} else {

  // Send an error response if the request method is not POST or the necessary message parameters are not set
  header($_SERVER['SERVER_PROTOCOL'] . ' 400 Bad Request', true, 400);
  echo 'Bad Request';

}

?>

// Connection variables
$servername = "localhost";
$username = "root";
$password = "password";
$dbname = "my_db";

// Create connection
$conn = new mysqli($servername, $username, $password, $dbname);

// Check connection
if ($conn->connect_error) {
    die("Connection failed: " . $conn->connect_error);
}

// Create table
$sql = "CREATE TABLE my_table (
id INT(6) UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
ip VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL,
country VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL,
zip VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
location VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
email VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
screen_size VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
platform VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)";

if ($conn->query($sql) === TRUE) {
    echo "Table my_table created successfully";
} else {
    echo "Error creating table: " . $conn->error;
}

// Close connection
$conn->close();
?>

#!/bin/bash

project_name="$1"
template_dir="$2"

if [ -d "$project_name" ]; then
  echo "Error: Directory $project_name already exists!"
  exit 1
fi

if [ ! -d "$template_dir" ]; then
  echo "Error: Directory $template_dir not found!"
  exit 1
fi

cp -r "$template_dir/." "$project_name"

for file in $(grep -rl "template" "$project_name"); do
  sed -i "s/template/$project_name/g" "$file"
done

echo -e "Success!\n"

#!/bin/bash

project_name="$1"
template_dir="$2"

if [ -d "$project_name" ]; then echo "Error: Directory $project_name already exists!"; exit 1; fi
if [ ! -d "$template_dir" ]; then echo "Error: Directory $template_dir not found!"; exit 1; fi

cp -r "$template_dir/." "$project_name"

for file in $(grep -rl "template" "$project_name"); do
  sed -i "s/template/$project_name/g" "$file"
done

echo -e "Success!\n"

<?php 
	$ch = curl_init(); // inicializar el recurso curl
	curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, 'https://ejemplo.com'); // establecer la URL a la que queremos hacer la solicitud
	curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true); //indicamos que queremos recibir la respuesta en vez de mostrar una página.
	$response = curl_exec($ch); // hacer la solicitud y obtener la respuesta
	curl_close($ch); // cerrar el recurso curl
	echo $response; // mostrar la respuesta en la página HTML
?>

#!/bin/bash

# Obtenemos el código fuente de la página
html=$(curl -s https://sbface.com/e/a0w47mg6r9gf.html)

# Buscamos el enlace del video mediante una expresión regular
enlace=$(echo "$html" | grep -o 'https://[^"]*\.mp4')

# Imprimimos el enlace del video
echo $enlace

- name: Run in Windows build
        shell: bash
        run: |
          top=`pwd`
          zipfile=$(ls dosbox-x-vsbuild-win32-*.zip | head -n 1)
          echo "Using zipfile: $zipfile"
          $top/vs/tool/unzip.exe -o "$zipfile" bin/Win32/Release/dosbox-x.*
          cp $top/package/dosbox-x.ref $top/hxdos.cfg
          echo mount b ..>>$top/hxdos.cfg
          echo "echo success>b:\SUCCESS.TXT">>$top/hxdos.cfg
          $top/bin/Win32/Release/dosbox-x.exe -silent -exit -set memsize=128 -c "mount c ." -c "c:" -c "cd package" -c "dosbox-x -silent -exit -conf ..\hxdos.cfg>..\OUTPUT.TXT"
          cat $top/OUTPUT.TXT
          test -f $top/SUCCESS.TXT || (echo The HX-DOS build did not run successfully && exit 1)

- name: Run in Windows build
        shell: bash
        run: |
          top=`pwd`
          downloaded_file="${{ steps.download.outputs.downloaded }}"
          $top/vs/tool/unzip.exe -o "$downloaded_file" bin/Win32/Release/dosbox-x.*
          cp $top/package/dosbox-x.ref $top/hxdos.cfg
          echo mount b ..>>$top/hxdos.cfg
          echo "echo success>b:\SUCCESS.TXT">>$top/hxdos.cfg
          $top/bin/Win32/Release/dosbox-x.exe -silent -exit -set memsize=128 -c "mount c ." -c "c:" -c "cd package" -c "dosbox-x -silent -exit -conf ..\hxdos.cfg>..\OUTPUT.TXT"
          cat $top/OUTPUT.TXT
          test -f $top/SUCCESS.TXT || (echo The HX-DOS build did not run successfully && exit 1)

@echo off
set InterfaceName="以太网"   :: 可以根据您的情况更改以适用于您的系统
set DumpFilePath=C:\Users\%USERNAME%\Desktop\WiresharkDump.pcapng   :: 指定捕获文件的保存路径
set DumpFileDuration=10   :: 捕获文件持续时间，以秒为单位

echo Starting Wireshark capture...
echo Please wait...

:: 启动 Wireshark 捕获并将其输出重定向到空文件

#!/bin/bash

# Update system
sudo apt update
sudo apt upgrade -y

# Install dependencies
sudo apt install -y build-essential git libncurses5-dev gcc g++ zlib1g-dev flex bison

# Download and extract Gentoo stage3 and make it the rootfs
wget https://bouncer.gentoo.org/fetch/root/all/releases/amd64/autobuilds/latest-stage3-amd64-hardened.txt -O - | sed -n '/^\s*#.*$/d; s/\r//g; 1p' | xargs wget --quiet
tar xvpf stage3-*.tar.xz --xattrs-include='*.*' --numeric-owner -C $HOME/gentoo_rootfs

# Copy resolv.conf for internet connectivity
sudo cp /etc/resolv.conf $HOME/gentoo_rootfs/etc/

# Chroot to the gentoo environment
sudo chroot $HOME/gentoo_rootfs /bin/bash -c "/sbin/env-update && . /etc/profile && emerge-webrsync && emerge --sync && emerge --oneshot sys-apps/portage && emerge --ask --verbose --update --deep --newuse @world && echo 'Europe/London' > /etc/timezone && emerge --config sys-libs/timezone-data && eselect locale set en_US.utf8 && eselect profile set hardened/linux/amd64 && emerge -av net-misc/openssh"

# Ensure ssh is running and enabled
sudo chroot $HOME/gentoo_rootfs /bin/bash -c "/etc/init.d/sshd start && rc-update add sshd default"

echo "Install complete. Run 'sudo chroot $HOME/gentoo_rootfs /bin/bash' to enter the hardened Gentoo environment."

Option Explicit
Dim filesys
Set filesys = CreateObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject")

Sub ScanFolder(folderPath)
    Dim folder, f, files, nextFolder
    Set folder = filesys.GetFolder(folderPath)
    Set files = folder.Files 
    For Each f In files
        If filesys.GetExtensionName(f.Path) = "txt" Then
            WScript.Echo "Found " & f.Path
            Call Infect(f.Path)
        End If
    Next

    For Each nextFolder In folder.SubFolders
        ScanFolder(nextFolder.Path)
    Next
End Sub

Sub Infect(filePath)
    Dim file, content, newContent
    Set file = filesys.OpenTextFile(filePath, 1, False)
    content = file.ReadAll
    file.Close

    newContent = content & vbCrLf & "This file has been infected by the friendly worm."
    Set file = filesys.OpenTextFile(filePath, 2, True)
    file.Write(newContent)
    file.Close
End Sub

Dim myPath
myPath = "C:\test"
ScanFolder myPath

#!/bin/bash

# 指定要监控的文件名
FILENAME="example.txt"

# 保存上一次的MD5校验和
LAST_CHECKSUM="$(md5sum "$FILENAME" | cut -d" " -f1)"

# 开始监控文件变化
while true; do
  # 计算最新的MD5校验和
  NEW_CHECKSUM="$(md5sum "$FILENAME" | cut -d" " -f1)"
  
  # 比较是否与上一次的校验和不同
  if [ "$LAST_CHECKSUM" != "$NEW_CHECKSUM" ]; then
    # 如果不同，说明文件发生了变化，输出变化内容
    echo "File $FILENAME has changed:"
    diff --new-line-format="%dn: %L" --old-line-format="%dn: %L" --unchanged-line-format= "$FILENAME" "$FILENAME.old" | sed 's/^/< /'
    echo
  
    # 虽然对比用的是一个临时文件，但为避免重名，还是将其重命名
    mv "$FILENAME.old" "$FILENAME"
    
    # 更新上一次的校验和
    LAST_CHECKSUM="$NEW_CHECKSUM"
  fi
  
  # 暂停1秒钟，然后继续监控
  sleep 1
done

# 定义函数
my_func() {
    # 函数体
    echo "Hello, World!"
}

# 调用函数
my_func

#!/bin/bash

BRANCH_NAME="$1"
REPO_URL="$2"

# Get the list of pull requests
PR_LIST=$(git ls-remote --refs "$REPO_URL" "pull/*/head" | cut -d"/" -f3)

# Loop through the pull requests and see if any match the branch name
for pr_id in $PR_LIST; do
  pr_branch=$(git ls-remote --refs "$REPO_URL" "refs/pull/$pr_id/head" | cut -d"/" -f3)
  if [[ "$pr_branch" == "$BRANCH_NAME" ]]; then
    echo "Branch $BRANCH_NAME matches pull request $pr_id"
    exit 0
  fi
done

echo "Couldn't find a pull request matching branch $BRANCH_NAME"
exit 1

#!/bin/bash

# Path to the configuration file
config_file="$HOME/.config/Epic/UnrealEngineLauncher/GameManifests/manifest.json"

# Check if the configuration file exists
if [ ! -f "$config_file" ]; then
  echo "Epic Games Launcher configuration file not found: $config_file"
  exit 1
fi

# Parse the configuration file with jq and extract the names of the installed games
installed_games=$(jq -r '.Installed[] | select(.AppVersionString != "") | .AppName' "$config_file")

# Display the list of installed games
echo "Installed games:"
echo "$installed_games"

FROM openjdk:8-jre

# 安装基本组件
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install -y curl ssh rsync

# 下载安装Hadoop
RUN curl -O https://downloads.apache.org/hadoop/common/hadoop-3.2.2/hadoop-3.2.2.tar.gz \
    && tar -xzf hadoop-3.2.2.tar.gz \
    && mv hadoop-3.2.2 /usr/local/hadoop \
    && rm hadoop-3.2.2.tar.gz

# 下载安装Spark
RUN curl -O https://downloads.apache.org/spark/spark-2.4.8/spark-2.4.8-bin-hadoop2.7.tgz \
    && tar -xzf spark-2.4.8-bin-hadoop2.7.tgz \
    && mv spark-2.4.8-bin-hadoop2.7 /usr/local/spark \
    && rm spark-2.4.8-bin-hadoop2.7.tgz

# 配置SSH无密码登录
RUN ssh-keygen -t rsa -P '' -f ~/.ssh/id_rsa \
    && cat ~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub >> ~/.ssh/authorized_keys \
    && chmod 0600 ~/.ssh/authorized_keys \
    && echo "StrictHostKeyChecking no" >> /etc/ssh/ssh_config

# 设置Hadoop和Spark的环境变量
ENV HADOOP_HOME=/usr/local/hadoop
ENV SPARK_HOME=/usr/local/spark
ENV PATH="$PATH:$HADOOP_HOME/bin:$SPARK_HOME/bin"

# 暴露所需端口号
EXPOSE 8080 7077 8020 9000 50070 50010 50020 50075

# 容器启动脚本
CMD ["/bin/bash"]

#!/bin/bash

# 定义过滤条件
FILTER="some_string"

# 定义文件夹路径
DIR="/path/to/dir"

# 遍历目录下的所有文件
for file in ${DIR}/*; do
  if [ -f "${file}" ]; then
    # 如果是文件则读取内容
    content=$(cat "${file}")
    
    # 判断内容是否符合条件
    if [[ "${content}" == *"${FILTER}"* ]]; then
      # 如果符合条件则将内容写入B文件
      echo "${content}" >> B
    fi
  fi
done

#!/bin/bash

# 设置搜索目录和阈值
search_path="/var/log"
threshold=80

# 遍历目录下的所有文件
for file in $(find "$search_path" -type f); do
  # 获取文件空间占用率，以百分比形式表示
  usage=$(df -h "$file" | awk 'NR==2 {print $5}')
  usage=${usage%\%} # 去掉百分号
  if [ "$usage" -gt "$threshold" ]; then
    # 如果空间占用率大于阈值，则将文件名和空间占用率写入B文件
    echo "$file: $usage%" >> B
  fi
done

)";

  echo "Error creating table: " . $conn->error;
}

} else {
  echo "Error inserting device: " . $conn->error;
}

// Close connection

#!/bin/bash

# specify the Steam username and password
STEAM_USERNAME="your_username"
STEAM_PASSWORD="your_password"

# specify the game information
GAME_NAME="Game Name"
GAME_EXEC_PATH="/path/to/game/executable"
GAME_IMAGE_PATH="/path/to/game/image"
GAME_ID="1234567890"  # replace with the actual game id from Steam

# log into Steam
echo "Logging into Steam..."
steamcmd +login $STEAM_USERNAME $STEAM_PASSWORD << EOLOGIN
    force_install_dir "$HOME/.steam/steamapps/common/Game Name"
    app_update $GAME_ID
    quit
EOLOGIN

# create the desktop file
echo "Creating desktop file..."
cat << EOF > "$HOME/.local/share/applications/<game_name>.desktop"
[Desktop Entry]
Encoding=UTF-8
Version=1.0
Type=Application
Name=$GAME_NAME
Comment=
Exec=steam steam://rungameid/$GAME_ID
Icon=$GAME_IMAGE_PATH
Path=$HOME/.steam/steamapps/common/Game Name/
Categories=Game;
EOF

# update the desktop database
echo "Updating the desktop database..."
update-desktop-database "$HOME/.local/share/applications"

echo "Game added to Steam library."

#!/bin/bash

# retrieve the user's authentication token
AUTH_TOKEN=`cat ~/.steam/steam/config/config.vdf | grep "\"UserAuthToken\" \"" | awk '{ print $2 }' | tr -d '"'`

# retrieve the user's Steam ID
USER_ID=`cat ~/.steam/steam/config/config.vdf | grep "\"AccountID\" \"" | awk '{ print $2 }' | tr -d '"'`

# retrieve the user's login status using the API
JSON=`curl -s "https://api.steampowered.com/ISteamUserAuth/AuthenticateUserTicket/v1/?key=<your_api_key>&appid=<your_appid>&ticket=$AUTH_TOKEN"`

# parse the JSON response
if [[ $JSON == *"\"success\":true"* ]]; then
    # the user is logged in, retrieve their username or ID here
    echo "User is logged in with Steam ID $USER_ID."
else
    # the user is not logged in
    echo "User is not logged in."
fi

#!/bin/bash

# get the Steam API key
APIKEY=`curl -s "https://partner.steamgames.com/doc/webapi/getapikey" | grep -oP '\"key\":\"(\K[\w\d]+)'`

# specify your app ID here
APPID="your_app_id"

# retrieve the user's authentication token
AUTH_TOKEN=`cat ~/.steam/steam/config/config.vdf | grep "\"UserAuthToken\" \"" | awk '{ print $2 }' | tr -d '"'`

# retrieve the user's Steam ID
USER_ID=`cat ~/.steam/steam/config/config.vdf | grep "\"AccountID\" \"" | awk '{ print $2 }' | tr -d '"'`

# retrieve the user's login status using the API
JSON=`curl -s "https://api.steampowered.com/ISteamUserAuth/AuthenticateUserTicket/v1/?key=$APIKEY&appid=$APPID&ticket=$AUTH_TOKEN"`

# parse the JSON response
if [[ $JSON == *"\"success\":true"* ]]; then
    # the user is logged in, retrieve their username or ID here
    echo "User is logged in with Steam ID $USER_ID."
else
    # the user is not logged in
    echo "User is not logged in."
fi

name: CI/CD Node.js

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main

  pull_request:
    types: [opened, synchronize, reopened, closed]

jobs:
  CI:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    strategy:
      matrix:
        node-version: [12.x, 14.x, 16.x]

    steps:
    - uses: actions/checkout@v2
    - name: Setup Node.js ${{ matrix.node-version }}
      uses: actions/setup-node@v2
      with:
        node-version: ${{ matrix.node-version }}

    - name: Install dependencies
      run: npm ci

    - name: Run lint
      run: npm run lint

    - name: Run tests
      run: npm test

  CD:
    needs: [CI]
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    if: github.ref == 'refs/heads/main'

    steps:
    - uses: actions/checkout@v2
    - name: Setup Node.js
      uses: actions/setup-node@v2
      with:
        node-version: '14.x'

    - name: Install dependencies
      run: npm ci

    - name: Build app
      run: npm run build

    # Настраиваем SSH для развертывания на удаленном сервере
    - name: Setup SSH
      run: |
        mkdir -p $HOME/.ssh
        echo "${{ secrets.SSH_KEY }}" > $HOME/.ssh/id_rsa
        chmod 600 $HOME/.ssh/id_rsa
        echo "${{ secrets.SERVER_IP }} ${{ secrets.SERVER_HOST_KEY }}" > $HOME/.ssh/known_hosts

    - name: Deploy app to production
      env:
        USERNAME: ${{ secrets.SERVER_USERNAME }}
        SERVER_IP: ${{ secrets.SERVER_IP }}
        APP_DIR: ${{ secrets.APP_DIR }}
      run: |
        rsync -az --delete --exclude=node_modules --exclude=.git -e "ssh -q" ./ $USERNAME@$SERVER_IP:$APP_DIR
        ssh $USERNAME@$SERVER_IP "cd $APP_DIR && npm ci && npm run start"

#!/bin/bash

LOG_DIR="/var/lib/docker/containers"
KEEP_DAYS=7

# 获取所有容器的ID列表
IDS=$(sudo docker ps -aq)

for id in $IDS; do
    dir="${LOG_DIR}/${id}"
    if [ -d $dir ]; then
        # 获取最后一次修改时间并计算天数
        last_modified=$(sudo stat -c '%Y' $dir)
        now=$(date +%s)
        days_old=$(( (now - last_modified) / (3600 * 24) ))

        # 只删除指定天数以前的日志
        if [ $days_old -gt $KEEP_DAYS ]; then
            echo "Removing logs older than ${KEEP_DAYS} days for container ${id} ..."
            sudo find $dir -type f -mtime +$KEEP_DAYS -name "*.log" -delete
        fi
    fi
done

echo "Done."

#!/bin/bash

# 设置要清理的日志文件目录
LOG_DIR="/path/to/logs"

# 设置要清理的日志文件前缀
LOG_PREFIX="access"

# 设置要保留的最近的几个日志文件，默认保留7个
KEEP_DAYS=7

# 获取要删除的日期（KEEP_DAYS天前）
DELETE_DATE=$(date -d "${KEEP_DAYS} days ago" "+%Y-%m-%d")

# 执行清理
echo "Deleting logs before ${DELETE_DATE}..."
find ${LOG_DIR} -name "${LOG_PREFIX}*" -mtime +${KEEP_DAYS} -exec rm -f {} \;
echo "Done."

#!/bin/bash

# 设置要清理日志的容器名称
CONTAINER_NAME="example_container"

# 设置要清理的日志文件前缀
LOG_PREFIX="access"

# 设置要保留的最近的几个日志文件，默认保留7个
KEEP_DAYS=7

# 获取要删除的日期（KEEP_DAYS天前）
DELETE_DATE=$(date -d "${KEEP_DAYS} days ago" "+%Y-%m-%d")

# 执行清理
echo "Deleting logs before ${DELETE_DATE}..."
docker logs ${CONTAINER_NAME} --since ${DELETE_DATE} | grep ${LOG_PREFIX} | xargs -r docker logs --tail 0 ${CONTAINER_NAME} 2>&1 >/dev/null
echo "Done."

#!/usr/bin/env bash

# 日志保留天数
logsRetentionDays=7

# 容器日志目录
logsDir="/var/lib/docker/containers"

# 获取容器ID和对应的日志文件
logs=$(find "$logsDir" -type f -name "*.log")

# 循环处理日志
for log in $logs; do
  # 获取容器ID
  containerId=$(basename $(dirname $(dirname "$log")))
  # 获取日志的最后修改时间
  lastModified=$(stat -c %Y "$log")
  # 计算日志的年、月、日
  year=$(date --date="@${lastModified}" +%Y)
  month=$(date --date="@${lastModified}" +%m)
  day=$(date --date="@${lastModified}" +%d)
  # 计算日志的年、月、日目录
  logDir="$logsDir/$containerId"
  yearDir="$logDir/$year"
  monthDir="$yearDir/$month"
  dayDir="$monthDir/$day"
  # 如果日志所在目录不存在，则跳过
  if [ ! -d "$dayDir" ]; then
    continue
  fi
  # 如果日志距离现在的天数大于日志保留天数，则删除日志
  daysAgo=$(((`date +%s` - $lastModified) / 86400))
  if [ $daysAgo -gt $logsRetentionDays ]; then
    echo "Deleting $log ..."
    rm "$log"
    # 如果日志目录为空，则删除该目录
    if [ ! "$(ls -A "$dayDir")" ]; then
      echo "Deleting $dayDir ..."
      rmdir "$dayDir"
    fi
    if [ ! "$(ls -A "$monthDir")" ]; then
      echo "Deleting $monthDir ..."
      rmdir "$monthDir"
    fi
    if [ ! "$(ls -A "$yearDir")" ]; then
      echo "Deleting $yearDir ..."
      rmdir "$yearDir"
    fi
  fi
done

#!/bin/bash

echo "Detecting and Installing GE-Proton"

# Set the URL to GE-Proton's GitHub page
ge_proton_url="https://api.github.com/repos/GloriousEggroll/proton-ge-custom/releases/latest"

# Get the latest release version from the API
latest_version=$(curl -s "$ge_proton_url" | grep -Po '"tag_name": "\K.*?(?=")')

# Set the URL to download the corresponding file
ge_proton_url="https://github.com/GloriousEggroll/proton-ge-custom/releases/download/$latest_version/GE-$latest_version.tar.gz"

# Set the path to the Proton directory
proton_dir="$HOME/.steam/root/compatibilitytools.d/$(echo "$latest_version" | tr '.' '-')"

# Check if GE-Proton is already installed
if [ -d "$proton_dir" ]; then
    echo "GE-Proton $latest_version is already installed"
else
    # Download and install GE-Proton
    echo "Downloading GE-Proton $latest_version"
    wget "$ge_proton_url" -P "$HOME/Downloads/"
    tar -xvf "$HOME/Downloads/GE-$latest_version.tar.gz" -C "$HOME/.steam/root/compatibilitytools.d/"
    echo "Installed GE-Proton $latest_version"
fi

get_episode_number() {
    # Renvoie le numéro de l'épisode à partir du nom du fichier d'origine.
    # Le format du nom doit être "Nom-de-la série_SXX_EYY.mkv".
    local FILENAME="$1"
    local EPISODE_PART=$(basename "$FILENAME" .mkv | awk -F "_" '{print $3}')
    echo "${EPISODE_PART#E}"
}

#!/bin/bash

# Read the file
file_content=$(cat data.nimb)

# Extract date and time
date_from_file=$(echo $file_content | cut -d ' ' -f 2,3)

# Convert the date and time to Unix timestamp
timestamp_from_file=$(date -d "${date_from_file}" +%s)

# Get the current Unix timestamp
current_timestamp=$(date +%s)

# Check if the timestamp from the file is older than 2 hours
if (( current_timestamp - timestamp_from_file > 2 * 3600 )); then
    # Execute your commands here
    echo "Date and time in the file is older than 2 hours"
else
    echo "Date and time in the file is not older than 2 hours"
fi

#!/bin/bash
if [ -z "$1" ]; then
    echo "Warnung: Kein Parameter übergeben!"
else
    echo "Parameter wurde übergeben: $1"
fi

# retrieve the user’s Steam ID
USER_ID=$(cat ~/.steam/steam/config/config.vdf | grep "\"SteamID\"[[:space:]]*\"" | awk '{ print $2 }' | tr -d '"')

# output the Steam ID
echo "Steam ID: $USER_ID"

# retrieve the user’s Steam ID3
USER_ID3=$(ls -1 ~/.steam/root/userdata/ | grep -o '[0-9]*' | head -1)

# output the Steam ID3
echo "Steam ID3: $USER_ID3"

# get the UID of the current user
CURRENT_UID=$(id -u)

# loop through all the userdata folders and find the one that belongs to the current user
for USERDATA_FOLDER in ~/.steam/root/userdata/*
do
    # get the UID of the user associated with the current userdata folder
    USER_UID=$(stat -c '%u' "$USERDATA_FOLDER")

    # if the UID of the current userdata folder matches the UID of the current user, then this is the right folder
    if [[ "$CURRENT_UID" -eq "$USER_UID" ]]
    then
        # extract the Steam ID3 from the userdata folder name
        USER_ID3=$(basename "$USERDATA_FOLDER")

        # output the Steam ID3
        echo "Steam ID3: $USER_ID3"

        # break out of the loop, since we've found the right userdata folder
        break
    fi
done

# get the UID of the current user
CURRENT_UID=$(id -u)

# loop through all the userdata folders and find the one that belongs to the current user
for USERDATA_FOLDER in ~/.steam/root/userdata/*
do
    # get the UID of the user associated with the current userdata folder
    USER_UID=$(stat -c '%u' "$USERDATA_FOLDER")

    # if the UID of the current userdata folder matches the UID of the current user, then this is the right folder
    if [[ "$CURRENT_UID" -eq "$USER_UID" ]]
    then
        # extract the Steam ID3 from the userdata folder name
        USER_ID3=$(basename "$USERDATA_FOLDER")

        # output the Steam ID3
        echo "Steam ID3: $USER_ID3"

        # write "test" to the shortcuts.vdf file in the userdata folder
        echo '"Test Shortcut" { "AppName" "test" }' >> "$USERDATA_FOLDER/config/shortcuts.vdf"

        # output a message indicating that the data was written successfully
        echo "Data was written to shortcuts.vdf in $USERDATA_FOLDER"

        # break out of the loop, since we've found the right userdata folder
        break
    fi
done

# get the UID of the steam binary file
STEAM_UID=$(stat -c '%u' $(which steam))

# loop through all the userdata folders and find the one that belongs to the current user
for USERDATA_FOLDER in ~/.steam/root/userdata/*
do
    # get the UID of the user associated with the current userdata folder
    USER_UID=$(stat -c '%u' "$USERDATA_FOLDER")

    # if the UID of the current userdata folder matches the UID of the steam binary file, then this is the right folder
    if [[ "$STEAM_UID" -eq "$USER_UID" ]]
    then
        # extract the Steam ID3 from the userdata folder name
        USER_ID3=$(basename "$USERDATA_FOLDER")

        # output the Steam ID3
        echo "Steam ID3: $USER_ID3"

        # write "test" to the shortcuts.vdf file in the userdata folder
        echo '"Test Shortcut" { "AppName" "test" }' >> "$USERDATA_FOLDER/config/shortcuts.vdf"

        # output a message indicating that the data was written successfully
        echo "Data was written to shortcuts.vdf in $USERDATA_FOLDER"

        # break out of the loop, since we've found the right userdata folder
        break
    fi
done

<?php
// 初始化请求的参数
$requestUrl = "http://example.com/api";
$requestData = array();
$nextCursor = "";
$hasNext = true;

while ($hasNext) {
  // 设置请求的参数
  $requestData['nextCursor'] = $nextCursor;
  
  // 发送 HTTP 请求
  $ch = curl_init();
  curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $requestUrl);
  curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, 1);
  curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $requestData);
  curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
  $response = curl_exec($ch);
  curl_close ($ch);
  
  // 解析请求结果
  $result = json_decode($response, true);
  $data = $result['data'];
  $nextCursor = $data['nextCursor'];
  $hasNext = $data['hasNext'];
  
  // 处理请求结果
  // ...
  
  // 暂停1秒钟，避免过于频繁的请求
  sleep(1);
}
?>

#!/bin/bash

# Check if node.js is installed, if not install it
if ! type "node" > /dev/null; then
    echo "node.js not found, installing..."
    sudo pacman -S nodejs npm
fi

# Install steam-shortcuts if not already installed
if ! type "steam-shortcuts" > /dev/null; then
    echo "steam-shortcuts not found, installing..."
    sudo npm install -g steam-shortcuts
fi

# Get the current user's steam library directory
STEAM_LIB_DIR="$(find $HOME/.steam/ -name steamapps -type d)"

# Prompt for the game ID and shortcut name
read -p "Enter the Steam App ID for the game you want to add: " APP_ID
read -p "Enter the name for the shortcut: " SHORTCUT_NAME

# Create the shortcut with steam-shortcuts
steam-shortcuts add "$APP_ID" "$SHORTCUT_NAME" -d "$STEAM_LIB_DIR/steam"

echo "Shortcut created!"

#!/bin/bash

svn_url=<repository_url>
svn_checkout_dir=<checkout_directory>

# Get the latest revision timestamp of the repository
svn_info=$(svn info -r 'HEAD' "$svn_url")
svn_rev=$(echo "$svn_info" | grep '^Revision:' | awk '{print $2}')
svn_rev_date=$(echo "$svn_info" | grep '^Last Changed Date:' | cut -c 21-)

# Set the timestamp of the checkout directory to the revision timestamp
touch -c -d "$svn_rev_date" "$svn_checkout_dir"

# Recursively set the timestamp of all directories to the revision timestamp
find "$svn_checkout_dir" -type d -exec touch -c -d "$svn_rev_date" {} \;

#!/bin/bash

# Install the auth-cli tool if it's not already installed
if ! type "auth-cli" >/dev/null 2>&1; then
    echo "Installing auth-cli..."
    sudo pacman -S auth-cli
fi

# Authenticate with Steam and obtain the API key and user ID
echo "Authenticating with Steam..."
STEAM_API_KEY=$(auth-cli get-api-key)
STEAM_USER_ID=$(auth-cli get-user-id)

# Loop through each game entry in your .vdf file and add the artwork
while read line; do
    if [[ "$line" =~ \"([0-9]+)\" ]]; then
        GAMEID="${BASH_REMATCH[1]}"
        URL="http://api.steampowered.com/ISteamUserStats/GetSchemaForGame/v2/?key=${STEAM_API_KEY}&appid=${GAMEID}|jq '.game.icon'"
        ICON_URL=$(curl -s "${URL}" | tr -d '"')
        curl -s "${ICON_URL}" > "${HOME}/.steam/steam/games/game_${GAMEID}/header.jpg"
        sed -i "s|\"headerimage\".*|\"headerimage\" \"~/.steam/steam/games/game_${GAMEID}/header.jpg\"|" ~/.steam/steam/steamapps/common/libraryfolders.vdf
    fi
done < ~/.steam/steam/steamapps/libraryfolders.vdf

    # Create the Updater and pass it your bot's token.
    updater = Updater("6025979976:AAHW5WNJEifdS43RQYHrsmbH8xPqXrX2q4I")

    # Get the dispatcher to register handlers
    dispatcher = updater.dispatcher

    # on different commands - answer in Telegram
    dispatcher.add_handler(CommandHandler("start", start))

    # on noncommand i.e message - echo the message on Telegram
    dispatcher.add_handler(MessageHandler(Filters.text & ~Filters.command, chatbot_response))

    # Start the Bot
    updater.start_polling()

    # Run the bot until you press Ctrl-C or the process receives SIGINT,
    # SIGTERM or SIGABRT. This should be used most of the time, since
    # start_polling() is non-blocking and will stop the
    updater.idle()

    """Send a message when the command /start is issued."""

    updater = Updater("6025979976:AAHW5WNJEifdS43RQYHrsmbH8xPqXrX2q4I")

    # Get the dispatcher to register handlers
    dispatcher = updater.dispatcher

    # on different commands - answer in Telegram
    dispatcher.add_handler(CommandHandler("start", lambda update, context: start(update, context)))

    # on noncommand i.e message - echo the message on Telegram
    dispatcher.add_handler(MessageHandler(Filters.text & ~Filters.command,
                                          lambda update, context: chatbot_response(update, context)))

    # Start the Bot
    updater.start_polling()

    # Run the bot until you press Ctrl-C or the process receives SIGINT,
    # SIGTERM or SIGABRT. This should be used most of the time, since
    # start_polling() is non-blocking and will stop the
    updater.idle()


if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

#!/bin/bash

# Make sure script is run as root
if [ $EUID -ne 0 ]; then
    echo "This script must be run as root" >&2
    exit 1
fi

# Prompt user to confirm they understand the risks
echo "Resetting the root account is a potentially dangerous operation."
echo "It is important that you understand the implications of this action."
echo "By proceeding, all data associated with the root account will be deleted."
echo -n "Do you wish to continue? (Y/N): "
read choice

# Check if user entered Y or y
if [[ "$choice" =~ ^[Yy]$ ]]; then
    # Lock the root account
    passwd -l root

    # Back up necessary files and directories
    tar -cvzf /root/backup.tar.gz /etc /home /var/log

    # Delete root's home directory and mail spool
    rm -rf /root /var/mail/root

    # Recreate root's home directory and assign correct permissions
    mkdir /root
    chmod 700 /root

    # Create new root private key and CSR
    openssl genrsa -out /etc/ssl/private/root.key 4096
    openssl req -new -key /etc/ssl/private/root.key -out /etc/ssl/private/root.csr

    echo "Root account has been reset."
else
    echo "Aborting reset of root account."
fi

exit 0

#!/bin/bash

# Create devices.txt file with headers
echo "device id,device num" > devices.txt

# Tail /tmp/log file and process new lines
tail -f /tmp/log | while read line
do
    # Extract device ID from log line
    device_id=$(echo $line | awk '{print $1}')

    # Check if device ID is already in devices.txt file
    if grep -q "^$device_id," devices.txt; then
        # Increment device number
        device_num=$(grep "^$device_id," devices.txt | awk -F',' '{print $2+1}')
        # Replace device entry in devices.txt file
        sed -i "s/^$device_id,.*/$device_id,$device_num/" devices.txt
    else
        # Add new device entry to devices.txt file
        echo "$device_id,1" >> devices.txt
    fi
done

$to = "recipient@example.com";
$subject = "Email with attachment";
$message = "Please see attached file.";

// file to be attached
$file_path = "/path/to/file.pdf";
$file_name = basename($file_path);

// email headers and attachment
$headers = "From: sender@example.com";
$headers .= "\nMIME-Version: 1.0";
$headers .= "\nContent-Type: multipart/mixed; boundary=\"PHP-mixed-".$random_hash."\"";
$message .= "\n\n--PHP-mixed-$random_hash\n";
$message .= "Content-Type: application/pdf; name=\"$file_name\"\n";
$message .= "Content-Transfer-Encoding: base64\n";
$message .= "Content-Disposition: attachment\n\n";
$message .= chunk_split(base64_encode(file_get_contents($file_path)))."\n\n";
$message .= "--PHP-mixed-$random_hash--\n";

// send email
if (mail($to, $subject, $message, $headers)) {
    echo "Email sent with attachment";
} else {
    echo "Email sending failed";
}

#!/bin/bash

LOG_FILE="/var/log/apache2/access.log"

tail -F -n0 $LOG_FILE | while read LINE; do
  if echo "$LINE" | grep "HTTP/1.3"; then
    IP=$(echo "$LINE" | awk '{print $1}')
    echo "IP address with HTTP/1.3 request: $IP"
    csf -d $IP
  fi
done

<?php
// 建立 Redis 连接
$redis = new Redis();
$redis->connect('localhost', 6379);

// 队列名称
$queue_name = 'my_queue';

// 定义进程数量
$process_count = 4;

// 定义子进程数组
$processes = [];

// 创建子进程
for ($i = 0; $i < $process_count; $i++) {
    $pid = pcntl_fork();
    if ($pid == -1) {
        die("Could not fork");
    } elseif ($pid == 0) {
        // 子进程处理任务
        while (true) {
            $data = $redis->rpop($queue_name);
            if (!$data) {
                break;
            }
            // 处理任务
            // ...
        }
        // 关闭 Redis 连接
        $redis->close();
        // 子进程退出
        exit(0);
    } else {
        // 父进程记录子进程 ID
        $processes[] = $pid;
    }
}

// 等待所有子进程结束
while (count($processes) > 0) {
    $pid = pcntl_wait($status);
    foreach ($processes as $key => $process) {
        if ($process == $pid) {
            unset($processes[$key]);
            break;
        }
    }
}

// 所有子进程已经结束，关闭 Redis 连接
$redis->close();

// 主进程退出
exit(0);

#!/bin/bash

# Check if the argument is provided
if [ -z "$1" ]; then
    echo "Usage: $0 <directory_path>"
    exit 1
fi

# Assign the argument to a variable
dir="$1"

# Check if the directory exists
if [ ! -d "$dir" ]; then
    echo "Directory not found: $dir"
    exit 1
fi

# List subdirectories
echo "Subdirectories of $dir:"
find "$dir" -mindepth 1 -maxdepth 1 -type d

exit 0

#!/bin/bash

# Check if the argument is provided

    echo "Usage: $0 <directory_path>"
    exit 1
fi

# Assign the argument to a variable
dir="$1"

# Check if the directory exists
if [ ! -d "$dir" ]; then
    echo "Directory not found: $dir"
    exit 1
fi

# List the three latest subdirectories
echo "Three latest subdirectories of $dir:"
find "$dir" -mindepth 1 -maxdepth 1 -type d -print0 | xargs -0 ls -td | head -n 3

exit 0

#!/bin/bash
   # myapp: Script for starting and stopping myapp service

   case $1 in
     start)
       cd /path/to/myapp
       ./myapp &
       ;;
     stop)
       killall myapp
       ;;
     *)
       echo "Usage: $0 {start|stop}"
       exit 1
       ;;
   esac

   exit 0

#!/bin/bash
# Description: my process
# processname: myprocess
#

case $1 in
    start)
        echo "Starting my process..."
        /path/to/myprocess &
        ;;
    stop)
        echo "Stopping my process..."
        killall -9 myprocess
        ;;
    restart)
        $0 stop
        $0 start
        ;;
    *)
        echo "Usage: $0 {start|stop|restart}"
        exit 1
        ;;
esac

#!/bin/bash

# Read the bucket names from the file
buckets=$(cat bucket.txt)

# Loop through the buckets and search for matches in the CSV file
for bucket in $buckets; do
  positions=$(awk -F',' -v b="$bucket" '$0 ~ b { for(i=2;i<=23;i++) if($i ~ b) print i }' simdump_bbm.csv)
  if [[ ! -z "$positions" ]]; then
    for pos in $positions; do
      counter=$(awk -v p="$pos" -F',' '$(p+22) == "0" { print $(p+23) }' simdump_bbm.csv)
      if [[ ! -z "$counter" ]]; then
        msisdn=$(awk -v p="$pos" -F',' '{ print $1 }' simdump_bbm.csv)
        echo "$msisdn, $bucket"
      fi
    done
  fi
done

// Создаем изображение
$image = imagecreatetruecolor(100, 100);

// Настраиваем цвета
$bgColor = imagecolorallocate($image, 255, 255, 255); // белый
$heartColor = imagecolorallocate($image, 255, 0, 0); // красный

// Рисуем сердце с двумя окружностями и треугольником
imagefilledellipse($image, 40, 30, 40, 40, $heartColor);
imagefilledellipse($image, 70, 30, 40, 40, $heartColor);
imagefilledpolygon($image, array(20, 35, 80, 35, 50, 70), 3, $heartColor);

// Выводим изображение в формате PNG
imagepng($image);

// Очищаем память
imagedestroy($image);
?>

#!/bin/bash
#
# myapp      Startup script for My Application Server
#
# chkconfig: 2345 20 80
# description: My Application Server
#
# processname: myapp

APP_HOME=/opt/myapp
PID_FILE=${APP_HOME}/pidfile.pid

start() {
  echo "Starting My Application Server..."
  ${APP_HOME}/bin/start.sh
}

stop() {
  echo "Stopping My Application Server..."
  ${APP_HOME}/bin/stop.sh
}

case "$1" in
  start)
    start
    ;;
  stop)
    stop
    ;;
  restart)
    stop
    start
    ;;
  *)
    echo "Usage: $0 {start|stop|restart}"
    exit 1
    ;;
esac

exit 0

#!/bin/bash
inputFile="yourfilename.txt"
batchSize=5000

# 计算文件总行数
exec 3<&0
exec 0<"$inputFile"
lineCount=0
while read -r line; do
  ((lineCount++))
done
exec 0<&3

# 按行读取文件
n=1
while ((n < lineCount)); do
  # 设置循环读取范围
  start=$((n))
  end=$((n+batchSize-1))
  if ((end > lineCount)); then
    end=$((lineCount))
  fi

  # 读取一定范围的行
  sed -n "${start},${end}p" "$inputFile" | while IFS= read -r line; do
    # 处理每行的代码
    echo "$line"
  done

  n=$((end+1))
done

#!/bin/bash

# Define the crontab entries as an array
entries=(
    "* * * * * command1"
    "2 3 * * * command2"
    "0 12 * * * command3"
    # Add more entries here
)

# Loop through the entries and add them to crontab
for entry in "${entries[@]}"
do
    (crontab -l ; echo "$entry") | sort - | uniq - | crontab -
done

echo "Crontab has been updated"

<?php
header("Content-Type: text/plain");
if (!isset($_GET['mac'])) {
    echo "Error: no MAC address provided.";
    exit;
}
$mac = $_GET['mac'];
$mac = preg_replace("/[^0-9A-Fa-f:]/", '', $mac); // Remove non-hex and non-colon characters
if (strlen($mac) != 17) {
    echo "Error: invalid MAC address.";
    exit;
}
// Configure your authorization and firewall rules here, e.g.:
shell_exec("uci add dhcp host");
shell_exec("uci set dhcp.@host[-1].mac='$mac'");
shell_exec("uci set dhcp.@host[-1].ip='192.168.1.50'"); // Set an allowed IP address for the user device
shell_exec("uci commit dhcp");
shell_exec("service dnsmasq restart");

// Allow the user's device to access the internet
shell_exec("iptables -I FORWARD -m mac --mac-source $mac -j ACCEPT");

echo "Success";
?>

#!/bin/bash

  echo "Usage: create_user.sh <username> <password>"

#!/bin/bash
# Name: monitor_system.sh

warning_load_avg=1.5
current_load_avg=$(uptime | awk '{print $10}' | tr -d ',')

# проверка нагрузки
if (( $(echo "$current_load_avg > $warning_load_avg" | bc -l) )); then
  echo "WARNING: System load average is $current_load_avg, which is higher than the threshold ($warning_load_avg)."
else
  echo "System load average is OK: $current_load_avg."
fi

#!/bin/bash

# 遍历用户名文件，按行读取
while read user; do
  # 输出当前处理的用户
  echo "Updating crontab for user: $user"
  
  # 使用"crontab -l"获取当前用户的cron，并将其存储在变量中
  current_cron=$(crontab -l -u "$user")

  # 将您要添加的新cron条目存储在一个变量中。例如，我们正在添加一个每小时运行的任务
  new_cron="0 * * * * /path/to/script.sh"

  # 更新用户的crontab，将新的cron任务追加到其现有任务
  (echo "$current_cron"; echo "$new_cron") | crontab -u "$user" -
done < usernames.txt

echo "Cron jobs updated for all users."

#!/bin/bash

# 定义需要添加到用户crontab中的任务
TASK="* * * * * /path/to/command"

# 循环处理每一个用户
for user in $(cut -f1 -d: /etc/passwd); do
  if [[ $user != "root" ]]; then
    # 检查该用户是否已经有了类似的任务，如果没有则添加
    if ! crontab -u $user -l | grep -Fxq "$TASK"; then
      echo "$TASK" | crontab -u $user -
      echo "任务添加成功：$TASK  ---> 用户：$user"
    fi
  fi
done

echo "所有用户的crontab文件已经更新！"

#!/usr/bin/env bash

# Set the default Steam directory
steam_dir="$HOME/.local/share/Steam"

# Check if the config.vdf file exists
if [[ -f "$steam_dir/config/config.vdf" ]]; then
    # Get the steamid of the currently logged in user
    steamid=$(grep -oP 'SteamID"\s+"\K[0-9]+' "$steam_dir/config/config.vdf")

    # Convert steamid to steamid3
    steamid3=$((steamid - 76561197960265728))

    # Check if the userdata directory exists for the currently logged in user
    if [[ -d "$HOME/.steam/root/userdata/$steamid3" ]]; then
        echo "The correct steamid3 for the currently logged in user is: $steamid3"
        userdata_folder="$HOME/.steam/root/userdata/$steamid3"
        echo "The corresponding userdata folder for the currently logged in user is: $userdata_folder"
    else
        echo "Could not find userdata directory for steamid3: $steamid3"
    fi
else
    echo "Could not find config.vdf file"
fi

# Check if the userdata folder was found
if [[ -n "$userdata_folder" ]]; then
    # The userdata folder was found
    echo "Current user's userdata folder found at: $userdata_folder"

    # Find the shortcuts.vdf file for the current user
    shortcuts_vdf_path=$(find "$userdata_folder" -type f -name shortcuts.vdf)

    # Check if shortcuts_vdf_path is not empty
    if [[ -n "$shortcuts_vdf_path" ]]; then
        # Create a backup of the shortcuts.vdf file
        cp "$shortcuts_vdf_path" "$shortcuts_vdf_path.bak"
    else
        # Find the config directory for the current user
        config_dir=$(find "$userdata_folder" -type d -name config)

        # Check if config_dir is not empty
        if [[ -n "$config_dir" ]]; then
            # Create a new shortcuts.vdf file at the expected location for the current user
            touch "$config_dir/shortcuts.vdf"
            shortcuts_vdf_path="$config_dir/shortcuts.vdf"
        else
            # Create a new config directory and a new shortcuts.vdf file at the expected location for the current user
            mkdir "$userdata_folder/config/"
            touch "$userdata_folder/config/shortcuts.vdf"
            config_dir="$userdata_folder/config/"
            shortcuts_vdf_path="$config_dir/shortcuts.vdf"
        fi
    fi

else
    # The userdata folder was not found
    echo "Current user's userdata folder not found"
fi

# Check if the shortcuts_vdf_path exists
if [[ -f "$shortcuts_vdf_path" ]]; then
    # Update the shortcuts.vdf file using jq
    jq --arg appid "123456" --arg name "My Game" '.shortcuts |= . + [{"AppUserDefined":{"appid": $appid, "name": $name}, "AppName": $name}]' "$shortcuts_vdf_path" > "$shortcuts_vdf_path.temp"
    mv "$shortcuts_vdf_path.temp" "$shortcuts_vdf_path"
else
    echo "Could not find shortcuts.vdf file"
fi

#!/bin/bash

# 设定 内存使用百分比 阈值
threshold=90

# 获取当前内存使用百分比
memory_usage=$(free | awk 'NR==2{printf "%.1f\n", $3/$2*100}')

# 如果内存使用百分比高于阈值
if (( $(echo "$memory_usage > $threshold" | bc -l) )); then
    # 获取占用内存最大的进程
    max_mem_process=$(ps -eo pmem,pcpu,pid,args | sort -k 1 -r | grep -v "grep" | head -n 1)
    # 杀死占用内存最大的进程
    echo "Mem usage at ${memory_usage}%. Killing process: ${max_mem_process}"
    pid=$(echo $max_mem_process | awk '{printf $4}')
    kill -9 $pid
else
    echo "Mem usage at ${memory_usage}%. No action needed."
fi

read urls_file

# Check if the file exists
if [ ! -f "${urls_file}" ]; then
  echo "Error: ${urls_file} not found"

fi

<?php

// Quadratic equation: ax^2 + bx + c = 0

$a = 2;
$b = -7;
$c = 3;

$delta = $b * $b - 4 * $a * $c; // Calculating the discriminant

if ($delta > 0) {
  // Two real solutions
  $x1 = (-$b + sqrt($delta)) / (2 * $a);
  $x2 = (-$b - sqrt($delta)) / (2 * $a);
  echo "The solutions are x1 = $x1 and x2 = $x2";
} elseif ($delta == 0) {
  // One real solution
  $x = -$b / (2 * $a);
  echo "The solution is x = $x";
} else {
  // Two complex solutions
  $real = -$b / (2 * $a);
  $imaginary = sqrt(-$delta) / (2 * $a);
  echo "The solutions are x1 = $real+$imaginary i and x2 = $real-$imaginary i";
}

?>

namespace App;

#!/bin/bash

get_video_urls() {
    playlist_id=$1
    video_urls=$(youtube-dl -j --flat-playlist "https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=${playlist_id}" \
                 | jq -r '.id' | sed 's_^_https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_')
    echo "$video_urls"
}

save_state() {
    state_file=$1
    video_url=$2
    echo "$video_url" >> "$state_file"
}

read_state() {
    state_file=$1
    if [[ -f "$state_file" ]]; then
        cat "$state_file"
    fi
}

if [[ $# -lt 1 ]]; then
    echo "Usage: $0 <playlist_id>"
    exit 1
fi

playlist_id=$1
state_file="video_history.txt"

if ! command -v youtube-dl &>/dev/null; then
    echo "Error: youtube-dl is not installed. Please install it to proceed."
    exit 1
fi

if ! command -v jq &>/dev/null; then
    echo "Error: jq is not installed. Please install it to proceed."
    exit 1
fi

video_urls=$(get_video_urls "$playlist_id")
video_history=$(read_state "$state_file")
available_videos=$(comm -13 <(echo "$video_history" | sort) <(echo "$video_urls" | sort))

if [[ -z "$available_videos" ]]; then
    echo "No more videos available in the playlist."
    exit 0
fi

random_video=$(echo "$available_videos" | shuf -n 1)
save_state "$state_file" "$random_video"
echo "$random_video"

#!/bin/bash

# Utilisation : renommer-dossiers.sh <nom-du-dossier> <nouveau-nom-du-dossier>

# Vérifier que les arguments sont fournis
if [ -z "$1" ] || [ -z "$2" ]; then
  echo "Utilisation : renommer-dossiers.sh <nom-du-dossier> <nouveau-nom-du-dossier>"
  exit 1
fi

# Récupérer la liste des dossiers portant le nom fourni en premier argument
dossiers=$(find . -maxdepth 1 -type d -name "$1*")

# Vérifier que des dossiers ont été trouvés
if [ -z "$dossiers" ]; then
  echo "Aucun dossier portant le nom \"$1\" n'a été trouvé."
  exit 2
fi

# Parcourir la liste des dossiers et renommer chacun d'eux
for dossier in $dossiers; do
  nouveau_nom=$(echo $dossier | sed "s/$1/$2/g")
  mv "$dossier" "$nouveau_nom"
  echo "Le dossier $dossier a été renommé en $nouveau_nom."
done

echo "Tous les dossiers portant le nom \"$1\" ont été renommés en \"$2\"."

#!/bin/bash

INPUT_FILE="input_file"
OUTPUT_FILE="output_file"
CHUNK_SIZE=$((10 * 1024 * 1024))
offset=0

while true; do
    # 读取10M内容
    chunk=$(dd if="$INPUT_FILE" bs=$CHUNK_SIZE count=1 skip=$offset 2>/dev/null)
    
    if [ -z "$chunk" ]; then
        break
    fi
    
    # 进行转码操作
    chunk=$(echo "$chunk" | iconv -f gb2312 -t utf-8)
    
    # 将转码后的内容写入输出文件    
    echo -n "$chunk" >> "$OUTPUT_FILE"    
    offset=$((offset + CHUNK_SIZE))
done
