#!/bin/bash

# 定义源文件的路径和待执行的转码命令
src_file='/path/to/source/file.mp4'
cmd="ffmpeg -i ${src_file} -acodec libmp3lame -q:a 2 -ar 44100 -ab 128k -f mp3 pipe:"

# 定义已转码的字节数
transcoded_bytes=0

# 每次读取10MB，并执行一次转码
while read -r -N 10485760 chunk ; do
  if [ -n "$chunk" ] ; then
    transcoded_chunk=$(echo -n "${chunk}" | eval "${cmd}")
    echo "${transcoded_chunk}"
    transcoded_bytes=$((transcoded_bytes + ${#transcoded_chunk}))
  else
    break
  fi
done < "${src_file}"

# 输出转码后的文件总大小（字节数）
echo "Transcoded file size: ${transcoded_bytes}"

#!/bin/bash

input_file="bigfile.txt"
output_encoding="UTF-8"

# 使用split命令将大文件分割成小文件
split --bytes=10M "$input_file" "$input_file.part"

# 循环处理每个小文件
for part_file in "$input_file".part*
do
  # 转码操作
  echo "=====$part_file====="
  iconv -f GBK -t "$output_encoding" "$part_file"
done

# 删除分割出来的小文件
rm -f "$input_file".part*

#!/bin/bash

# Set the download directory
download_dir=~/Downloads/NonSteamLaunchersInstallation

# Create the download directory if it doesn't exist
mkdir -p "$download_dir"

# Download the python-vdf library from GitHub
download_url="https://github.com/ValvePython/vdf/archive/refs/heads/master.zip"
wget -P "$download_dir" "$download_url"

# Extract the downloaded zip file
unzip "$download_dir"/master.zip -d "$download_dir" > /dev/null

# Move the extracted files to the desired location
mv "$download_dir"/vdf-master/* "$download_dir"


# Set the default Steam directory
steam_dir="$HOME/.local/share/Steam"

# Check if the config.vdf file exists
if [[ -f "$steam_dir/config/config.vdf" ]]; then
    # Get the steamid of the currently logged in user
    steamid=$(grep -oP 'SteamID"\s+"\K[0-9]+' "$steam_dir/config/config.vdf" | head -n 1)

    # Print out the value of steamid for debugging purposes
    echo "steamid: $steamid"

    # Convert steamid to steamid3
    steamid3=$((steamid - 76561197960265728))

    # Initialize the userdata_folder variable
    userdata_folder=""

    # Initialize the most_recent variable
    most_recent=0

    # Loop through all the userdata folders
    for USERDATA_FOLDER in ~/.steam/root/userdata/*
    do
        # Check if the current userdata folder is not the "0" or "anonymous" folder
        if [[ "$USERDATA_FOLDER" != *"/0" ]] && [[ "$USERDATA_FOLDER" != *"/anonymous" ]]
        then
            # Get the access time of the current userdata folder
            access_time=$(stat -c %X "$USERDATA_FOLDER")

            # Extract steamid3 from userdata folder name
            userdata_steamid3=$(basename "$USERDATA_FOLDER")

            # Check if userdata_steamid3 matches steamid3 and if access time is more recent than most recent access time
            if [[ $userdata_steamid3 -eq $steamid3 ]] && [[ $access_time -gt $most_recent ]]
            then
                # The access time of current userdata folder is more recent and steamid3 matches
                # Set userdata_folder variable
                userdata_folder="$USERDATA_FOLDER"

                # Update most_recent variable
                most_recent=$access_time
            fi
        fi
    done

else
    echo "Could not find config.vdf file"
fi

# Check if userdata folder was found
if [[ -n "$userdata_folder" ]]; then
    # Userdata folder was found
    echo "Current user's userdata folder found at: $userdata_folder"

    # Find shortcuts.json file for current user
    shortcuts_json_path=$(find "$userdata_folder" -type f -name shortcuts.json)

    # Check if shortcuts_json_path is not empty
    if [[ -n "$shortcuts_json_path" ]]; then
        # Create backup of shortcuts.json file
        cp "$shortcuts_json_path" "$shortcuts_json_path.bak"
    else
        # Find config directory for current user
        config_dir=$(find "$userdata_folder" -type d -name config)

        # Check if config_dir is not empty
        if [[ -n "$config_dir" ]]; then
            # Create new shortcuts.json file at expected location for current user
            echo '{}' > "$config_dir/shortcuts.json"
            shortcuts_json_path="$config_dir/shortcuts.json"
        else
            # Create new config directory and new shortcuts.json file at expected location for current user
            mkdir "$userdata_folder/config/"
            echo '{}' > "$userdata_folder/config/shortcuts.json"
            config_dir="$userdata_folder/config/"
            shortcuts_json_path="$config_dir/shortcuts.json"
        fi
    fi

else
    # Userdata folder was not found
    echo "Current user's userdata folder not found"
fi

# Detach script from Steam process
nohup sh -c 'sleep 10; /usr/bin/steam' &

# Close all instances of Steam
killall steam

# Wait for the steam process to exit
while pgrep steam > /dev/null; do sleep 1; done

# Define the path of the Launchers
epicshortcutdirectory="$HOME/desktop/Epic"
gogshortcutdirectory="$HOME/Games/GOG Galaxy"
originshortcutdirectory="$HOME/desktop/Origin"
uplayshortcutdirectory="$HOME/desktop/Uplay"
battlenetshortcutdirectory="$HOME/desktop/Battle.net"
eaappshortcutdirectory="$HOME/desktop/EA Play"
amazonshortcutdirectory="$HOME/desktop/Amazon Games"
itchioshortcutdirectory="$HOME/desktop/Itch.io"
legacyshortcutdirectory="$HOME/desktop/Legacy"
humbleshortcutdirectory="$HOME/desktop/Humble Bundle"
indieshortcutdirectory="$HOME/desktop/Indie"
rockstarshortcutdirectory="$HOME/desktop/Rockstar Games"

# Load the shortcuts.json file
shortcuts=$(jq -M -c . "$shortcuts_json_path")


# Check if the 'shortcuts' key exists in the dictionary
if [[ $(echo "$shortcuts" | jq -r '.shortcuts') == null ]]; then
    # Create an empty 'shortcuts' entry
    shortcuts=$(echo "$shortcuts" | jq '. + {"shortcuts": {}}')
fi

# Check the format of the 'shortcuts' entry
jq -e 'if (.shortcuts | type) == "array" then true elif (.shortcuts | type) == "object" then true else false end' <<< "$shortcuts" > /dev/null

# Define the new_entry object for Epic
if [[ "$epicshortcutdirectory" != "" ]]; then
    new_entry=$(jq -nc \
    --arg appid '' \
    --arg AppName "Epic Games" \
    --arg Exe "$epicshortcutdirectory" \
    --arg StartDir "$epicshortcutdirectory" \
    --arg icon '' \
    --arg ShortcutPath '' \
    --arg LaunchOptions "$epiclaunchoptions" \
    --arg IsHidden 0 \
    --arg AllowDesktopConfig 1 \
    --arg AllowOverlay 1 \
    --arg OpenVR 0 \
    --arg Devkit 0 \
    --arg DevkitGameID '' \
    --arg LastPlayTime 0 \
    '{"appid": $appid, "AppName": $AppName, "Exe": $Exe, "StartDir": $StartDir, "icon": $icon,
    "ShortcutPath": $ShortcutPath, "LaunchOptions": $LaunchOptions, "IsHidden": $IsHidden,
    "AllowDesktopConfig": $AllowDesktopConfig, "AllowOverlay": $AllowOverlay, "OpenVR": $OpenVR,
    "Devkit": $Devkit, "DevkitGameID": $DevkitGameID, "LastPlayTime": $LastPlayTime,
    "tags": {"0": "favorite"}}')
fi

# Add the new entry to the shortcuts dictionary
if [[ $(echo "$shortcuts" | jq -r ".shortcuts | type") == "array" ]]; then
    # Check if the 'shortcuts' array already contains the new entry
    if [[ $(echo "$shortcuts" | jq ".shortcuts | inside({\"Exe\": \"$epicshortcutdirectory\"})") == false ]]; then
        shortcuts=$(echo "$shortcuts" | jq --argjson new_entry "$new_entry" '.shortcuts += [$new_entry]')
    fi
elif [[ $(echo "$shortcuts" | jq -r ".shortcuts | type") == "object" ]]; then
    if [[ $(echo "$shortcuts" | jq ".shortcuts | has(\"0\")") == false ]]; then
        shortcuts=$(echo "$shortcuts" | jq ".shortcuts | .[0] = $new_entry")
    elif [[ $(echo "$shortcuts" | jq --arg directory "$epicshortcutdirectory" -r \
                '.shortcuts | map(select(.Exe == $directory)) | length') == 0 ]]; then
        max_key=$(echo "$shortcuts" | jq --raw-output '.shortcuts | keys | map(tonumber) | max')
        new_key=$(($max_key + 1))
        shortcuts=$(echo "$shortcuts" | jq --argjson new_entry "$new_entry" \
                    ".shortcuts | . + {\"$new_key\": \$new_entry}")
    fi
fi


# Write the new shortcuts.json file
echo "$shortcuts" | jq '.' > "$shortcuts_json_path"

#!/bin/bash

# Задаємо шлях до підкаталогу pager
pager_dir="./pager"

# За допомогою команди who отримуємо список активних користувачів
active_users=$(who | awk '{print $1}')

# Задаємо шаблон для імені користувача
name_pattern="stud"

# Перебираємо файли в каталозі pager
for file in "$pager_dir"/*; do
  # Вставте вашу логіку сюди
  [ -e "$file" ] || continue # Пропустити, якщо файл не існує
  filename=$(basename -- "$file") # Отримуємо ім'я файлу

  # Перевіряємо, чи існує активний користувач з таким іменем
  for user in $active_users; do
    if [[ "$user" == *"$name_pattern"* ]]; then
      if [[ "$user" == "$filename" ]]; then
        # Надсилаємо повідомлення потрібному користувачу
        message=$(cat "$file")
        echo "Sending message to user: $user"
        write "$user" <<<"$message"

        # Видаляємо файл з повідомленням
        echo "Removing file: $file"
        rm "$file"
      fi
    fi
  done
done

#!/bin/bash

# Script to touch files in a directory recursively

# Function to process a directory
process_directory() {
  local dir_path="$1"
  
  for file_path in "$dir_path"/*; do
    if [ -d "$file_path" ]; then
      process_directory "$file_path"
    elif [ -f "$file_path" ]; then
      touch "$file_path"
    fi
  done
}

# Check if the directory is provided
if [ -z "$1" ]; then
  echo "Usage: $0 <directory>"
  exit 1
fi

# Check if the directory exists
if [ ! -d "$1" ]; then
  echo "Error: Directory \"$1\" not found!"
  exit 1
fi

# Start processing the directory
process_directory "$1"

$ distribution=$(. /etc/os-release;echo $ID$VERSION_ID)
$ curl -s -L https://nvidia.github.io/nvidia-docker/gpgkey | sudo apt-key add -
$ curl -s -L https://nvidia.github.io/nvidia-docker/$distribution/nvidia-docker.list | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/nvidia-docker.list
$ sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y nvidia-docker2
$ sudo systemctl restart docker

#!/bin/bash

# 这里列出需要检查的远程主机ip和密码，格式：ip password
hosts=("10.0.0.1 myPass1" "10.0.0.2 myPass2" "10.0.0.3 myPass3")

for host_info in "${hosts[@]}"; do
    ip=$(echo $host_info | awk '{print $1}')
    password=$(echo $host_info | awk '{print $2}')

    result=$(sshpass -p$password ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -o ConnectTimeout=5 -o BatchMode=yes -n -q $ip exit 0 2>&1)
    if [$? -eq 0]
    then
        echo "Host $ip: Password is correct"
    else
        echo "Host $ip: Password is incorrect"
    fi
done

#!/bin/bash

# 检查是否安装了常见的远控软件
declare -a remote_control=("TeamViewer" "AnyDesk" "UltraVNC" "TightVNC")

for i in "${remote_control[@]}"
do
    if pgrep "$i" >/dev/null
    then
        echo "检测到 $i 在运行中"
    fi
done

@echo off

REM 检查是否安装了常见的远程控制软件
setlocal EnableDelayedExpansion
set "remote_control=TeamViewer AnyDesk UltraVNC TightVNC"

for %%i in (%remote_control%) do (
    tasklist /FI "IMAGENAME eq %%i.exe" 2>NUL | find /I /N "%%i.exe">NUL
    if "%ERRORLEVEL%"=="0" (
        echo 检测到 %%i 在运行中
    )
)

echo.

REM 检查计算机上是否安装了潜在的远程控制软件
setlocal EnableExtensions EnableDelayedExpansion
set "registry_key=HKLM\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Uninstall\*"
set "remote_registry_key=Software\*"

for /f "tokens=*" %%i in ('reg query "%registry_key%" ^| find /i "DisplayName"') do (
    set "display_name=%%i"
    set "display_name=!display_name:*REG_SZ=!"
    call :search_string "!display_name!" "%remote_registry_key%"
)

goto :end

:search_string
if '%~1'=='' goto :eof
set "string=%~1"
set "key=%~2"

reg query "HKLM\%key%" /f "%string%" /t REG_SZ /s >nul 2>&1
if '%ERRORLEVEL%'=='0' (
    echo 检测到 %string% 在计算机上安装
)
goto :eof

:end
endlocal

def parse_report(report_case_path, update):
    file_paths = {
        "filepath": report_case_path / "filesystem/etc",
        "configpath": report_case_path / "filesystem/etc/bosminer.toml",
        "pingpath": report_case_path / "builtin/ping_report",
        "metricspath": report_case_path / "filesystem/var/log/metrics/metrics.prom",
        "logpath": report_case_path / "filesystem/var/log/bosminer/bosminer.log",
        "loggzpath": report_case_path / "filesystem/var/log/bosminer/bosminer.log.",
        "uptimepath": report_case_path / "filesystem/proc/uptime",
        "ippath": report_case_path / "builtin/public_ip",
        "localip": report_case_path / "command/ifconfig_-a",
        "profilepath": report_case_path / "filesystem/etc/bosminer-autotune.json",
        "hwidpath": report_case_path / "filesystem/tmp/miner_hwid",
        "refidpath": report_case_path / "filesystem/etc/bos_refid",
        "platformpath": report_case_path / "filesystem/etc/bos_platform",
        "dmesgpath": report_case_path / "command/dmesg",
        "cpupath": report_case_path / "filesystem/proc/cpuinfo"
    }

    variant = subprocess.check_output(f'grep -o "BHB[0-9]*" {file_paths["dmesgpath"]} || echo "Variant: Not found!"', shell=True)
    psu_type = subprocess.check_output(f'grep -m1 "PSU: version" {file_paths["logpath"]} | cut -d"\'" -f2 | awk "{{print $1}}" || echo "PSU type: Not found!"', shell=True)
    
    if file_paths["platformpath"].is_file():
        platform = subprocess.check_output(f"cat {file_paths['filepath']}/bos_platform", shell=True, text=True)
        platform = f"Platform: {platform.strip()}"
    else:
        platform = "Platform: Not found!"
    
    cb_type = subprocess.check_output(f'grep "Hardware" {file_paths["cpupath"]} | cut -d":" -f2 | sed "s/Generic AM33XX/BeagleBone/" || echo "CB Type: Not found!"', shell=True)
    
    bos_mode = subprocess.check_output(f"cat {file_paths['filepath']}/bos_mode || echo 'BOS+ Mode: Not found!'", shell=True)
    bos_version = subprocess.check_output(f"cat {file_paths['filepath']}/bos_version || echo 'Version: Not found!'", shell=True)
    
    hwid = subprocess.check_output(f"cat {file_paths['hwidpath']} || echo 'HW ID: Not found!'", shell=True)
    
    local_ip = subprocess.check_output(f'grep -m1 "inet addr" {file_paths["localip"]} | cut -d: -f2 | awk "{{print $1}}" || echo "Local IP: Not found!"', shell=True)

    if file_paths["ippath"].is_file():
        public_ip = subprocess.check_output(f"cat {file_paths['ippath']} || echo 'Public IP: Not found!'", shell=True)
    else:
        public_ip = "Public IP: Not found!"
    
    if file_paths["uptimepath"].is_file():
        uptime = subprocess.check_output(f'awk "{{print int($1/3600)\":\"int(($1%3600)/60)\":\"int($1%60)}}" {file_paths["uptimepath"]} || echo "Uptime: Not found!"', shell=True)
    else:
        uptime = "Uptime: Not found!"
    
    if file_paths["refidpath"].is_file():
        ref_id = subprocess.check_output(f"cat {file_paths['refidpath']} || echo 'Ref ID: Not found!'", shell=True)
    else:
        ref_id = "Ref ID: Not found!"
    
    result = f"Variant: {variant.decode('utf-8').strip()}\nPSU type: {psu_type.decode('utf-8').strip()}\n{platform}\nCB Type: {cb_type.decode('utf-8').strip()}\nBOS+ Mode: {bos_mode.decode('utf-8').strip()}\nVersion: {bos_version.decode('utf-8').strip()}\nHW ID: {hwid.decode('utf-8').strip()}\nLocal IP: {local_ip.decode('utf-8').strip()}\n{public_ip.strip()}\nUptime: {uptime.decode('utf-8').strip()}\nRef ID: {ref_id.decode('utf-8').strip()}"

    update.message.reply_text(result)

$password = 'password'; // Contraseña para acceder al API

    $read = $api->read(false);

    echo "El uso del CPU es del ".$cpuUsage."%";

    $api->disconnect();
} else {
    echo "No se pudo conectar con el Routerboard Mikrotik";
}

    'encoding' => 'UTF-8',
    'trace' => 1,

));

// Utilizar la función "getSystemResource" para obtener los datos del uso del CPU

);

);

<?php
// Configuración de la conexión con la API de Mikrotik
$host = "192.168.1.1";
$username = "admin";
$password = "";
$port = 8728;
$utilization_api = "/system/resource/cpu";

// Creación del socket de conexión
$socket = socket_create(AF_INET, SOCK_STREAM, SOL_TCP);
if ($socket === false) {
    echo "Error al crear socket: " . socket_strerror(socket_last_error()) . "\n";
    exit;
}

// Conexión al puerto y dirección del servidor de Mikrotik
$result = socket_connect($socket, $host, $port);
if ($result === false) {
    echo "Error al conectarse al servidor: " . socket_strerror(socket_last_error($socket)) . "\n";
    exit;
}

// Autenticación con el servidor de Mikrotik
socket_write($socket, "/login\r\n");
socket_read($socket, 1024); // Lectura de la respuesta del servidor

socket_write($socket, "=name=$username\r\n=password=$password\r\n");
$response = socket_read($socket, 1024); // Lectura de la respuesta del servidor
if (strpos($response, "!done") === false) {
    echo "Error al autenticarse en el servidor: $response\n";
    exit;
}

// Envío de la petición para obtener la utilización del CPU
socket_write($socket, "/tool$utilization_api\r\n");
$response = socket_read($socket, 1024); // Lectura de la respuesta del servidor
if (strpos($response, "!trap") !== false) {
    echo "Error al obtener la carga del CPU: $response\n";
    exit;
}

// Parseo de la respuesta en formato CSV a un array
$raw_data = explode(',', trim($response));
$load = str_replace('%', '', $raw_data[0]);

// Construcción del JSON con la información de la carga del CPU
$data = array(
    'cpu_usage' => $load
);

$json = json_encode($data);
echo $json;

// Cierre de la conexión con el servidor de Mikrotik
socket_write($socket, "/quit\r\n");
socket_close($socket);
?>

#!/bin/bash

program=/usr/bin/your_program
restart_cmd="ssh username@remote_server '/usr/bin/your_program'"

while true; do
    if pgrep your_program > /dev/null; then
        sleep 10
    else
        echo "Program stopped. Restarting..."
        eval $restart_cmd
    fi
done

# Establece la imagen base de ubuntu
FROM ubuntu:latest

# Actualiza los paquetes e instala las herramientas básicas
RUN apt-get update && \
    apt-get install -y \
    build-essential \
    curl \
    git \
    vim \
    wget

# Instala PHP y las extensiones necesarias para Laravel
RUN apt-get install -y \
    php \
    php-cli \
    php-common \
    php-curl \
    php-json \
    php-mbstring \
    php-mysql \
    php-xml \
    php-zip

# Instala Composer (gestor de paquetes de PHP)
RUN curl -sS https://getcomposer.org/installer | php -- --install-dir=/usr/local/bin --filename=composer

# Instala Node.js y NPM
RUN curl -sL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_14.x | bash && \
    apt-get install -y \
    nodejs

# Instala Python y pip
RUN apt-get install -y \
    python3 \
    python3-pip

# Instala XAMPP
RUN wget -q https://www.apachefriends.org/xampp-files/8.0.10/xampp-linux-x64-8.0.10-0-installer.run -O xampp-installer.run && \
    chmod +x xampp-installer.run && \
    ./xampp-installer.run --mode unattended && \
    rm xampp-installer.run

ENV PATH /opt/lampp/bin:$PATH

# Instala Visual Studio Code y Visual Studio Codium
RUN wget -q https://packages.microsoft.com/keys/microsoft.asc -O- | apt-key add - && \
    echo "deb [arch=amd64] https://packages.microsoft.com/repos/vscode stable main" > /etc/apt/sources.list.d/vscode.list && \
    apt-get update && \
    apt-get install -y \
    code \
    codium

# Instala PyCharm
RUN wget -q https://download.jetbrains.com/python/pycharm-community-2021.2.2.tar.gz -O pycharm.tar.gz && \
    tar xzvf pycharm.tar.gz -C /opt && \
    rm pycharm.tar.gz

ENV PATH /opt/pycharm-community-2021.2.2/bin:$PATH

# Instala Laravel en ~/laravel
RUN composer global require laravel/installer && \
    echo "export PATH=\"$PATH:$HOME/.composer/vendor/bin\"" >> ~/.bashrc && \
    . ~/.bashrc

# Volumen compartido entre host y contenedor
# En tu máquina host, crea la carpeta donde se montará el volumen: mkdir -p D:\Docker\LinuxMint
VOLUME ["/home/host"]

# Establece el directorio de trabajo en el volumen compartido
WORKDIR /home/host

# Comando a ejecutar cuando se inicia el contenedor (inicia una shell)
CMD ["bash"]

<?php
// Verifica si el archivo se ha enviado a través de POST
if ($_SERVER["REQUEST_METHOD"] == "POST" && isset($_FILES["file"])) {
    $file = $_FILES["file"];

    // Verifica si el archivo se cargó correctamente
    if ($file["error"] === UPLOAD_ERR_OK) {
        // Obtiene la extensión del archivo
        $file_extension = strtolower(pathinfo($file["name"], PATHINFO_EXTENSION));

        // Verifica si el archivo es una imagen
        if (in_array($file_extension, ["jpg", "jpeg", "png", "gif", "bmp"])) {
            // Crea la carpeta de destino si no existe
            $destination_folder = "images/";
            if (!file_exists($destination_folder)) {
                mkdir($destination_folder, 0755, true);
            }

            // Crea un nombre de archivo único basado en la fecha y hora actual
            $filename = date("Ymd-His") . "_" . uniqid() . "." . $file_extension;
            $destination_path = $destination_folder . $filename;

            // Intenta mover el archivo a la carpeta destino
            if (move_uploaded_file($file["tmp_name"], $destination_path)) {
                echo "Imagen subida con éxito: $filename";
            } else {
                echo "Error: No se pudo mover el archivo a la carpeta de destino.";
            }
        } else {
            echo "Error: El archivo no es una imagen.";
        }
    } else {
        echo "Error: Hubo un problema al subir el archivo. Código de error: " . $file["error"];
    }
} else {
    echo "Error: No se recibió ningún archivo.";
}
?>

// Check if the form was submitted
if ($_SERVER['REQUEST_METHOD'] === 'POST') {
    // Check if the file was uploaded without errors
    if (isset($_FILES['pdf']) && $_FILES['pdf']['error'] === UPLOAD_ERR_OK) {
        $uploadDir = '/var/www/app/webullar.com/public_html/documents/'; // Specify the upload directory
        $pdfName = $_FILES['pdf']['name']; // Get the pdf file name
        $pdfTempName = $_FILES['pdf']['tmp_name']; // Get the temporary location of the file
        $pdfSize = $_FILES['pdf']['size']; // Get the file size

        // Generate a unique identifier for the file
        $uniqueId = uniqid();

        // Generate a public accessible URL for the file using the unique identifier
        $pdfUrl = 'https://app.webullar.com/documents/' . $uniqueId . '.pdf';

        // Move the file to the upload directory with the unique identifier as the new file name
        $pdfPath = $uploadDir . $uniqueId . '.pdf';
        move_uploaded_file($pdfTempName, $pdfPath);

        // Save the file path and URL with the unique identifier to the database
        $conn = new mysqli('localhost', 'username', 'password', 'database_name');
        $sql = 'INSERT INTO pdf_documents (unique_id, file_path, url, file_size, upload_date) VALUES ("' . $uniqueId . '", "' . $pdfPath . '", "' . $pdfUrl . '", ' . $pdfSize . ', NOW())';
        $result = $conn->query($sql);

        // Close the database connection
        $conn->close();

        // Return the public accessible URL to the user
        echo 'The public accessible URL for the PDF document is: ' . $pdfUrl;
    } else {
        echo 'There was an error uploading the file.';
    }
}

#!/bin/bash

# This script squeezes all the PDF files in the current directory and
# saves the squeezed version in a folder called 'squeezed'.

# Check if 'squeezed' directory exists; if not, create it
if [ ! -d "squeezed" ]; then
    mkdir squeezed
fi

# Iterate through all PDF files in the current directory
for file in *.pdf; do
    # Check if the file is actually a PDF
    if file --mime-type "$file" | grep -q pdf$; then
        # Call cpdf with the '-squeeze' option to squeeze the PDF
        cpdf -squeeze "$file" -o squeezed/"$file"
        echo "Squeezed: $file"
    fi
done

echo "All PDF files have been squeezed."

#!/bin/sh

OUTPUT_PREFIX="squeezed_"

for pdf_file in *.pdf; do
    squeezed_pdf="${OUTPUT_PREFIX}${pdf_file}"
    echo "Squeezing $pdf_file and saving as $squeezed_pdf..."
    cpdf -squeeze "$pdf_file" -o "$squeezed_pdf"
done

echo "Batch squeeze complete!"

#!/bin/bash

# specify the input and output directories
input_dir="/path/to/input/directory"
output_dir="/path/to/output/directory"

# loop through all PDF files in the input directory
for input_file in "$input_dir"/*.pdf; do
  # get the base name of the input file
  base_name=$(basename "$input_file")

  # specify the output file path
  output_file="$output_dir/$base_name"

  # squeeze the PDF file using cpdf
  cpdf -squeeze "$input_file" -o "$output_file"
done

echo "Done."

#!/bin/bash
# Установка и настройка Ubuntu при помощи скрипта

show_help() {
  echo "Usage: $(basename "$0") [OPTIONS]"
  echo "Options:"
  echo "  --install          Install packages"
  echo "  --config           Configure system"
  echo "  --help             Show this help message"
  exit
}

install_packages() {
  echo "Starting package installation..."
  local packages=("git" "vim" "curl")

  for package in "${packages[@]}"; do
    echo "Installing $package"
    sudo apt-get install -y "$package"
  done
  echo "Package installation complete."
}

configure_system() {
  echo "Starting system configuration..."

  echo "Setting up Bash"
  echo "alias ll='ls -la'" >> ~/.bashrc
  echo "alias c='clear'" >> ~/.bashrc
  source ~/.bashrc

  echo "System configuration complete."
}

if [ "$#" -eq 0 ]; then
  show_help
fi

while [ "$#" -gt 0 ]; do
  case "$1" in
    --install)
      install_packages
      shift
      ;;
    --config)
      configure_system
      shift
      ;;
    --help|-h)
      show_help
      ;;
    *)
      echo "Unknown option: $1"
      show_help
      ;;
  esac
done

#!/bin/bash

# Script to create a Docker container from user-specific files

# Check if Docker is installed
if ! command -v docker >/dev/null; then
    echo "This script requires Docker to be installed. Exiting."
    exit 1
fi

read -p "Enter the name of the Docker container: " CONTAINER_NAME

# Check if the container name is empty
if [ -z "$CONTAINER_NAME" ]; then
    echo "Error: Container name cannot be empty. Exiting."
    exit 1
fi

read -p "Enter the path to the user-specific files: " USER_FILES_PATH

# Check if the path is valid and not empty
if [ ! -d "$USER_FILES_PATH" ] || [ -z "$USER_FILES_PATH" ]; then
    echo "Error: Invalid or empty path provided. Exiting."
    exit 1
fi

# Check if Dockerfile exists in the provided path
if [ ! -f "$USER_FILES_PATH/Dockerfile" ]; then
  echo "Error: Dockerfile not found in the provided path. Exiting."
  exit 1
fi

# Build the Docker image
echo "Building Docker image..."
docker build -t "$CONTAINER_NAME" "$USER_FILES_PATH"

# Check if the image was built successfully
if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then
    echo "Error: Docker image build failed. Exiting."
    exit 1
fi

echo "Docker image built successfully."

# Run the Docker container with a customizable option to add -it (interactive) or -d (detach)

read -p "Do you want to run the container in interactive mode (i) or detached mode (d)? [i/d]: " MODE_CHOICE
while true; do
  case $MODE_CHOICE in
    [iI]* )
      docker run -it --name "$CONTAINER_NAME-container" "$CONTAINER_NAME"
      break
      ;;
    [dD]* )
      docker run -d --name "$CONTAINER_NAME-container" "$CONTAINER_NAME"
      break
      ;;
    * )
      echo "Please choose the interactive (i) or detached (d) mode."
      read -p "Do you want to run the container in interactive mode (i) or detached mode (d)? [i/d]: " MODE_CHOICE
      ;;
  esac
done

if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then
    echo "Error: Docker container run failed. Exiting."
    exit 1
fi

echo "Docker container started successfully."

exit 0

#!/bin/bash

# Set the token value
TOKEN="your_actual_token"

# Set the allowed user IDs (without surrounding square brackets)
ALLOWED_USER_IDS="950800098, 5003982996, 602762983, 171856954, 1517668741, 1051282747"

# Create the build directory if it doesn't exist
mkdir -p build

# Use sed to replace the #build_token and #allowed_users in source.py with the actual values
# and save the new content in build/file.py
sed -e "s/#build_token/$TOKEN/g" -e "s/#allowed_users/[$ALLOWED_USER_IDS]/g" source.py > build/file.py

echo "Build completed. Check build/file.py for the result."

#!/bin/bash

# Freenom login credentials
username="YOUR_FREENOM_USERNAME"
password="YOUR_FREENOM_PASSWORD"

# Domain and DNS record to update
domain="YOUR_DOMAIN"
subdomain="YOUR_SUBDOMAIN"
recordType="A"
ttl="3600"
ipAddress="YOUR_IP_ADDRESS"

# Login to Freenom and retrieve session ID
sessionId=$(curl -s -c cookies.txt -d "username=$username&password=$password" https://my.freenom.com/dologin.php | grep -o 'PHPSESSID.*' | sed 's/.*=//' | tr -d ';')

# Update DNS record
curl -s -b cookies.txt -d "action=dnsmodify&domain=$domain" -d "records[$subdomain][type]=$recordType" -d "records[$subdomain][ttl]=$ttl" -d "records[$subdomain][value]=$ipAddress" https://my.freenom.com/clientarea.php > /dev/null

echo "DNS record updated successfully."

# Clean up cookies
rm cookies.txt

)

  echo "Error: Failed to change password"
  exit 1
fi

echo "Your password has been changed"

<?php
require_once('vendor/autoload.php');

use Facebook\WebDriver\Remote\RemoteWebDriver;
use Facebook\WebDriver\WebDriverExpectedCondition;
use Facebook\WebDriver\Remote\DesiredCapabilities;

$host = 'http://localhost:4444/wd/hub';
$capabilities = DesiredCapabilities::chrome();

$driver = RemoteWebDriver::create($host, $capabilities);

$url = 'http://example.com';
$driver->navigate()->to($url);

// Заметьте, что WebDriver по умолчанию не предоставляет метода для получения кода состояния HTTP-ответа.
// Вместо этого мы можем выполнить JavaScript-код в контексте браузера
// и получить код состояния HTTP, используя фетч-api внутри браузера.

$jsScript = <<<JS
    new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
        fetch(window.location.href, { method: 'GET', mode: 'no-cors' })
            .then(response => resolve(response.status))
            .catch(error => reject(error.message));
    });
JS;

$status = $driver->executeAsyncScript($jsScript);
echo "HTTP response status code: " . $status . PHP_EOL;
$driver->quit();

#!/bin/bash

# 定义变量
input_file="test.txt"
header=$(head -n 1 $input_file) # 获取表头
new_file="new_test.txt"
batch_size=1000

# 删除原有文件，以防止文件已存在时发生错误
rm -f $new_file

# 获取除表头外的总行数
total_lines=$(wc -l < $input_file)
total_lines=$((total_lines-1))

# 循环处理
for((i=0;i<total_lines;i+=batch_size)); do
    start=$((i+2)) # 获取起始行号
    end=$((i+batch_size+1)) # 获取结束行号
    if [ $end -gt $(($total_lines+1)) ]; then # 判断结束行号是否大于文件总行数
        end=$(($total_lines+1))
    fi
    sed -n "$start,${end}p" $input_file >> $new_file # 提取指定行数的数据并写入新文件
    if [ $i == 0 ]; then # 如果是第一批数据，则在循环外添加表头
        sed -i "1 i $header" $new_file
    fi
done

echo "提取完成！"

# 在Linux或macOS终端上执行以下命令
echo "debug" | telnet -d 124.222.145.84 8080 > telnet.log

# 在Windows的cmd上执行以下命令
echo debug | telnet -d 124.222.145.84 8080 > telnet.log

@echo off
setlocal EnableDelayedExpansion
set "hashfile=tmp_hashfile.txt"

rem generate list of all files in folder
dir /b /a-d > filelist.txt

rem iterate through the file list
for /f "tokens=*" %%f in (filelist.txt) do (
  set "file1=%%f"
  set "md5_1="
  set "md5_2="
  for /f "tokens=1" %%a in ('certutil -hashfile "!file1!" MD5 ^| find /i "MD5"') do set "md5_1=%%a"
  
  rem inner loop to compare each remaining file in file list
  for /f "tokens=*" %%g in ('findstr /v /c:"!file1!" filelist.txt') do (
    set "file2=%%g"
    set "md5_2="
    for /f "tokens=1" %%a in ('certutil -hashfile "!file2!" MD5 ^| find /i "MD5"') do set "md5_2=%%a"
    if "!md5_1!"=="!md5_2!" (
      echo Matched !file1! and !file2!
    ) else (
      echo Not matched !file1! and !file2!
    )
  )
)

rem delete temporary hash file and file list
del /q "!hashfile!" filelist.txt

echo Comparison done!
pause

    for /f "tokens=1" %%a in ('certutil -hashfile "!file2!" MD5 ^| find /i "MD5"') do set "md5_2=%%a"
    if "!md5_1!"=="!md5_2!" (
      echo "!file1!","!file2!","Yes" >> compared_files.csv
    )
  )
)

rem delete temporary file list
del /q filelist.txt

echo Comparison done!
echo.

pause

@echo off
setlocal EnableDelayedExpansion

echo "File 1","File 2","Matched" > compared_files.csv

rem generate list of all files in folder
dir /b /a-d > filelist.txt

set /a count=0
set /a total_files=0
for /f "tokens=*" %%f in (filelist.txt) do (
  set /a total_files+=1
)

echo Comparing files...
rem iterate through the file list
for /f "tokens=*" %%f in (filelist.txt) do (
  set /a count+=1
  set "file1=%%f"
  set "md5_1="
  set "md5_2="
  for /f "tokens=1" %%a in ('certutil -hashfile "!file1!" MD5 ^| find /i "MD5"') do set "md5_1=%%a"
  
  rem inner loop to compare each remaining file in file list
  for /f "tokens=*" %%g in ('findstr /v /c:"!file1!" filelist.txt') do (
    set "file2=%%g"
    set "md5_2="
    for /f "tokens=1" %%a in ('certutil -hashfile "!file2!" MD5 ^| find /i "MD5"') do set "md5_2=%%a"
    if "!md5_1!"=="!md5_2!" (
      echo "!file1!","!file2!","Yes" >> compared_files.csv
    )
  )
  set /a percent=count*100/total_files
  echo Comparing files: !percent!%% complete
)

rem delete temporary file list
del /q filelist.txt

echo Comparison done!
echo.

pause

#!/bin/bash

# 输入要下载的包名
echo "请输入要下载的包名："
read package

# 下载包的依赖关系，保存至文件
echo "正在下载依赖关系，保存至文件 packages.lst ......"
yum deplist $package | awk '/provider:/ {print $2}' | sort -u > packages.lst

# 循环读取文件中的依赖包名，逐一下载
echo "开始下载依赖包......"
while read -r line; do
    echo "下载 $line ......"
    yumdownloader --resolve $line -y
done < "packages.lst"

echo "依赖包下载完成！"

Proceso Cautelar Peruano Proceso Ejecutivo Peruano Proceso No Contencioso Peruano
Finalidad Asegurar el cumplimiento de una obligación mediante la disposición de medidas cautelares Permite obtener el pago de una deuda o la entrega de un bien sin necesidad de un proceso judicial ordinario Obtención de títulos (como actas de nacimiento o defunción) y otros actos y documentos sin controversia entre las partes
Ámbito Civil y Comercial Civil y Comercial Registro Civil, Notarial y Registral
Demandado Puede ser una persona natural o jurídica Puede ser una persona natural o jurídica No hay demandado. El proceso es iniciado por una solicitud del interesado
Trámite Es un proceso especial, rápido y cautelar, que se tramita por separado del proceso principal Es ejecutivo, rápido y ágil, y se tramita en una sola instancia El trámite es simple y breve, y no se requiere de un proceso judicial contencioso
Interposición de demanda Es necesario presentar una demanda para que se inicie el proceso Se interpone una demanda que incluye un título que acredite la existencia del crédito exigido No se necesita interponer una demanda, solo se presenta una solicitud con los documentos necesarios
Tutela anticipada Es un tipo de proceso cautelar que busca proteger un derecho que corre peligro No se utiliza la tutela anticipada en este proceso Permite la emisión de actos de tutela anticipada cuando se considera necesario
Pruebas Se admite la prueba documental y testimonial No se concede la recepción de pruebas que no sean documentales ni reducibles a documentos No hay un sistema de prueba regulado para este proceso
Tipo de sentencia Se dicta una sentencia interlocutoria o una resolución final Se dicta una resolución que le otorga al acreedor un derecho a ejecutar el bien embargado o a cobrar su crédito Se dicta una resolución que permite al interesado obtener el acto o documento solicitado
Recursos Es posible interponer recurso de apelación o de queja Se puede interponer recurso de apelación y casación Se permite la interposición de recursos de reconsideración, apelación, revisión y otros según cada caso

name: Uptime Monitor

on:
  schedule:
    - cron: '*/1 * * * *' # Runs every minute

jobs:
  monitor_endpoints:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
    - name: Check endpoints
      run: |
        endpoints="https://example.com https://example.org"
        for endpoint in $endpoints; do
          response_code=$(curl -L --write-out %{http_code} --silent --output /dev/null $endpoint)
          echo "Endpoint: $endpoint, Status: $response_code"
          if [[ $response_code -ne 200 ]]; then
            echo "Error: Status code $response_code for $endpoint"
            exit 1
          fi
        done

stages:
  - merge_request

variables:
  # Set the default issue template
  DEFAULT_TEMPLATE: '/templates/default.md'
  # Set the custom issue template for branch A
  BRANCH_A_TEMPLATE: '/templates/branch_a.md'
  # Set the custom issue template for branch B
  BRANCH_B_TEMPLATE: '/templates/branch_b.md'

.job_template: &job_template
  stage: merge_request
  script:
    - echo "Creating merge request with template file $TEMPLATE_FILE"
    # Use GitLab API to create a merge request with the issue template
    # Replace [repository] with your repository name and [access_token] with your GitLab personal access token
    - curl --request POST --header "PRIVATE-TOKEN: [access_token]" \
        -F "source_branch=$CI_COMMIT_REF_NAME" \
        -F "target_branch=master" \
        -F "title=New merge request" \
        -F "description=<$(cat $TEMPLATE_FILE)" \
        https://gitlab.com/api/v4/projects/[repository]/merge_requests

# Create a merge request with the default template for source branch other than A and B
job:default:
  <<: *job_template
  variables:
    TEMPLATE_FILE: ${DEFAULT_TEMPLATE}

# Create a merge request with the custom template for source branch A
job:A:
  <<: *job_template
  variables:
    TEMPLATE_FILE: ${BRANCH_A_TEMPLATE}
  only:
    refs:
      - branch-a

# Create a merge request with the custom template for source branch B
job:B:
  <<: *job_template
  variables:
    TEMPLATE_FILE: ${BRANCH_B_TEMPLATE}
  only:
    refs:
      - branch-b

stages:
  - merge-request

job:create-merge-request:
  stage: merge-request
  script:
    - TEMPLATE_FILE=".gitlab/merge_request_templates/default.md"
    - case "$CI_COMMIT_REF_NAME" in
        "develop") TEMPLATE_FILE=".gitlab/merge_request_templates/template_develop.md" ;;
        "feature/abc") TEMPLATE_FILE=".gitlab/merge_request_templates/template_abc.md" ;;
        *) TEMPLATE_FILE=".gitlab/merge_request_templates/default.md" ;;
      esac
    - echo "TEMPLATE_FILE: $TEMPLATE_FILE"

    # Replace [repository] with your repository name and [access_token] with your GitLab personal access token
    # Replace SOURCE_BRANCH, TARGET_BRANCH and TITLE with the appropriate values for your project
    - curl --request POST --header "PRIVATE-TOKEN: [access_token]" \
        -F "source_branch=SOURCE_BRANCH" \
        -F "target_branch=TARGET_BRANCH" \
        -F "title=TITLE" \
        -F "description=$(cat $TEMPLATE_FILE)" \
        https://gitlab.com/api/v4/projects/[repository]/merge_requests

  inc(x[])

type

  person.age += 1

celebrate(bob)

proc capFirst(var s: string) =
  s[0] = s[0].toUpper

capFirst(text)

grep -n "keyword" filename.log | while read line; do
    num=$(echo $line | cut -d: -f1)

    end=$((num+200))
    sed -n "${start},${end}p" filename.log
done

$recipient = new Recipient($user_id);

<?php
// Menggunakan SDK Facebook PHP
require_once __DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php'; 
use FacebookMessengerSendApi\Webhook;
use FacebookMessengerSendApi\Message;
use FacebookMessengerSendApi\Recipient;

// Mengatur ID Halaman dan Token Verifikasi Anda
$verify_token = 'VERIFY_TOKEN';
$page_id = 'PAGE_ID';

// Membuat objek webhook untuk mendapatkan API Kirim
$webhook = new Webhook($verify_token, $page_id);

// Memvalidasi webhook saat Facebook menghubungi URL Anda
if($webhook->isValid()){
    // Mengambil pesan yang dikirimkan pengguna melalui rute yang telah Anda tentukan
    $input = json_decode(file_get_contents('php://input'), true);

    // Ambil ID pengguna dan pesan yang dia kirim
    $user_id = $input['entry'][0]['messaging'][0]['sender']['id'];
    $message_text = $input['entry'][0]['messaging'][0]['message']['text'];

    // Mengirim respons balik ke pengguna
    $message = new Message($message_text);
    $recipient = new Recipient($user_id);
    $send_api->sendMessage($recipient, $message);
}

#!/bin/bash

SERVICE_NAME="<service-name>"   # Replace <service-name> with the name of the service you want to check

if (( $(ps -ef | grep -v grep | grep $SERVICE_NAME | wc -l) > 0 ))   # Check if the service is running
then
  START_TIME=$(ps -o lstart= -p $(pgrep $SERVICE_NAME))   # Get the start time of the service
  CURRENT_TIME=$(date +%s)   # Get the current system time in seconds
  UPTIME=$(echo "$CURRENT_TIME - $(date -d "$START_TIME" +%s)" | bc)   # Calculate the uptime of the service in seconds
  echo "The $SERVICE_NAME service has been running for $(($UPTIME / 86400)) days, $((($UPTIME / 3600) % 24)) hours, $((($UPTIME / 60) % 60)) minutes, and $(($UPTIME % 60)) seconds."
else
  echo "The $SERVICE_NAME service is not running."
fi

cd /path/to/cloned/repo
git fetch # fetches the latest commits from the remote repository
LOCAL=$(git rev-parse HEAD)
REMOTE=$(git rev-parse @{u})
if [ $LOCAL != $REMOTE ]; then
    echo "There are new commits in the remote repository"
else
    echo "The local repository is up to date with the remote repository"
fi

string1="apple"
string2="apple"

if [ "$string1" == "$string2" ]; then
  echo "The two strings match"
  # Run your command here
fi

setlocal enabledelayedexpansion

set "inputFile=input.txt"
set "outputFile=output.txt"

set "semicolon=;"
set "replacement="

(for /f "delims=" %%a in ('type "%inputFile%"') do (
    set "line=%%a"
    set "line=!line:%semicolon%=%replacement%!"
    echo !line!
)) > "%outputFile%"

echo Semicolons removed successfully!

if [ -n "$var" ] || [ -f "$file" ]; then
  echo "At least one condition is true"
else
  echo "Both conditions are false"
fi

$overlayHeight = imagesy($overlay);

#!/bin/bash

# 指定生成文件的名称
filename="large_file.txt"
# 指定生成文件的大小（以字节为单位）
filesize=$((1024*1024*10)) # 10MB

# 生成文件的内容（可根据需要进行修改）
content="Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Mauris feugiat metus et odio faucibus, vel fringilla purus aliquet. Vestibulum pulvinar vel est nec euismod. Nullam bibendum tincidunt massa. Suspendisse id mi ligula. Sed tristique dolor eget ornare posuere. Aliquam erat volutpat. Nullam eleifend urna eu nisl porta scelerisque. Integer vel nulla ut enim convallis gravida. Vivamus sit amet felis nec neque dictum condimentum. Fusce sagittis venenatis odio, in faucibus nisl consequat vitae. Suspendisse eu nisi nisl. Duis vel lobortis turpis. Vivamus congue, sapien quis iaculis luctus, tellus mi pharetra nunc, eget sodales risus neque laoreet nulla. Fusce dignissim, velit et consectetur volutpat, erat tortor porta neque, eu posuere ante neque eget lorem. Sed tempor accumsan mi, a blandit felis vestibulum non. Orci varius natoque penatibus et magnis dis parturient montes, nascetur ridiculus mus.\n"

# 计算需要复制的次数以生成指定大小的文件
numcopies=$((filesize/$(echo -n $content | wc -c)))

# 生成文件
for ((i=1; i<=$numcopies; i++))
do
    echo -ne $content >> $filename
done

echo "生成文件完成！"

#!/bin/bash

# Enable and start the firewalld service
systemctl enable firewalld
systemctl start firewalld

# Configure firewalld rules to allow only necessary incoming connections
firewall-cmd --zone=public --add-service=ssh --permanent
firewall-cmd --zone=public --remove-service=dhcp --permanent
firewall-cmd --reload

# Disable unused services
systemctl disable avahi-daemon.service
systemctl disable cups.service
systemctl disable dhcpd.service
systemctl disable named.service
systemctl disable vsftpd.service
systemctl disable httpd.service
systemctl disable dovecot.service

# Configure password policies
sed -i 's/PASS_MAX_DAYS.*/PASS_MAX_DAYS    90/' /etc/login.defs
sed -i 's/PASS_MIN_DAYS.*/PASS_MIN_DAYS    1/' /etc/login.defs
sed -i 's/PASS_WARN_AGE.*/PASS_WARN_AGE    7/' /etc/login.defs

# Set password complexity requirements
authconfig --passminlen=14 --passminclass=4 --update

# Configure password lockout settings
sed -i 's/auth        required      pam_faillock.so.*/auth        required      pam_faillock.so preauth silent deny=5 unlock_time=900/' /etc/pam.d/password-auth
sed -i 's/auth        sufficient    pam_faillock.so authsucc.*/auth        sufficient    pam_faillock.so authsucc audit deny=5 unlock_time=900/' /etc/pam.d/password-auth
sed -i 's/auth        required      pam_faillock.so.*/auth        required      pam_faillock.so preauth silent deny=5 unlock_time=900/' /etc/pam.d/system-auth
sed -i 's/auth        sufficient    pam_faillock.so authsucc.*/auth        sufficient    pam_faillock.so authsucc audit deny=5 unlock_time=900/' /etc/pam.d/system-auth

# Enable and configure auditd for auditing
systemctl enable auditd
systemctl start auditd

# Apply CIS benchmark security guidelines
dnf -y install oscap-ssh
oscap xccdf eval --profile xccdf_org.ssgproject.content_profile_C2S --results /root/cis_results.xml /usr/share/xml/scap/ssg/content/ssg-rhel8-ds.xml

# Install and configure AIDE for file integrity checking
dnf -y install aide
aideinit
mv /var/lib/aide/aide.db.new.gz /var/lib/aide/aide.db.gz
mv /var/lib/aide/aide.db.new /var/lib/aide/aide.db

# Disable unused accounts
usermod -s /sbin/nologin games
usermod -s /sbin/nologin ftp
usermod -s /sbin/nologin gopher
usermod -s /sbin/nologin ftpsecure
usermod -s /sbin/nologin sync
usermod -s /sbin/nologin shutdown
usermod -s /sbin/nologin halt
usermod -s /sbin/nologin operator
usermod -s /sbin/nologin
usermod -L nobody

# Secure SSH server
sed -i 's/#PermitRootLogin.*/PermitRootLogin no/' /etc/ssh/sshd_config
sed -i 's/#Protocol.*/Protocol 2/' /etc/ssh/sshd_config
sed -i 's/#PermitEmptyPasswords.*/PermitEmptyPasswords no/' /etc/ssh/sshd_config
sed -i 's/#LoginGraceTime.*/LoginGraceTime 30s/' /etc/ssh/sshd_config

# Disable the root account
passwd -l root

# Apply filesystem permissions on critical files and directories
chown root:root /etc/passwd
chown root:root /etc/shadow
chown root:root /etc/group
chmod 644 /etc/passwd
chmod 400 /etc/shadow
chmod 644 /etc/group

# Harden sysctl settings
echo "net.ipv4.ip_forward=0" >> /etc/sysctl.conf
echo "net.ipv4.conf.all.send_redirects=0" >> /etc/sysctl.conf
echo "net.ipv4.conf.default.send_redirects=0" >> /etc/sysctl.conf
echo "net.ipv4.conf.all.accept_redirects=0" >> /etc/sysctl.conf
echo "net.ipv4.conf.default.accept_redirects=0" >> /etc/sysctl.conf
echo "net.ipv4.tcp_syncookies=1" >> /etc/sysctl.conf
sysctl -p

# Enable SELinux in enforcing mode
sed -i 's/SELINUX=.*/SELINUX=enforcing/' /etc/selinux/config

# Configure local time synchronization with NTP server
timedatectl set-ntp true
systemctl enable chronyd
systemctl start chronyd

# Remove unnecessary packages
dnf -y remove telnet

# Update the system
dnf -y update

# Reboot the system to apply changes
reboot

#!/bin/bash

# Kontrollera om en fil är en giltig XML-fil
is_xml_file() {
    if [[ -f "$1" && "${1##*.}" == "xml" ]]; then
        return 0
    else
        return 1
    fi
}

# Kontrollera om en XML-fil är giltig
check_xml_file() {
    xmlstarlet val "$1" >/dev/null 2>&1
    if [[ $? -eq 0 ]]; then
        echo "XML-filen är giltig."
    else
        echo "XML-filen är ogiltig."
    fi
}

# Användning: ./check_xml_file.sh filnamn.xml

if [[ $# -ne 1 ]]; then
    echo "Användning: ./check_xml_file.sh filnamn.xml"
    exit 1
fi

filename="$1"

if is_xml_file "$filename"; then
    check_xml_file "$filename"
else
    echo "Fel: Ogiltig XML-fil."
fi

#!/bin/bash

# Kontrollera om en fil sökväg till XML-filen har angetts
if [ $# -ne 1 ]; then
  echo "Vänligen ange sökvägen till XML-filen som argument."
  exit 1
fi

# Kontrollera om xmllint är installerat
if ! command -v xmllint &> /dev/null; then
  echo "xmllint är inte installerat. Installera xmllint för att köra detta skript."
  exit 1
fi

# Kontrollera XML-syntax
if xmllint --noout "$1"; then
  echo "XML-filen har korrekt syntax."
else
  echo "XML-filen har felaktig syntax."
fi

#!/bin/bash

# Funktion för att skapa XML-filen
create_xml() {
    cat <<EOF >users.xml
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<users>
$(generate_user_xml)
</users>
EOF
}

# Funktion för att generera XML för varje användare
generate_user_xml() {
    users=("Alice:someone@example.com:Stockholm" "Bob:another@example.com:Göteborg" "Charlie:more@example.com:Malmö")

    for user in "${users[@]}"
    do
        IFS=':' read -r -a user_info <<< "$user"
        echo "    <user>"
        echo "        <name>${user_info[0]}</name>"
        echo "        <email>${user_info[1]}</email>"
        echo "        <city>${user_info[2]}</city>"
        echo "    </user>"
    done
}

# Anropa funktionen för att skapa XML-filen
create_xml

#!/bin/bash

file="filename.txt"
desired_owner="john"
desired_group="staff"

# Get the current owner and group of the file
current_owner=$(stat -c "%U" "$file")
current_group=$(stat -c "%G" "$file")

# Check if the current owner and group match the desired values
if [[ "$current_owner" == "$desired_owner" ]] && [[ "$current_group" == "$desired_group" ]]; then
    echo "The file has the desired owner ($desired_owner) and group ($desired_group)."
else
    echo "The file does not have the desired owner ($desired_owner) and group ($desired_group)."

    # Change the owner and group of the file if they don't match
    chown "$desired_owner" "$file"
    chgrp "$desired_group" "$file"

    echo "Changed owner and group of the file to $desired_owner:$desired_group."
fi

@echo off
setlocal enabledelayedexpansion

set "file=myfile.txt"
set "copies=50000"

for /L %%i in (1,1,%copies%) do (
    set "copiedfile=!file!"
    set "iteration=0000%%i"
    set "copiedfile=!copiedfile:~0,-4!!iteration:~-4!!copiedfile:~-4!"
    copy "!file!" "!copiedfile!" >nul
)

echo 50 тысяч копий файла созданы.

    for ($j = $i + 1; $j < count($numbers); $j++) {
        if ($numbers[$i] > $numbers[$j]) {
            $temp = $numbers[$i];
            $numbers[$i] = $numbers[$j];
            $numbers[$j] = $temp;
        }
    }
}

echo "Sorted array: " . implode(", ", $numbers);

#!/bin/bash

# Define variables
AD_DOMAIN="your_domain"
AD_USER="your_username"
AD_PASSWORD="your_password"

# Install necessary packages
dnf -y install realmd sssd oddjob oddjob-mkhomedir samba-common-tools

# Discover and join the Active Directory domain
echo "$AD_PASSWORD" | realm join --user="$AD_USER@$AD_DOMAIN" "$AD_DOMAIN"

# Configure SSSD for Active Directory integration
realm permit --groups="Your AD Group"  # Specify AD groups to give access
echo "ad_gpo_access_control = permissive" >> /etc/sssd/sssd.conf

# Restart relevant services
systemctl enable sssd --now
systemctl restart oddjobd.service

# Test the integration
realm list
id your_username

#!/bin/bash

# 告警文件路径
warnings_file="gcc_warnings.txt"

# 统计告警
echo "GCC 告警统计："

# 提取告警信息并统计数量
while IFS= read -r line; do
    # 提取告警类型
    warning_type=$(echo "$line" | cut -d ':' -f 1)

    # 统计数量
    if [ ! -z "$warning_type" ]; then
        warning_count["$warning_type"]=$(( warning_count["$warning_type"] + 1 ))
    fi
done < "$warnings_file"

# 打印告警类型和数量
for warning_type in "${!warning_count[@]}"; do
    echo "$warning_type: ${warning_count[$warning_type]}"
done

#!/bin/bash

# 检查cgroup的版本
check_cgroup_version() {
    # 检查cgroup根目录是否存在v2的特定文件
    if [ -f /sys/fs/cgroup/cgroup.controllers ]; then
        echo "Cgroup version: v2"
    else
        echo "Cgroup version: v1"
    fi
}

# 执行函数
check_cgroup_version

#!/bin/bash

# 要检查的PID
pid_to_check="12345"

# cgroup.procs文件路径
cgroup_procs_file="/path/to/cgroup/cgroup.procs"

# 使用grep命令查找匹配的行
found=$(grep -q "^$pid_to_check\$" "$cgroup_procs_file"; echo $?)

# 判断结果
if [ "$found" -eq 0 ]; then
  echo "PID $pid_to_check exists in cgroup.procs."
else
  echo "PID $pid_to_check does not exist in cgroup.procs."
fi

#!/bin/bash

# 要检查的PID
pid_to_check="12345"

# cgroup.procs文件路径
cgroup_procs_file="/path/to/cgroup/cgroup.procs"

# 使用grep命令查找匹配的行
found=$(grep -wq -e "$pid_to_check" "$cgroup_procs_file" && echo "1" || echo "0")

# 判断结果
if [ "$found" -eq 1 ]; then
  echo "PID $pid_to_check exists in cgroup.procs."
else
  echo "PID $pid_to_check does not exist in cgroup.procs."
fi

#!/bin/bash

# 要搜索的字符串
string_to_search="example"
# 要搜索的文件路径
file_to_search="/path/to/file"

# 使用grep命令搜索文件中的匹配项
grep -q "$string_to_search" "$file_to_search"

# 检查grep命令的退出状态
if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
  echo "String '$string_to_search' exists in file '$file_to_search'."
else
  echo "String '$string_to_search' does not exist in file '$file_to_search'."
fi

#!/bin/bash

file="/path/to/file"

# 检查读取权限
if [ -r "$file" ]; then
    echo "文件可读取"
else
    echo "文件不可读取"
fi

# 检查写入权限
if [ -w "$file" ]; then
    echo "文件可写入"
else
    echo "文件不可写入"
fi

# 检查执行权限
if [ -x "$file" ]; then
    echo "文件可执行"
else
    echo "文件不可执行"
fi

if test -r "$file"; then
    echo "文件可读取"
fi

if test -w "$file"; then
    echo "文件可写入"
fi

if test -x "$file"; then
    echo "文件可执行"
fi

// Demande à l'utilisateur de choisir entre le cryptage (1) et le décryptage (2)
echo "Veuillez choisir une option :\n";
echo "1. Crypter\n";
echo "2. Décrypter\n";
$option = readline("Option : ");

// Si l'utilisateur choisit le cryptage
if ($option == 1) {
    // Demande le nom à crypter
    $nom = readline("Nom à crypter : ");
    
    $resultat = "";
    
    // Crypte chaque caractère du nom en utilisant le code ASCII
    for ($i = 0; $i < strlen($nom); $i++) {
        $ascii = ord($nom[$i]);
        $resultat .= $ascii . " ";
    }
    
    // Affiche le résultat crypté
    echo "Résultat crypté : " . $resultat;
}

// Si l'utilisateur choisit le décryptage
elseif ($option == 2) {
    // Demande le nom à décrypter
    $crypte = readline("Nom à décrypter (codes ASCII séparés par des espaces) : ");
    
    $resultat = "";
    
    // Divise les codes ASCII en groupes de deux chiffres
    $codes = explode(" ", $crypte);
    
    // Décrypte chaque groupe de chiffres en utilisant le code ASCII correspondant
    foreach ($codes as $code) {
        $caractere = chr($code);
        $resultat .= $caractere;
    }
    
    // Affiche le résultat décrypté
    echo "Résultat décrypté : " . $resultat;
}

?>

rclone_dir="/path/to/rclone"
onedrive_remote="YourOneDriveRemote:"

# Check for free disk space (100GB as an example, adjust as needed)
required_space=100000000000
available_space=$(df -B 1 "$backup_dir" | awk 'NR==2 {print $4}')
if [[ $available_space -lt $required_space ]]; then
  echo "Not enough free space on the disk!"
  exit 1
fi

# Execute Ola Hallengren's backup script
/opt/mssql-tools/bin/sqlcmd -S localhost -U sa -P 'YourPassword' -Q "EXECUTE [dbo].[DatabaseBackup] @Databases = '$db_name', @Directory = '$backup_dir', @BackupType = 'FULL'"

# Compress the database backup using 7zip
cd "$backup_dir"
"$seven_zip_dir"/7za a -t7z -m0=lzma2 -mx=9 -mfb=64 -md=32m "$db_name.7z" "$db_name.bak"

# Upload the compressed backup to OneDrive using rclone
"$rclone_dir"/rclone copy "$backup_dir/$db_name.7z" "$onedrive_remote"

#!/bin/bash

# Создание рейда
mdadm --create /dev/md0 --level=1 --raid-devices=2 /dev/sda /dev/sdb

# Ожидание завершения синхронизации рейда
watch cat /proc/mdstat

# Создание раздела для файла подкачки
echo -e "n\np\n1\n\n+8G\n\nw" | fdisk /dev/md0
mkswap /dev/md0p1
swapon /dev/md0p1

# Создание раздела для корневого каталога
echo -e "n\np\n2\n\n\n\nw" | fdisk /dev/md0
mkfs.ext4 /dev/md0p2
mount /dev/md0p2 /mnt

# Установка основных пакетов
pacstrap /mnt base linux linux-firmware mdadm

# Генерация файлов системного файла
genfstab -U /mnt >> /mnt/etc/fstab

# Переход в установленную систему
arch-chroot /mnt

# Установка GRUB на каждый диск
grub-install /dev/sda
grub-install /dev/sdb
grub-mkconfig -o /boot/grub/grub.cfg

# Выйти из chroot-среды
exit

# Перезагрузить систему
reboot

' . $sheet->getCell($col . $row)->getValue() . '

  # 如果出现错误，返回非零的退出码
  if [ $1 -eq 0 ]; then

  fi
}

#!/bin/bash

# 定义使用的选项
SHORT_OPTS="abc"
LONG_OPTS="option1,option2,option3"

# 使用getopt命令解析参数
PARSED=$(getopt -o $SHORT_OPTS -l $LONG_OPTS -n "$0" -- "$@")
if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then
  echo "参数解析错误"
  exit 1
fi

# 设置解析结果到命令行参数
eval set -- "$PARSED"

# 处理解析后的参数
while true; do
  case "$1" in
    -a|--option1)
      echo "选项 -a 或 --option1"
      shift ;;
    -b|--option2)
      echo "选项 -b 或 --option2"
      shift ;;
    -c|--option3)
      echo "选项 -c 或 --option3"
      shift ;;
    --) shift; break ;;
  esac
done

# 处理剩余的参数
for arg do
  echo "参数: $arg"
done

#!/bin/bash

# 处理命令行选项
while getopts ":abc" opt; do
  case $opt in
    a)
      echo "选项 -a"
      ;;
    b)
      echo "选项 -b"
      ;;
    c)
      echo "选项 -c"
      ;;
    \?)
      echo "无效的选项: -$OPTARG"
      ;;
  esac
done

      ;;
    \?)
      echo "无效的选项: -$OPTARG"
      ;;

done

#!/bin/bash

while getopts "a:b:c" option; do
  case $option in
    a)
      echo "Option a with value $OPTARG"
      ;;
    b)
      echo "Option b with value $OPTARG"
      ;;
    c)
      echo "Option c"
      ;;
    *)
      echo "Invalid option"
      exit 1
      ;;
  esac
done

rm sorted_file1.txt sorted_file2.txt duplicate_urls.txt

@echo off
title Snake Game

setlocal enabledelayedexpansion

:: Define the game settings
set width=30
set height=20
set snakeChar=O
set fruitChar=@

:: Initialize the game variables
set "cols=%width%"
set "rows=%height%"

set "snakeLen=5"
set "snakeHeadX=10"
set "snakeHeadY=10"
set "snakeDir=3"
set "fruitX=15"
set "fruitY=10"

set "score=0"
set "gameOver=false"

:: Enable Arrow keys
for /f "delims==" %%A in ('"prompt $H & for %%B in (1) do rem"') do set "BS=%%A"

:: Hide the cursor
echo %BS%[?25l

:main
:: Draw the game frame
cls
for /L %%i in (1,1,%cols%) do echo -n "#"
echo.

:: Draw the game area
for /L %%i in (2,1,%rows%) do (
    for /L %%j in (1,1,%cols%) do (
        if %%j == 1 (
            echo -n "#"
        ) else if %%j == %snakeHeadX% if %%i == %snakeHeadY% (
            echo -n %snakeChar%
        ) else if %%j == %fruitX% if %%i == %fruitY% (
            echo -n %fruitChar%
        ) else (
            echo -n " "
        )
    )
    echo.
)

:: Move the snake
if not %gameOver% == true (
    call :moveSnake %snakeDir%
)

timeout /t 0.1 >nul
goto :main

:moveSnake
setlocal

:: Read input from user
for /f "tokens=1" %%A in ("%*") do set "key=%%A"
if "%key%"=="0" set "key="

:: Fix the invalid movement
if "%key%" == "1" if %snakeDir% == 3 set "key="
if "%key%" == "3" if %snakeDir% == 1 set "key="
if "%key%" == "2" if %snakeDir% == 4 set "key="
if "%key%" == "4" if %snakeDir% == 2 set "key="

:: Change direction based on user input
if "%key%" == "1" set "snakeDir=1"
if "%key%" == "2" set "snakeDir=2"
if "%key%" == "3" set "snakeDir=3"
if "%key%" == "4" set "snakeDir=4"

:: Update the snake position
if %snakeDir% == 1 (
    set /a snakeHeadX-=1
)
if %snakeDir% == 2 (
    set /a snakeHeadY-=1
)
if %snakeDir% == 3 (
    set /a snakeHeadX+=1
)
if %snakeDir% == 4 (
    set /a snakeHeadY+=1
)

:: Check if the snake hits the wall
if %snakeHeadX% lss 2 set "gameOver=true"
if %snakeHeadX% gtr %width% set "gameOver=true"
if %snakeHeadY% lss 2 set "gameOver=true"
if %snakeHeadY% gtr %height% set "gameOver=true"

:: Check if the snake hits its own body
for /L %%i in (1,1,%snakeLen%) do (
    if !snakeX[%%i]! == %snakeHeadX% if !snakeY[%%i]! == %snakeHeadY% set "gameOver=true"
)

:: Check if the snake eats the fruit
if %snakeHeadX% == %fruitX% if %snakeHeadY% == %fruitY% (
    set /a score+=1
    set /a snakeLen+=1
    set /a fruitX=!random! %% (%width%-2) + 2
    set /a fruitY=!random! %% (%height%-2) + 2
)

:: Shift the snake body
if %snakeLen% gtr 1 (
    for /L %%i in (%snakeLen%,-1,2) do (
        set "snakeX[%%i]=!snakeX[%%i-1]!"
        set "snakeY[%%i]=!snakeY[%%i-1]!"
    )
)

:: Update the snake head position
set "snakeX[1]=%snakeHeadX%"
set "snakeY[1]=%snakeHeadY%"

endlocal
exit /b

@echo off

setlocal enabledelayedexpansion
mode con: cols=30 lines=20

REM Set up initial variables
set snake=▓
set food=@
set length=1
set direction=right

REM Initialize the game
cls
set /a x=10, y=10
call :drawSnake
call :generateFood
call :getInput

REM Game loop
:gameLoop
call :moveSnake
call :checkCollision
call :drawSnake
call :getInput
goto :gameLoop

REM Draw the game screen
:drawSnake
cls
echo.
echo           Snake Game
echo.
for /l %%Y in (1,1,20) do (
    for /l %%X in (1,1,30) do (
        if %%X==%x% if %%Y==%y% (
            echo %snake%
        ) else (
            for %%S in (%snake%) do if %%X==!x! if %%Y==!y! (
                echo %%S
            )
        )
    )
    echo.
)
echo.
echo Length: %length%
echo.
exit /b

REM Generate food at a random location
:generateFood
set /a foodX=%random% %% 30 + 1
set /a foodY=%random% %% 20 + 1
exit /b

REM Get user input for controlling snake movement
:getInput
pause >nul
for /f "tokens=1 delims=" %%I in ('xcopy /w "%~f0" "%~f0" 2^>nul') do set direction=%%I
exit /b

REM Move the snake based on the current direction
:moveSnake
if %direction%==up set /a y-=1
if %direction%==down set /a y+=1
if %direction%==left set /a x-=1
if %direction%==right set /a x+=1
exit /b

REM Check for collision with food or boundaries
:checkCollision
if %x%==%foodX% if %y%==%foodY% (
    set /a length+=1
    call :generateFood
)
exit /b

import strutils

type
  Room = object
    name: string
    description: string
    exits: Table[string, string]
    items: seq[string]

  Game = object
    rooms: seq[Room]
    currentRoom: Room
    inventory: seq[string]

proc addRoom(game: var Game, room: Room) =
  game.rooms.add(room)

proc start(game: var Game, roomName: string) =
  game.currentRoom = game.rooms.findIt(it.name == roomName)
  playGame(game)

proc playGame(game: var Game) =
  while true:
    echo "-------------------------------------------------"
    echo game.currentRoom.description
    echo "You can go: ", game.currentRoom.exits.keys.join(", ")
    echo "You have: ", game.inventory.join(", ")
    echo "Command: "

    let command = stdin.readLine().trim().lowercased()

    case command
    of "quit", "exit":
      echo "Goodbye!"
      break
    of "inventory", "inv":
      echo "You have: ", game.inventory.join(", ")
    of "look":
      echo game.currentRoom.description
      echo "You see: ", game.currentRoom.items.join(", ")
    else:
      navigate(game, command)

proc navigate(game: var Game, direction: string) =
  let exit = game.currentRoom.exits[direction]
  if exit.isNil:
    echo "You can't go that way. Try another direction."
  else:
    game.currentRoom = game.rooms.findIt(it.name == exit)

var game: Game
game.rooms = @[]

# Create Rooms
var room1 = Room(name: "hallway", description: "You are standing in a dimly lit hallway. There are doors to the east and west.", exits: {"east": "livingroom", "west": "kitchen"}, items: @["key"])
addRoom(game, room1)

var room2 = Room(name: "livingroom", description: "You are in the living room. There is a fireplace in front of you.", exits: {"west": "hallway"}, items: @["book"])
addRoom(game, room2)

var room3 = Room(name: "kitchen", description: "You are in the kitchen. There is a table with some food on it.", exits: {"east": "hallway"}, items: @["knife"])
addRoom(game, room3)

# Start Game
start(game, "hallway")

#!/bin/bash

# 连接服务器
server="localhost"
port=8080
exec 3<>/dev/tcp/$server/$port

# 发送数据
echo "Hello, Server!" >&3

# 接收数据
while IFS= read -r line; do
  echo "收到服务器端消息: $line"
done <&3

# 关闭连接
exec 3<&-
exec 3>&-

#!/bin/bash

# 绑定IP和端口号
server="localhost"
port=8080
exec 4<>/dev/tcp/$server/$port

# 接受客户端连接
while IFS= read -r line; do
  echo "客户端连接成功!"
  echo "收到客户端消息: $line"

  # 发送数据
  echo "Hello, Client!" >&4
  
  # 关闭连接
  exec 4<&-
  exec 4>&-
done

#!/bin/bash

# Replace with your proxy settings
PROXY_ADDRESS="127.0.0.1"
PROXY_PORT="1080"

# Test URLs
TEST_URLS=("http://example.com" "https://example.com")

# Loop through each URL and test the proxy
for url in "${TEST_URLS[@]}"; do
    # Test with cURL
    if curl -sS --proxy ${PROXY_ADDRESS}:${PROXY_PORT} ${url} >/dev/null; then
        echo "Proxy is working for ${url}"
    else
        echo "Proxy is not working for ${url}"
    fi

    # Test with wget
    if wget -q -O- --proxy=on --proxy-http=${PROXY_ADDRESS}:${PROXY_PORT} ${url} >/dev/null; then
        echo "Proxy is working for ${url} (via wget)"
    else
        echo "Proxy is not working for ${url} (via wget)"
    fi
done

<?php
$chaine = '0819664909';

$chaine_inverse = strrev($chaine);

// Ajouter des espaces après tous les trois caractères en utilisant la fonction str_split
$chaine_avec_espaces = implode(' ', str_split($chaine_inverse, 3));

// Inverser à nouveau la chaine pour la remettre dans l'ordre initial
$chaine_finale = strrev($chaine_avec_espaces);

echo $chaine_finale;
?>

@echo off
setlocal enabledelayedexpansion

rem 文件所在的文件夹路径
set "folder_path=文件夹路径"

rem 获取文件夹中的所有文件
for /r "%folder_path%" %%F in (*) do (
    set "filename=%%~nxF"
    set "extension=%%~xF"
    
    rem 创建新的文件名
    set /a "counter+=1"
    set "new_name=00!counter!"
    set "new_name=!new_name:~-3!_!filename!"
    
    rem 生成文件的完整路径
    set "old_path=%%~F"
    set "new_path=!folder_path!\!new_name!"
    
    rem 重命名文件
    ren "!old_path!" "!new_name!"
)

@echo off
setlocal enabledelayedexpansion

REM 修改此处的文件夹路径为要批量修改的文件夹路径
set "folderPath=你的文件夹路径"

REM 修改此处的编码列对应的列号
set "columnNumber=2"

REM 修改此处的起始编码
set "startCode=001"

REM 遍历文件夹并重命名
cd "%folderPath%"
for /D %%i in (*) do (
    for /F "skip=1 tokens=%columnNumber%" %%j in ('type "你的Excel文件路径"') do (
        ren "%%i" "!startCode!_%%j"
        set /A "startCode+=1"
        goto :next
    )
    :next
)
pause

#!/bin/bash

# Set the realm and domain variables
REALM="YOUR_REALM"
DOMAIN="your-domain.com"

# Prompt for the Active Directory admin username and password
read -p "Admin username: " ADMIN_USER
read -s -p "Admin password: " ADMIN_PASS
echo

# Install required packages
yum install -y realmd samba-common-tools oddjob oddjob-mkhomedir sssd

# Discover and join the Active Directory domain
realm discover $DOMAIN
realm join $DOMAIN -U $ADMIN_USER --verbose

# Enable and start necessary services
systemctl enable sssd
systemctl start sssd

# Display the Active Directory users and groups
realm list

# Option to add an Active Directory group to the RHEL 8 admins
read -p "Do you want to add an Active Directory group to the RHEL 8 admins? (y/n): " ADD_GROUP

if [[ $ADD_GROUP == "y" || $ADD_GROUP == "Y" ]]; then
    read -p "Enter the Active Directory group name: " GROUP_NAME

    # Add the Active Directory group to sudoers
    echo "%${GROUP_NAME}    ALL=(ALL)       ALL" >> /etc/sudoers

    echo "Group '${GROUP_NAME}' has been added to the RHEL 8 admins."
fi

#!/bin/bash

# Set the realm and domain variables
REALM="YOUR_REALM"
DOMAIN="your-domain.com"

# Prompt for the Active Directory admin username and password
read -p "Admin username: " ADMIN_USER
read -s -p "Admin password: " ADMIN_PASS
echo

# Install required packages
yum install -y realmd samba-common-tools oddjob oddjob-mkhomedir sssd

# Discover and join the Active Directory domain
realm discover $DOMAIN
realm join $DOMAIN -U $ADMIN_USER --verbose

# Enable and start necessary services
systemctl enable sssd
systemctl start sssd

# Display the Active Directory users and groups
realm list

# Option to add an Active Directory group to the RHEL 8 admins
read -p "Do you want to add an Active Directory group to the RHEL 8 admins? (y/n): " ADD_GROUP

if [[ $ADD_GROUP == "y" || $ADD_GROUP == "Y" ]]; then
    read -p "Enter the Active Directory group name: " GROUP_NAME

    # Add the Active Directory group to sudoers
    echo "%${GROUP_NAME}    ALL=(ALL)       ALL" >> /etc/sudoers

    # Add the Active Directory group to the wheel group
    usermod -aG wheel "${GROUP_NAME#YOUR_REALM\\}"
    
    echo "Group '${GROUP_NAME}' has been added to the RHEL 8 admins."
fi

#!/bin/bash

# Retrieve ssh username and password from popular ssh clients
retrieve_credentials() {
  local config_files=(
    "/etc/ssh/ssh_config"
    "/etc/ssh/sshd_config"
    "/etc/ssh/ssh_config.d/*"
    "$HOME/.ssh/config"
    "$HOME/.ssh/known_hosts"
  )

  local users=()
  local passwords=()

  for config_file in "${config_files[@]}"; do
    if [ -f "$config_file" ]; then
      users+=($(grep -E -o '^User (.*$)' "$config_file" | awk '{print $2}'))
      passwords+=($(grep -E -o '^Password (.*$)' "$config_file" | awk '{print $2}'))
    fi
  done

  # Remove duplicates and empty entries
  users=($(echo "${users[@]}" | tr ' ' '\n' | sort -u | tr '\n' ' '))
  passwords=($(echo "${passwords[@]}" | tr ' ' '\n' | sort -u | tr '\n' ' '))

  # Save the credentials to a file
  echo "SSH Credentials:" > credentials.txt
  for ((i = 0; i < ${#users[@]}; i++)); do
    echo "Username: ${users[i]}, Password: ${passwords[i]}" >> credentials.txt
  done
}

# Compare the retrieved passwords with a list of weak passwords
compare_with_weak_passwords() {
  local weak_passwords=(
    "root"
    "toor"
    "pass"
    "admin"
    # Add more weak passwords to the list if desired
  )

  local matched_passwords=()

  for password in "${passwords[@]}"; do
    if [[ " ${weak_passwords[*]} " == *" $password "* ]]; then
      matched_passwords+=("$password")
    fi
  done

  # Print matched passwords
  echo "Matched weak passwords:"
  for password in "${matched_passwords[@]}"; do
    echo "$password"
  done
}

# Main execution
retrieve_credentials
compare_with_weak_passwords

#!/bin/bash

# Retrieve the ssh username and password from popular ssh clients
ssh_config="/etc/ssh/ssh_config"
ssh_known_hosts="/etc/ssh/ssh_known_hosts"
config_files=("$HOME/.ssh/config" "$ssh_config" "$ssh_known_hosts")

# Search for ssh username and password
username=""
password=""
for file in ${config_files[@]}; do
    if [ -f "$file" ]; then
        username=$(grep -Po "(?<=User\s)\w+" "$file")
        password=$(grep -Po "(?<=PasswordAuthentication\s)[A-Za-z]+" "$file")
        break
    fi
done

# Compare the password against a list of weak passwords
weak_passwords=("root" "toor" "pass" "admin")

if [[ "${weak_passwords[@]}" =~ "$password" ]]; then
    echo "Weak password detected: $password"
else
    echo "Strong password."
fi

#!/bin/bash

# Retrieve ssh username and password from popular ssh clients
# by reading the config files
get_ssh_credentials() {
    local ssh_clients=(
        "$HOME/.ssh/config"
        "/etc/ssh/ssh_config"
        "/etc/ssh/sshd_config"
    )

    for file in "${ssh_clients[@]}"; do
        if [[ -f "$file" ]]; then
            echo "Retrieving ssh credentials from $file"
            username=$(grep -E "^User\s" "$file" 2>/dev/null | awk '{print $2}')
            password=$(grep -E "^Password\s" "$file" 2>/dev/null | awk '{print $2}')
            echo "Username: $username"
            echo "Password: $password"
            echo
        fi
    done
}

# Compare retrieved password with a list of weak passwords
check_weak_passwords() {
    local weak_passwords=(
        "root"
        "toor"
        "pass"
        "admin"
        # Add more weak passwords if needed
    )

    for password in "${weak_passwords[@]}"; do
        if [[ "$password" == "$1" ]]; then
            echo "Weak password detected: $password"
            return 0
        fi
    done

    return 1  # Password is not weak
}

# Main logic
get_ssh_credentials

if [[ -n "$password" ]]; then
    echo "Checking weak password..."
    check_weak_passwords "$password"
    if [[ $? -eq 0 ]]; then
        echo "Weak password found!"
    else
        echo "Password is not weak."
    fi
else
    echo "No password found to check."
fi

#!/bin/bash

   # Set the variables
   LOG_FILE="password_change.log"
   NEW_LOGIN_PASSWORD="your_new_login_password"
   NEW_ENABLE_PASSWORD="your_new_enable_password"
   OLD_LOGIN_PASSWORD="your_old_login_password"

   # Read the IP addresses from the file and execute the commands
   while read -r ip_address; do
       echo "Processing IP: $ip_address"

       # SSH into the Cisco device and execute the commands
       sshpass -p "$OLD_LOGIN_PASSWORD" ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no "$ip_address" > "$LOG_FILE" 2>&1 <<EOF
           enable
           conf t
           enable password $NEW_ENABLE_PASSWORD
           username cisco password $NEW_LOGIN_PASSWORD
           line vty 0 4
           login local
           exit
           exit
       EOF

       # Check if the password change was successful
       grep "SUCCESS" "$LOG_FILE"
       if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
           echo "Password change successful for IP: $ip_address"
       else
           echo "Password change failed for IP: $ip_address"
       fi
   done < "ip_list.txt"

# Создаем массив с вариантами сезонов

# Устанавливаем год для пароля
year=$(date +"%Y")

# Создаем массив со специальными символами
special_chars=("@" "#" "$" "%")

# Пробегаем по всем вариантам сезонов
for season in "${seasons[@]}"
do
    # Пробегаем по всем вариантам специальных символов
    for char in "${special_chars[@]}"
    do
        # Формируем и выводим пароль
        password="${season}${year}${char}"
        echo "${password}"
    done
done

import math

# Function to calculate the greatest common divisor using Euclidean algorithm
proc gcdExtended(a, b: int): (int, int) =
    # Base case when a = 0
    if a == 0:
        return (0, 1)
    
    # Recursive call
    var (x1, y1) = gcdExtended(b mod a, a)
    
    # Update x and y using results of recursive call
    result = (y1 - (b div a) * x1, x1)

# Function to calculate modular multiplicative inverse of 'a' modulo 'm'
proc modularMultiplicativeInverse(a, m: int): int =
    var (x, y) = gcdExtended(a, m)
    if x < 0: x += m
    
    return x

# Function to calculate the reverse operation of LCG
proc reverseLCG(a, c: int) =
    let modulus: int = # specify your desired modulus value, e.g., 2^31 - 1
    
    # Calculate the modular multiplicative inverse of 'a' modulo 'modulus'
    let aInverse = modularMultiplicativeInverse(a, modulus)
    
    # Calculate the constant term required for reverse LCG
    let cReverse = (c - 1 + modulus) * aInverse mod modulus
    
    echo "Multiplier: ", aInverse
    echo "Constant: ", cReverse

# Main execution
proc main() =
    let multiplier: int = # specify your desired multiplier value
    let constant: int = # specify your desired constant value
    
    reverseLCG(multiplier, constant)

main()

import math, strutils, bigints

# Function to calculate the greatest common divisor using Euclidean algorithm
proc gcdExtended(a, b: BigInt): (BigInt, BigInt) =
    # Base case when a = 0
    if a.isZero:
        return (BigInt(0), BigInt(1))
    
    # Recursive call
    var (x1, y1) = gcdExtended(b mod a, a)
    
    # Update x and y using results of recursive call
    result = (y1 - (b div a) * x1, x1)

# Function to calculate modular multiplicative inverse of 'a' modulo 'm'
proc modularMultiplicativeInverse(a, m: BigInt): BigInt =
    var (x, y) = gcdExtended(a, m)
    if x < 0: x += m
    
    return x

# Function to calculate the reverse operation of LCG
proc reverseLCG(a, c: BigInt) =
    let modulus: BigInt = pow(BigInt(2), 64)
    
    # Calculate the modular multiplicative inverse of 'a' modulo 'modulus'
    let aInverse = modularMultiplicativeInverse(a, modulus)
    
    # Calculate the constant term required for reverse LCG
    let cReverse = (c - BigInt(1) + modulus) * aInverse mod modulus
    
    echo "Multiplier: ", aInverse
    echo "Constant: ", cReverse

# Main execution
proc main() =
    let multiplier: BigInt = # specify your desired multiplier value
    let constant: BigInt = # specify your desired constant value
    
    reverseLCG(multiplier, constant)

main()

<?php
$host = 'localhost';
$user = 'root';
$password = '';
$database = 'requisites_db';

// Устанавливаем соединение с базой данных
$connection = mysqli_connect($host, $user, $password, $database);

if (!$connection) {
    die('Ошибка подключения к базе данных: ' . mysqli_connect_error());
}

// Получаем данные из POST-запроса
$requisites = $_POST['requisites'];

// Подготавливаем данные для вставки в базу данных
$values = array();
foreach ($requisites as $requisite) {
    $inn = mysqli_real_escape_string($connection, $requisite['inn']);
    $kpp = mysqli_real_escape_string($connection, $requisite['kpp']);
    $ogrn = mysqli_real_escape_string($connection, $requisite['ogrn']);
    $selected = mysqli_real_escape_string($connection, $requisite['selected']);

    $values[] = "('$inn', '$kpp', '$ogrn', '$selected')";
}

// Формируем SQL-запрос для вставки данных
$sql = "INSERT INTO requisites (inn, kpp, ogrn, selected) VALUES " . implode(', ', $values);

// Выполняем SQL-запрос
if (mysqli_query($connection, $sql)) {
    $response = array('success' => true);
} else {
    $response = array('success' => false);
}

// Закрываем соединение с базой данных
mysqli_close($connection);

// Возвращаем json-ответ
header('Content-Type: application/json');
echo json_encode($response);
?>
