package main

import (
	"bufio"
	"fmt"
	"math/rand"
	"os"
	"os/exec"
	"runtime"
	"strings"
	"time"
)

const (
	UpperCaseLetters = "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ"
	LowerCaseLetters = "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz"
	Digits           = "0123456789"
	SpecialChars     = "!@#$%^&*()_+-=<>?{}"
)

func clearScreen() {
	switch os := runtime.GOOS; os {
	case "windows":
		cmd := exec.Command("cmd", "/c", "cls")
		cmd.Stdout = os.Stdout
		cmd.Run()
	case "linux", "darwin":
		cmd := exec.Command("clear")
		cmd.Stdout = os.Stdout
		cmd.Run()
	}
}

func generatePassword(length int) string {
	// Zdefiniuj dostępne znaki dla hasła
	availableChars := UpperCaseLetters + LowerCaseLetters + Digits + SpecialChars

	// Inicjalizuj generator liczb pseudolosowych na podstawie aktualnego czasu
	rand.Seed(time.Now().UnixNano())

	// Twórz losowe hasło
	password := make([]byte, length)
	for i := 0; i < length; i++ {
		// Wybierz losowy znak z dostępnych
		index := rand.Intn(len(availableChars))
		password[i] = availableChars[index]
	}

	return string(password)
}

func displayHelp() {
	fmt.Println("===================================")
	fmt.Println("          PROFESJONALNY             ")
	fmt.Println("       GENERATOR HASEŁ              ")
	fmt.Println("===================================")
	fmt.Println()
	fmt.Println("Ten program generuje losowe hasła o zadanej długości.")
	fmt.Println()
	fmt.Println("Aby wygenerować hasło, podaj długość hasła i program automatycznie")
	fmt.Println("wygeneruje silne hasło, składające się z dużych liter, małych liter,")
	fmt.Println("cyfr oraz znaków specjalnych.")
	fmt.Println()
	fmt.Println("Po wygenerowaniu hasła, będziesz miał możliwość skopiowania go do schowka.")
	fmt.Println()
	fmt.Println("===================================")
	fmt.Println()
}

func main() {
	clearScreen()

	var choice string
	fmt.Println("Czy potrzebujesz pomocy? (tak/nie): ")
	fmt.Scan(&choice)
	fmt.Println()

	if strings.ToLower(choice) == "tak" {
		clearScreen()
		displayHelp()

		fmt.Print("Naciśnij Enter, aby kontynuować...")
		bufio.NewReader(os.Stdin).ReadBytes('\n')
	}

	clearScreen()
	fmt.Println("===================================")
	fmt.Println("      PROFESJONALNY GENERATOR       ")
	fmt.Println("              HASEŁ                 ")
	fmt.Println("===================================")
	fmt.Println()

	// Zapytaj użytkownika o długość hasła
	var length int
	fmt.Print("Podaj długość hasła: ")
	fmt.Scan(&length)

	// Wygeneruj i wyświetl hasło
	password := generatePassword(length)

	clearScreen()
	fmt.Println("===================================")
	fmt.Println("      PROFESJONALNY GENERATOR       ")
	fmt.Println("              HASEŁ                 ")
	fmt.Println("===================================")
	fmt.Println()
	fmt.Printf("Wygenerowane hasło: %s\n", password)
	fmt.Println()

	// Poproś użytkownika o skopiowanie hasła do schowka
	fmt.Print("Czy chcesz skopiować hasło do schowka? (tak/nie): ")
	var copyChoice string
	fmt.Scan(&copyChoice)

	if strings.ToLower(copyChoice) == "tak" {
		err := exec.Command("bash", "-c", fmt.Sprintf("echo '%s' | pbcopy", password)).Run()
		if err != nil {
			fmt.Println("Nie udało się skopiować hasła do schowka.")
		} else {
			fmt.Println("Hasło zostało skopiowane do schowka.")
		}
	}

	fmt.Println()
	fmt.Println("Dziękujemy za skorzystanie z profesjonalnego generatora haseł!")
}

#!/bin/sh

# Исходное значение переменной
value=1

while true
do
  # Если значение переменной равно 1, то установить значение 0
  if [ "$value" -eq 1 ]; then
    value=0
  # Если значение переменной равно 0, то установить значение 1
  else
    value=1
  fi

  echo $value
  sleep 1
done

@echo off
title Snake Game

rem تعيين الحدود وحجم الشاشة
mode con: cols=60 lines=20

rem تعيين اللون الافتراضي لخلفية الشاشة ونص الثعبان
color 0f

rem تعيين المتغيرات الأساسية
setlocal EnableDelayedExpansion
set snake=▄
set food=@

rem تعيين البداية
set "x=10"
set "y=10"
set "xfood=%random% %% 60"
set "yfood=%random% %% 20"
set "tail="
set "dir=right"

rem تعيين وضع اللعبة
set "running=true"

:gameLoop
rem رسم الشاشة
cls
rem رسم الأفعى
echo %snake%
rem رسم الغذاء
call :drawFood %xfood% %yfood%
rem إدخال الإتجاه
choice /c:wasd /n > nul /t 0.1
if %errorlevel% equ 1 set "dir=up"
if %errorlevel% equ 2 set "dir=left"
if %errorlevel% equ 3 set "dir=down"
if %errorlevel% equ 4 set "dir=right"
rem تحريك الأفعى
if %dir% equ up set /a y-=1
if %dir% equ left set /a x-=1
if %dir% equ down set /a y+=1
if %dir% equ right set /a x+=1
rem التحقق من التصادم
if %x% lss 0 set "running=false"
if %x% gtr 59 set "running=false"
if %y% lss 0 set "running=false"
if %y% gtr 19 set "running=false"
for %%t in (!tail!) do (
    if %x% equ !%%t! set "running=false"
    if %y% equ !%%t:~3! set "running=false"
)
rem إضافة جزء من الذيل
set "tail=%tail% %x%%y%"
rem التحقق من أكل الغذاء
if %x% equ %xfood% if %y% equ %yfood% (
    set /a "xfood=!random! %% 60"
    set /a "yfood=!random! %% 20"
) else (
    rem إزالة أقدام الذيل
    for /f "tokens=2*" %%t in ("%tail%") do set "tail= %%u"
)
if %running% equ false goto :end
goto :gameLoop

:end
echo Game over!
pause > nul
exit

:drawFood
rem رسم الغذاء في الموقع المحدد
for /l %%a in (0,1,%2) do (
    if %%a equ 0 (
        if %%a equ %1 (echo/%food%)
    ) else (
        echo/
        if %%a equ %1 (echo !spaces:~0,%1!!food!)
    )
)
exit /b

#!/bin/bash

# Задаем путь до директории, в которой будет происходить поиск
base_dir="/путь/до/основной/директории"

# Задаем путь до директории, в которую будут переноситься файлы
target_dir="/путь/к/целевой/директории"

# Итерируемся по всем директориям внутри базовой директории
for dir in "$base_dir"/*/; do
    # Проверяем наличие файла "all_merged.vdb" в текущей директории
    if [ -f "$dir/all_merged.vdb" ]; then
        # Извлекаем название директории
        dir_name=$(basename "$dir")

        # Переименовываем файл и добавляем название директории и суффикс "_merged.vdb"
        new_filename="${dir_name}_merged.vdb"

        # Переносим файл в целевую директорию с новым именем
        mv "$dir/all_merged.vdb" "$target_dir/$new_filename"

        echo "Файл успешно перенесен: $target_dir/$new_filename"
    fi
done

echo "Все файлы успешно обработаны."

ascii1=$(echo -e "$hex1" | xxd -r -p)
ascii2=$(echo -e "$hex2" | xxd -r -p)

# Replace hex fragments in the file
sed -i "s/$ascii1/$ascii2/g" "$file"

echo "Hex fragments replaced successfully."

#!/bin/bash

# Variables
BINARY_URL="https://example.com/your_program"
BINARY_FILE="/path/to/your_program"
STARTUP_CONFIG="/path/to/startup_config"

# Function to download the latest binary
download_binary() {
    # Download the latest binary
    curl -o "$BINARY_FILE" "$BINARY_URL"
    if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then
        echo "Failed to download the latest binary"
        exit 1
    fi
}

# Check if the current binary needs an update
check_for_update() {
    # Fetch the SHA256 hash of the latest binary from an endpoint
    remote_hash=$(curl -s "https://example.com/latest_version_hash")

    if [ -z "$remote_hash" ]; then
        echo "Failed to fetch the latest version hash"
        exit 1
    fi

    # Calculate the SHA256 hash of the current binary
    local_hash=$(sha256sum "$BINARY_FILE" | awk '{print $1}')

    # Compare the fetched hash with the local hash
    if [ "$remote_hash" != "$local_hash" ]; then
        echo "An update is available. Updating the binary..."
        download_binary
        install_binary
    else
        echo "No update available. Exiting..."
    fi
}

# Install the updated binary
install_binary() {
    # Stop the current running instance of the program, if it's running
    # You need to implement this part based on how you manage the program's lifecycle

    # Delete the old binary file
    rm "$BINARY_FILE"

    # Add the new binary to the startup configuration
    echo "exec $BINARY_FILE &" >> "$STARTUP_CONFIG"

    # Set proper permissions to the new binary (optional)
    chmod +x "$BINARY_FILE"

    # Launch the new binary as a background process
    nohup "$BINARY_FILE" &

    # Exit the script
    exit 0
}

# Main entry point
check_for_update

#!/bin/bash

# 要使用dd命令测试的存储设备路径
DEVICE=/dev/sdX

# 测试文件的大小（可以根据需要修改）
FILE_SIZE=1G

# 创建一个测试文件
dd if=/dev/urandom of=test_file bs=1M count=$FILE_SIZE

# 将测试文件写入存储设备
echo "开始写入测试..."
dd if=test_file of=$DEVICE bs=1M
sync # 等待数据写入完成

# 读回并比较写入的数据
echo "开始读回和比较写入的数据..."
dd if=$DEVICE of=write_test_file bs=1M
cmp test_file write_test_file
rm write_test_file

# 擦除存储设备
echo "开始擦除存储设备..."
dd if=/dev/zero of=$DEVICE bs=1M
sync # 等待擦除完成

# 清理生成的文件
rm test_file

echo "测试完成！"

#!/bin/bash

# Storage device path to test using dd command
DEVICE=/dev/sdX

# Size of the test file (can be modified as needed)
FILE_SIZE=1G

# Create a test file
echo "Creating test file..." > output.txt
dd if=/dev/urandom of=test_file bs=1M count=$FILE_SIZE >> output.txt
echo "Test file created" >> output.txt

# Write the test file to the storage device
echo "Starting write test..." >> output.txt
dd if=test_file of=$DEVICE bs=1M >> output.txt
sync # Wait for data write to complete
echo "Write test completed" >> output.txt

# Read back and compare the written data
echo "Starting read-back and compare test..." >> output.txt
dd if=$DEVICE of=write_test_file bs=1M >> output.txt
cmp test_file write_test_file >> output.txt
rm write_test_file
echo "Read-back and compare test completed" >> output.txt

# Erase the storage device
echo "Starting erase test..." >> output.txt
dd if=/dev/zero of=$DEVICE bs=1M >> output.txt
sync # Wait for erase to complete
echo "Erase completed" >> output.txt

# Clean up the generated files
rm test_file

echo "Testing completed!" >> output.txt

#!/bin/bash

# Set your DigitalOcean API token
API_TOKEN="your_digitalocean_api_token"

# Set your desired hostname, size, region, and image slug
HOSTNAME="example-webserver"
SIZE="s-1vcpu-1gb"
REGION="nyc1"
IMAGE="ubuntu-20-04-x64"

# Create Droplet
echo "Creating droplet..."
droplet_id=$(curl -X POST -H "Content-Type: application/json" -H "Authorization: Bearer $API_TOKEN" -d '{
  "name":"'$HOSTNAME'",
  "region":"'$REGION'",
  "size":"'$SIZE'",
  "image":"'$IMAGE'",
  "ssh_keys":null,
  "backups":false,
  "ipv6":true,
  "user_data":null,
  "private_networking":null,
  "volumes": null,
  "tags":["webserver"]
}' "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/droplets" | jq '.droplet.id')

if [ -z "$droplet_id" ]; then
  echo "Failed to create droplet"
  exit 1
fi

echo "Droplet created with ID: $droplet_id"

# Wait for Droplet creation to complete
droplet_ip=""
while [ -z "$droplet_ip" ]; do
  echo "Waiting for Droplet creation to complete..."
  sleep 5
  droplet_ip=$(curl -s -X GET -H "Content-Type: application/json" -H "Authorization: Bearer $API_TOKEN" "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/droplets/$droplet_id" | jq '.droplet.networks.v4[0].ip_address')
done

echo "Droplet IP address: $droplet_ip"

# SSH into Droplet and configure web server
echo "Configuring web server..."
ssh root@$droplet_ip 'apt update && apt install -y nginx'

echo "Web server configured successfully"

# Cleanup
echo "Cleaning up..."
unset droplet_id
unset droplet_ip

echo "Done"

if [ -f /path/to/file ]; then
    echo "文件存在"
else
    echo "文件不存在"
fi

ifstatus wan | grep "up" >/dev/null
if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
    echo "网线已插入WAN端口"
else
    echo "网线未插入WAN端口"
fi

ip link show wan | grep "state UP" >/dev/null
if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
    echo "网线已插入WAN端口"
else
    echo "网线未插入WAN端口"
fi

@echo off
setlocal

rem Get the current date and time
for /f "tokens=1-4 delims=/ " %%a in ('date /t') do (
    set "month=%%a"
    set "day=%%b"
    set "year=%%c"
)
for /f "tokens=1-4 delims=: " %%a in ('time /t') do (
    set "hour=%%a"
    set "minute=%%b"
    set "ampm=%%c"
)

rem Remove leading zeros from the hour and minute
if "%hour:~0,1%"=="0" set "hour=%hour:~1%"
if "%minute:~0,1%"=="0" set "minute=%minute:~1%"

rem Rename the file
set "filename=your_file_name.ext"
ren "%filename%" "%year%%month%%day%_%hour%%minute%_%ampm%_%filename%"

endlocal

echo "请选择一个数字："
for ((i=0; i<${#options[@]}; i++)); do
    echo "$(($i+1)). ${options[$i]}"
done

# 读取用户的选择
read choice

# 处理用户的选择
if [[ $choice =~ ^[1-4]$ ]]; then
    index=$(($choice-1))
    echo "您选择了${options[$index]}"
    echo "${actions[$index]}"
else
    echo "无效的选择"
fi

# Build Stage
FROM debian:bullseye-slim as builder

ARG NGINX_VERSION=1.22.1
ARG OPENSSL_VERSION=OpenSSL_1_1_1d
ARG OPENSSL_SHA256=a366e3b6d8269b5e563dabcdfe7366d15cb369517f05bfa66f6864c2a60e39e8
ARG GOST_ENGINE_VERSION=58a46b289d6b8df06072fc9c0304f4b2d3f4b051
ARG GOST_ENGINE_SHA256=6b47e24ee1ce619557c039fc0c1201500963f8f8dea83cad6d05d05b3dcc2255
ENV OPENSSL_DIR="/usr/local/src/openssl-${OPENSSL_VERSION}/.openssl"
ENV OPENSSL_CONF=/etc/ssl/openssl.cnf

RUN apt-get update \
  && apt-get install wget build-essential libpcre++-dev libz-dev ca-certificates unzip cmake --no-install-recommends -y \
  && mkdir -p /usr/local/src \
  && cd /usr/local/src \
  && wget "http://nginx.org/download/nginx-${NGINX_VERSION}.tar.gz" -O "nginx-${NGINX_VERSION}.tar.gz" \
  && tar -zxvf "nginx-${NGINX_VERSION}.tar.gz" \
  && wget "https://github.com/openssl/openssl/archive/${OPENSSL_VERSION}.zip" -O "${OPENSSL_VERSION}.zip" \
  && echo "$OPENSSL_SHA256" "${OPENSSL_VERSION}.zip" | sha256sum -c - \
  && unzip "${OPENSSL_VERSION}.zip" -d ./ \
  && cd "nginx-${NGINX_VERSION}" \
  && sed -i 's|--prefix=$ngx_prefix no-shared|--prefix=$ngx_prefix|' auto/lib/openssl/make \
  &&  ./configure \
  --prefix=/etc/nginx \
  --sbin-path=/usr/sbin/nginx \
  --modules-path=/usr/lib/nginx/modules \
  --conf-path=/etc/nginx/nginx.conf \
  --error-log-path=/var/log/nginx/error.log \
  --http-log-path=/var/log/nginx/access.log \
  --pid-path=/var/run/nginx.pid \
  --lock-path=/var/run/nginx.lock \
  --http-client-body-temp-path=/var/cache/nginx/client_temp \
  --http-proxy-temp-path=/var/cache/nginx/proxy_temp \
  --http-fastcgi-temp-path=/var/cache/nginx/fastcgi_temp \
  --http-uwsgi-temp-path=/var/cache/nginx/uwsgi_temp \
  --http-scgi-temp-path=/var/cache/nginx/scgi_temp \
  --user=www-data \
  --group=www-data \
  --with-compat \
  --with-file-aio \
  --with-threads \
  --with-http_addition_module \
  --with-http_auth_request_module \
  --with-http_dav_module \
  --with-http_flv_module \
  --with-http_gunzip_module \
  --with-http_gzip_static_module \
  --with-http_mp4_module \
  --with-http_random_index_module \
  --with-http_realip_module \
  --with-http_secure_link_module \
  --with-http_slice_module \
  --with-http_ssl_module \
  --with-http_stub_status_module \
  --with-http_sub_module \
  --with-http_v2_module \
  --with-mail \
  --with-mail_ssl_module \
  --with-stream \
  --with-stream_realip_module \
  --with-stream_ssl_module \
  --with-stream_ssl_preread_module \
  --with-openssl="/usr/local/src/openssl-${OPENSSL_VERSION}" \
  && make \
  && make install \
  && echo "/usr/local/src/openssl-${OPENSSL_VERSION}/.openssl/lib" >>/etc/ld.so.conf.d/ssl.conf && ldconfig \
  && cp "/usr/local/src/openssl-${OPENSSL_VERSION}/.openssl/bin/openssl" /usr/bin/openssl \
  && mkdir -p /var/cache/nginx/

RUN cd /usr/local/src \
  && wget "https://github.com/gost-engine/engine/archive/${GOST_ENGINE_VERSION}.zip" -O gost-engine.zip \
  && echo "$GOST_ENGINE_SHA256" gost-engine.zip | sha256sum -c - \
  && unzip gost-engine.zip -d ./ \
  && cd "engine-${GOST_ENGINE_VERSION}" \
  && sed -i 's|printf("GOST engine already loaded\\n");|goto end;|' gost_eng.c \
  && mkdir build \
  && cd build \
  && cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release \
   -DOPENSSL_ROOT_DIR="${OPENSSL_DIR}" \
   -DOPENSSL_INCLUDE_DIR="${OPENSSL_DIR}/include" \
   -DOPENSSL_LIBRARIES="${OPENSSL_DIR}/lib" .. \
   -DOPENSSL_ENGINES_DIR="${OPENSSL_DIR}/lib/engines-1.1" \
  && cmake --build . --config Release \
  && cmake --build . --target install --config Release \
  && cp ./bin/gost.so "${OPENSSL_DIR}/lib/engines-1.1" \
  && cp -r "${OPENSSL_DIR}/lib/engines-1.1" /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/ \
  && rm -rf "/usr/local/src/gost-engine.zip"

# Runtime Stage
FROM debian:bullseye-slim

ENV OPENSSL_DIR="/usr/local/src/openssl-${OPENSSL_VERSION}/.openssl"
ENV OPENSSL_CONF=/etc/ssl/openssl.cnf

RUN apt-get update \
  && apt-get install libpcre++-dev libz-dev ca-certificates -y --no-install-recommends \
  && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
  && mkdir -p /var/cache/nginx/ \
  && ln -sf /dev/stdout /var/log/nginx/access.log \
  && ln -sf /dev/stderr /var/log/nginx/error.log

COPY --from=builder /etc/nginx /etc/nginx
COPY --from=builder /usr/sbin/nginx /usr/sbin/nginx
COPY --from=builder /usr/lib/nginx/modules /usr/lib/nginx/modules
COPY --from=builder /usr/bin/openssl /usr/bin/openssl
COPY --from=builder /usr/local/src/openssl-${OPENSSL_VERSION}/.openssl/lib /usr/local/src/openssl-${OPENSSL_VERSION}/.openssl/lib
COPY --from=builder /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/engines-1.1 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/engines-1.1

RUN sed -i 's/openssl_conf = default_conf/openssl_conf = openssl_def/' "${OPENSSL_CONF}" \
  && echo "" >> "${OPENSSL_CONF}" \
  && echo "# OpenSSL default section" >> "${OPENSSL_CONF}" \
  && echo "[openssl_def]" >> "${OPENSSL_CONF}" \
  && echo "engines = engine_section" >> "${OPENSSL_CONF}" \
  && echo "" >> "${OPENSSL_CONF}" \
  && echo "# Engine scetion" >> "${OPENSSL_CONF}" \
  && echo "[engine_section]" >> "${OPENSSL_CONF}" \
  && echo "gost = gost_section" >> "${OPENSSL_CONF}" \
  && echo "" >> "${OPENSSL_CONF}" \
  && echo "# Engine gost section" >> "${OPENSSL_CONF}" \
  && echo "[gost_section]" >> "${OPENSSL_CONF}" \
  && echo "engine_id = gost" >> "${OPENSSL_CONF}" \
  && echo "dynamic_path = ${OPENSSL_DIR}/lib/engines-1.1/gost.so" >> "${OPENSSL_CONF}f" \
  && echo "default_algorithms = ALL" >> "${OPENSSL_CONF}"

EXPOSE 80

STOPSIGNAL SIGTERM

CMD ["nginx", "-g", "daemon off;"]

  echo Adresse MAC WiFi: %wifi_mac_address%
) > adresses_mac.txt

<?php
if ($_SERVER["REQUEST_METHOD"] == "POST") {
    $playerName = $_POST["playerName"];
    $password = $_POST["password"];
    $email = $_POST["email"];
    
    // Prepare and execute SQL statement to insert the player data into the database
    $stmt = $conn->prepare("INSERT INTO players (playerName, password, email) VALUES (?, ?, ?)");
    $stmt->bind_param("sss", $playerName, $password, $email);
    
    if ($stmt->execute()) {
        echo "Registration successful!";
    } else {
        echo "Error: " . $stmt->error;
    }
    $stmt->close();
}
$conn->close();
?>

#!/bin/bash

# Replace the following variables with your own values
API_TOKEN="YOUR_DIGITALOCEAN_API_TOKEN"
DOMAIN="yourdomain.com"
RECORD_NAME="subdomain"
RECORD_VALUE="example.com"

# Create the JSON payload
DATA="{\"type\":\"CNAME\",\"name\":\"$RECORD_NAME\",\"data\":\"$RECORD_VALUE\",\"ttl\":1800}"

# Send the API request to create the DNS record
response=$(curl -X POST "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/domains/$DOMAIN/records" \
     -H "Authorization: Bearer $API_TOKEN" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     -d "$DATA")

# Check the response status
if [ "$(echo "$response" | jq -r '.id')" != null ]; then
    echo "CNAME record created successfully."
else
    echo "Failed to create CNAME record."
    echo "Response: $response"
fi

#!/bin/bash

# Define your DigitalOcean API token and domain name
DO_API_TOKEN="your_digitalocean_api_token"
DOMAIN_NAME="example.com"

# Define the subdomain and the target domain for the CNAME record
SUBDOMAIN="subdomain"
TARGET_DOMAIN="example.digitalocean.com"

# Make the API request to add the DNS CNAME record
response=$(curl -X POST -H "Content-Type: application/json" -H "Authorization: Bearer $DO_API_TOKEN" -d "{\"type\":\"CNAME\",\"name\":\"$SUBDOMAIN\",\"data\":\"$TARGET_DOMAIN\"}" "https://api.digitalocean.com/v2/domains/$DOMAIN_NAME/records")

# Check if the API request was successful
if [[ $(echo $response | jq -r '.id') ]]; then
  echo "DNS CNAME record added successfully!"
else
  echo "Failed to add DNS CNAME record:"
  echo "$response"
fi

<?php
// Retrieve the user input value from the textarea
$userText = $_POST['user_text'];

// Create a connection to the MySQL database
$servername = "your_hostname";
$username = "your_username";
$password = "your_password";
$dbname = "your_database";
$conn = new mysqli($servername, $username, $password, $dbname);

// Check the connection
if ($conn->connect_error) {
    die("Connection failed: " . $conn->connect_error);
}

// Escape the user input to prevent SQL injection
$userText = $conn->real_escape_string($userText);

// Prepare and execute the query to update the database
$sql = "UPDATE your_table SET text_column = '$userText' WHERE id = 1";
if ($conn->query($sql) === true) {
    echo "Record updated successfully";
} else {
    echo "Error updating record: " . $conn->error;
}

// Close the database connection
$conn->close();
?>

#!/bin/bash

# Установка и запуск ckat
CKAT_VERSION=0.2.3
wget https://github.com/edenhill/ckaf/releases/download/v${CKAT_VERSION}/ckat-${CKAT_VERSION}-linux-amd64.tar.gz
tar -xzf ckat-${CKAT_VERSION}-linux-amd64.tar.gz
cd ckat-${CKAT_VERSION}-linux-amd64

# Установка переменных окружения
export SECURITY_PROTOCOL=SASL_PLAINTEXT
export SASL_MECHANISM=PLAIN
export SASL_USERNAME=
export SASL_PASSWORD=

# Проверка работоспособности Kafka с помощью ckat
OUTPUT=$(./ckat -L -b bootstrap-server:9092)

if [[ $OUTPUT =~ .*Metadata.* ]]; then
  echo "Список топиков есть"
else
  echo "Список топиков отсутствует"
fi

#!/bin/bash

# Установка и запуск ckat
CKAT_VERSION=0.2.3
wget https://github.com/edenhill/ckaf/releases/download/v${CKAT_VERSION}/ckat-${CKAT_VERSION}-linux-amd64.tar.gz
tar -xzf ckat-${CKAT_VERSION}-linux-amd64.tar.gz
cd ckat-${CKAT_VERSION}-linux-amd64

# Установка переменных окружения
export SECURITY_PROTOCOL=SASL_PLAINTEXT
export SASL_MECHANISM=PLAIN
export SASL_USERNAME=
export SASL_PASSWORD=

# Проверка работоспособности Kafka с помощью ckat
OUTPUT=$(./ckat -L -b bootstrap-server:9092 2>&1)

if echo "$OUTPUT" | grep -q "Metadata"; then
  echo "Список топиков есть"
else
  echo "Список топиков отсутствует"
fi

#!/bin/bash

# Проверка работоспособности Kafka с помощью kafkacat
kafkacat_cmd="kafkacat -L -b bootstrap-server:9092 -X security.protocol=SASL_PLAINTEXT -X sasl.mechanism=PLAIN -X sasl.username= -X sasl.password="

# Замените "bootstrap-server:9092" на адрес вашего bootstrap-сервера Kafka.
# Установите значения SASL_USERNAME и SASL_PASSWORD.

if $kafkacat_cmd >/dev/null 2>&1; then
  echo "Kafka работает и список топиков доступен"
else
  echo "Ошибка: Kafka недоступна или нет списка топиков"
fi

#!/bin/bash

# Устанавливаем IP-адрес и порт сервера RabbitMQ
rabbitmq_ip="IP_адрес_сервера_RabbitMQ"
rabbitmq_port="Порт_RabbitMQ"

# Устанавливаем название очереди для проверки
queue_name="Название_очереди"

# Проверяем доступность сервера RabbitMQ
if nc -zv "$rabbitmq_ip" "$rabbitmq_port"; then
  echo "Сервер RabbitMQ доступен"

  # Проверяем доступность очереди
  queue_exists=$(rabbitmqctl -q list_queues name | awk -v queue_name="$queue_name" '{ if ($NF == queue_name) print "yes"; }')

  if [ "$queue_exists" = "yes" ]; then
    echo "Очередь $queue_name существует"
  else
    echo "Очередь $queue_name не существует"
  fi
else
  echo "Сервер RabbitMQ недоступен"
fi

#!/bin/bash

source_server="source_server"
source_username="source_username"
source_directory="/path/to/source_directory"
destination_server="destination_server"
destination_username="destination_username"
destination_directory="/path/to/destination_directory"

# Get the current date in the format YYYY-MM-DD
current_date=$(date "+%Y-%m-%d")

# Create the source and destination directory paths for the current date
source_path="$source_directory/$current_date"
destination_path="$destination_directory/$current_date"

# Check if the source directory for the current date exists
ssh $source_username@$source_server "if [ -d $source_path ]; then echo 'exist'; fi" > /dev/null

if [[ $? -eq 0 ]]; then
    # Create the destination directory for the current date on the destination server
    ssh $destination_username@$destination_server "mkdir -p $destination_path"
    
    # Copy the files from the source directory to the destination directory
    scp -r $source_username@$source_server:$source_path/* $destination_username@$destination_server:$destination_path
    
    if [[ $? -eq 0 ]]; then
        echo "Files copied successfully."
    else
        echo "Failed to copy files."
    fi
else
    echo "Source directory not found for the current date."
fi

<?php
// Check if the user information file exists
if (file_exists('user_info.txt')) {
    // Read the content of the file
    $content = file_get_contents('user_info.txt');
    // Convert the content to an array
    $userInfo = json_decode($content, true);
} else {
    // Create an empty array for user information
    $userInfo = [];
}

// Check if the form is submitted
if ($_SERVER['REQUEST_METHOD'] === 'POST') {
    // Get the submitted form data
    $newUserName = $_POST['newUserName'];
    $newUserId = $_POST['newUserId'];
    $level = $_POST['levelSelect'];
    $level2 = $_POST['levelSelect2'];
    $level3 = $_POST['levelSelect3'];
    $level4 = $_POST['levelSelect4'];

    // Check if the user already exists in the user information
    if (array_key_exists($newUserId, $userInfo)) {
        // Get the existing user information
        $existingUserInfo = $userInfo[$newUserId];
        // Use the existing information for the new user
        $newUserName = $existingUserInfo['userName'];
        $level = $existingUserInfo['level'];
        $level2 = $existingUserInfo['level2'];
        $level3 = $existingUserInfo['level3'];
        $level4 = $existingUserInfo['level4'];
    } else {
        // Add the new user information to the array
        $userInfo[$newUserId] = [
            'userName' => $newUserName,
            'level' => $level,
            'level2' => $level2,
            'level3' => $level3,
            'level4' => $level4
        ];
        // Save the updated user information to the file
        file_put_contents('user_info.txt', json_encode($userInfo));
    }
}

#!/bin/bash

# Функция для нахождения суммы двух аргументов
get_sum() {
  sum=$(($1 + $2))
}

# Вызываем функцию и передаем ей значения двух аргументов
get_sum $1 $2

# Выводим результат сложения
echo "Сумма: $sum"

# Проверяем, больше ли результат нуля, меньше или равен нулю
if ((sum < 0)); then
  echo "Результат меньше нуля"
elif ((sum > 0)); then
  echo "Результат больше нуля"
else
  echo "Результат равен нулю"
fi

#!/bin/bash

# Function to check if a number is prime
is_prime() {
    local n=$1
    if [ $n -lt 2 ]; then
        return 1
    fi

    for ((i=2; i*i<=n; i++)); do
        if ((n%i == 0)); then
            return 1
        fi
    done

    return 0
}

# Get user input
read -p "Enter a number: " num

# Check if the input number is prime
is_prime $num
if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
    echo "$num is a prime number."
else
    echo "$num is not a prime number."
fi

#!/bin/bash

# Check outgoing connections to IP addresses
netstat -tnp | awk '/192.168.1.1:/{print $7}' | cut -d '/' -f 1 | uniq | sed 's/[^0-9]*//g' > /tmp/pid1.txt
netstat -tnp | awk '/192.168.1.2:/{print $7}' | cut -d '/' -f 1 | uniq | sed 's/[^0-9]*//g' > /tmp/pid2.txt

# Find process IDs
pid1=$(cat /tmp/pid1.txt)
pid2=$(cat /tmp/pid2.txt)

# Display the process IDs
echo "Process ID for IP 192.168.1.1: $pid1"
echo "Process ID for IP 192.168.1.2: $pid2"

# Cleanup temporary files
rm /tmp/pid1.txt
rm /tmp/pid2.txt

#!/bin/bash

start_time=$(date +%s)
timeout=1800  # 30 minutes timeout

while (( $(date +%s) - start_time < timeout )); do
    # Check outgoing connections to IP addresses
    netstat -tnp | awk '/192.168.1.1:/{print $7}' | cut -d '/' -f 1 | uniq | sed 's/[^0-9]*//g' > /tmp/pid1.txt
    netstat -tnp | awk '/192.168.1.2:/{print $7}' | cut -d '/' -f 1 | uniq | sed 's/[^0-9]*//g' > /tmp/pid2.txt

    # Find process IDs
    pid1=$(cat /tmp/pid1.txt)
    pid2=$(cat /tmp/pid2.txt)

    # Display the process IDs
    echo "Process ID for IP 192.168.1.1: $pid1"
    echo "Process ID for IP 192.168.1.2: $pid2"

    # Cleanup temporary files
    rm /tmp/pid1.txt
    rm /tmp/pid2.txt

    sleep 5  # Wait for 5 seconds before checking again
done

#!/bin/bash

start_time=$(date +%s)
timeout=1800  # 30 minutes timeout
output_file="outgoing_connection_log.txt"

while (( $(date +%s) - start_time < timeout )); do
    # Check outgoing connections to IP addresses
    netstat -tnp | awk '/192.168.1.1:/{print $7}' | cut -d '/' -f 1 | uniq | sed 's/[^0-9]*//g' >> "$output_file"
    netstat -tnp | awk '/192.168.1.2:/{print $7}' | cut -d '/' -f 1 | uniq | sed 's/[^0-9]*//g' >> "$output_file"

    # Find process IDs
    pid1=$(cat /tmp/pid1.txt)
    pid2=$(cat /tmp/pid2.txt)

    # Display the process IDs
    echo "Process ID for IP 192.168.1.1: $pid1" >> "$output_file"
    echo "Process ID for IP 192.168.1.2: $pid2" >> "$output_file"

    # Cleanup temporary files
    rm /tmp/pid1.txt
    rm /tmp/pid2.txt

    sleep 5  # Wait for 5 seconds before checking again
done

#!/bin/bash

# Set the directory path and log file extension
log_directory="/path/to/log/files"
log_extension=".log"

# Set the maximum number of log files to keep
max_log_files=10

# Rotate log files
cd "$log_directory"
if [ -f "latest$log_extension" ]; then
    mv "latest$log_extension" "$(date +'%Y%m%d%H%M%S')$log_extension"
fi

# Find and delete log files older than 2 days
find "$log_directory" -name "*$log_extension" -type f -mtime +2 -delete

# Remove excess log files if the maximum number is reached
log_count=$(ls -1 "$log_directory"/*$log_extension 2>/dev/null | wc -l)
if [ $log_count -gt $max_log_files ]; then
    excess_count=$((log_count - max_log_files))
    ls -1tr "$log_directory"/*$log_extension | head -n $excess_count | xargs rm
fi

echo "Log rotation and deletion completed successfully."

#!/bin/bash

# Инициализация переменных
key1=""
key2=""
key3=""
key4=""

# Обработка аргументов
while [[ $# -gt 0 ]]; do
    key=$1
    case $key in
        -k1|--key1)
        key1="$2"
        shift # передвигаем указатель на следующий аргумент-параметр
        ;;
        -k2|--key2)
        key2="$2"
        shift
        ;;
        -k3|--key3)
        key3="$2"
        shift
        ;;
        -k4|--key4)
        key4="$2"
        shift
        ;;
        *) # если ключ не распознан
        echo "Неизвестный ключ: $key"
        ;;
    esac
    shift # передвигаем указатель на следующий ключ
done

# Вывод параметров, переданных для каждого ключа
echo "Ключ 1: $key1"
echo "Ключ 2: $key2"
echo "Ключ 3: $key3"
echo "Ключ 4: $key4"

#!/bin/bash

# Проверяем, что заданы все необходимые ключи с их параметрами
if [ $# -ne 8 ]; then
    echo "Ошибка: ожидается 4 ключа с параметрами"
    exit 1
fi

# Обрабатываем каждую пару ключ-параметр и добавляем "."
for ((i=1; i <= 8; i+=2)); do
    key="${!i}"
    value="${!((i+1))}"
    result="${value//./.}"  # вставляем "." перед каждым символом
    echo "$key=$result"
done

#!/bin/bash

# Парсинг аргументов командной строки
while getopts ":a:b:c:d:" opt; do
  case $opt in
    a)
      arg1="${OPTARG//./\.}"
      ;;
    b)
      arg2="${OPTARG//./\.}"
      ;;
    c)
      arg3="${OPTARG//./\.}"
      ;;
    d)
      arg4="${OPTARG//./\.}"
      ;;
    \?)
      echo "Неверный ключ: -$OPTARG" >&2
      exit 1
      ;;
    :)
      echo "Ключ -$OPTARG требует параметр" >&2
      exit 1
      ;;
  esac
done

# Проверка заданных ключей и параметров
if [ -z "$arg1" ] || [ -z "$arg2" ] || [ -z "$arg3" ] || [ -z "$arg4" ]; then
  echo "Не все ключи и параметры заданы"
  exit 1
fi

# Вывод значений аргументов после экранирования
echo "arg1: $arg1"
echo "arg2: $arg2"
echo "arg3: $arg3"
echo "arg4: $arg4"

grep -n "A" filename.txt | awk -F ':' '{print $1}' | while read line; do
    next_line=$(($line + 1))
    found_b=false
    while read -r curr_line; do
        if [[ $curr_line =~ "B" ]]; then
            found_b=true
            echo "Line $next_line: $curr_line"
            break
        fi
        next_line=$(($next_line + 1))
    done < filename.txt
    if [[ $found_b = false ]]; then
        echo "No B found after line $line"
    fi
done

#!/bin/bash

# Function to prompt the user for an answer with a timeout
prompt_with_timeout() {
    local question=$1
    local timeout=$2
    local default_answer=$3
    
    # Print the question
    echo -n "$question"

    # Wait for user input with timeout
    read -r -t "$timeout" answer

    # Use the default answer if no input within timeout
    answer="${answer:-$default_answer}"

    echo "$answer"
}

# Check if /usr/web/project exists
if [ -d "/usr/web/project" ]; then
    echo "Path /usr/web/project already exists."

    # Prompt user to choose to overwrite or delete old dir
    answer=$(prompt_with_timeout "Do you want to overwrite the existing directory? (y/n, default: delete old dir): " 3 "n")

    # Remove old directory and create new one if user chooses to overwrite or times out
    if [ "$answer" = "y" ]; then
        echo "Deleting old directory and creating a new one..."
        rm -rf /usr/web/project
    else
        echo "Deleting old directory and creating a new one..."
        rm -rf /usr/web/project
    fi
fi

# Create the directory
mkdir -p /usr/web/project

# Check if the directory was successfully created
if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then
    echo "Failed to create directory /usr/web/project"
    exit 1  # Exit the script with error status
fi

echo "Directory /usr/web/project created successfully."

#!/bin/bash

# Function to compile the C program
compile_program() {
    ARCH="$1"
    OUTPUT_DIR="./output"
    PROGRAM_NAME="bot"
    
    # Construct the output binary filename
    BINARY_FILE="${OUTPUT_DIR}/${PROGRAM_NAME}.${ARCH}"
    
    # Compile the C program with the specified architecture
    gcc -march="${ARCH}" ./bot/main.c -o "${BINARY_FILE}"

    # Check if compilation was successful
    if [[ $? -eq 0 ]]; then
        echo "Compilation successful! Binary file created: ${BINARY_FILE}"
    else
        echo "Compilation failed!"
    fi
}

# Example usage:
compile_program "x86"      # Compile for x86 architecture
compile_program "armv7l"   # Compile for ARMv7 architecture

#!/bin/bash

program_name="bot"
output_dir="./output"
source_file="./${program_name}/main.c"

# List of architectures to compile for
architectures=("x86_64" "arm" "powerpc")

# Loop through the architectures and compile the program
for arch in "${architectures[@]}"; do
    # Replace 'bin' with the architecture name
    output_file="${output_dir}/${program_name}_${arch}.bin"

    # Compile the program
    gcc "${source_file}" -o "${output_file}" -march="${arch}"
    
    if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
        echo "Compiled for ${arch} successfully"
    else
        echo "Failed to compile for ${arch}"
    fi
done

#!/bin/bash

# Set the list of architecture names
L1='jackmymipsel'   #mipsel
L2='jackmymips'     #mips
L3='jackmysh4'      #sh4
L4='jackmyx86'      #x86_64
L5='jackmyarmv6'    #armv6l
L6='jackmyi686'     #i686
L7='jackmypowerpc'  #powerpc
L8='jackmyi586'     #i586
L9='jackmym86k'     #m86k
L10='jackmysparc'   #sparc

# Loop through the architecture names and compile the C program
for ARCH in $L1 $L2 $L3 $L4 $L5 $L6 $L7 $L8 $L9 $L10; do
    echo "Compiling for $ARCH..."
    gcc ./bot/main.c -o ./output/"$ARCH".bin
    echo "Compilation for $ARCH complete."
done

<?php

// Specify the URL of the service
$url = 'https://api.example.com/service';

// Specify the headers
$headers = array(
    'Content-Type: application/json',
    'Authorization: Bearer Your_Auth_Token',
);

// Specify the JSON data
$data = array(
    'key1' => 'value1',
    'key2' => 'value2',
);

// Convert the data to JSON format
$jsonData = json_encode($data);

// Initialize curl
$ch = curl_init();

// Set the curl options
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, true);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $jsonData);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $headers);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);

// Execute the request
$response = curl_exec($ch);

// Check for errors
if ($response === false) {
    die('Error: ' . curl_error($ch));
}

// Close curl
curl_close($ch);

// Print the response
echo $response;

?>

#!/bin/bash

# Installation: sudo apt-get install arp-scan

# Specify the network interface that you want to scan
interface="eth0"

# Run arp-scan and store the results in a variable
output=$(sudo arp-scan -I "$interface" --localnet)

# Extract the IP and MAC addresses from the output using regex
pattern="([0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+)\s+([0-9A-Fa-f]{2}[:-]){5}([0-9A-Fa-f]{2})"
while read -r line; do
    if [[ $line =~ $pattern ]]; then
        ip="${BASH_REMATCH[1]}"
        mac="${BASH_REMATCH[0]}"
        echo "IP: $ip  MAC: $mac"
    fi
done <<< "$output"

// Vérifier si le formulaire est soumis
if ($_SERVER["REQUEST_METHOD"] == "POST") {
    // Récupérer les données du formulaire
    $nom = $_POST["nom"];
    $email = $_POST["email"];
    $chambre = $_POST["chambre"];

    // Effectuer la réservation dans la base de données (exemple simplifié)
    // Remplacer les données de connexion à la base de données avec les vôtres
    $serveur = "localhost";
    $utilisateur = "votre_utilisateur";
    $mot_de_passe = "votre_mot_de_passe";
    $base_de_donnees = "votre_base_de_donnees";

    // Créer une connexion à la base de données
    $connexion = new mysqli($serveur, $utilisateur, $mot_de_passe, $base_de_donnees);

    // Vérifier si la connexion a échoué
    if ($connexion->connect_error) {
        die("La connexion à la base de données a échoué: " . $connexion->connect_error);
    }

    // Préparer une requête d'insertion
    $requete = $connexion->prepare("INSERT INTO reservations (nom, email, chambre) VALUES (?, ?, ?)");

    // Vérifier si la préparation de la requête a échoué
    if (!$requete) {
        die("La préparation de la requête a échoué: " . $connexion->error);
    }

    // Lier les valeurs aux paramètres de la requête
    $requete->bind_param("sss", $nom, $email, $chambre);

    // Exécuter la requête
    if ($requete->execute()) {
        echo "La réservation a été enregistrée avec succès !";
    } else {
        echo "Erreur lors de l'enregistrement de la réservation: " . $requete->error;
    }

    // Fermer la connexion à la base de données
    $connexion->close();
}
?>

Option Explicit

Randomize

Dim dropCount
dropCount = 0

Dim patterns(256)
For i = 0 To 255
    patterns(i) = False
Next

Do While CheckPatterns(patterns) = False
    dropCount = dropCount + 1
    Dim randomChance
    randomChance = Int((100 * Rnd) + 1)
    
    If randomChance <= 70 Then
        Dim randomPattern
        randomPattern = Int((256 * Rnd))
        If patterns(randomPattern) = False Then
            patterns(randomPattern) = True
            WScript.Echo "开到图样 #" & randomPattern & "，掉落成功！"
        Else
            WScript.Echo "开到图样 #" & randomPattern & "，已经拥有！"
        End If
    Else
        WScript.Echo "什么都没掉落。"
    End If
Loop

WScript.Echo "所有256个图样已经全部开到手！"
WScript.Echo "共开启宝箱次数：" & dropCount

Function CheckPatterns(patternArray)
    Dim pattern
    For Each pattern In patternArray
        If pattern = False Then
            CheckPatterns = False
            Exit Function
        End If
    Next
    CheckPatterns = True
End Function

Option Explicit

Randomize

Dim excelApp
Set excelApp = CreateObject("Excel.Application")

Dim excelWorkbook
Set excelWorkbook = excelApp.Workbooks.Add()

Dim excelWorksheet
Set excelWorksheet = excelWorkbook.Worksheets("Sheet1")

excelWorksheet.Cells(1, 1).Value = "图样"
excelWorksheet.Cells(1, 2).Value = "重复次数"
excelWorksheet.Cells(1, 3).Value = "总开启次数"

Dim dropCount
dropCount = 0

Dim patterns(256)
For i = 0 To 255
    patterns(i) = 0
Next

Dim patternCount
patternCount = 0

Do While patternCount < 256
    dropCount = dropCount + 1
    Dim randomChance
    randomChance = Int((100 * Rnd) + 1)
    
    If randomChance <= 70 Then
        Dim randomPattern
        randomPattern = Int((256 * Rnd))
        If patterns(randomPattern) = 0 Then
            patterns(randomPattern) = 1
            patternCount = patternCount + 1
        Else
            patterns(randomPattern) = patterns(randomPattern) + 1
        End If
    End If
Loop

Dim rowIndex
rowIndex = 2

For i = 0 To 255
    If patterns(i) > 0 Then
        excelWorksheet.Cells(rowIndex, 1).Value = i
        excelWorksheet.Cells(rowIndex, 2).Value = patterns(i)
        rowIndex = rowIndex + 1
    End If
Next

excelWorksheet.Cells(rowIndex, 3).Value = dropCount

Dim outputFilePath
outputFilePath = "C:\path\to\output\file.xlsx"

excelWorkbook.SaveAs outputFilePath
excelWorkbook.Close False
excelApp.Quit

Set excelWorksheet = Nothing
Set excelWorkbook = Nothing
Set excelApp = Nothing

WScript.Echo "结果已成功输出到文件：" & outputFilePath

#!/bin/bash

# Specify the range in 24-hour format (HH:mm)
start_time="08:00"
end_time="18:00"

# Get the current time in the same format
current_time=$(date +%H:%M)

# Compare the current time with the specified range
if [[ "$current_time" > "$start_time" && "$current_time" < "$end_time" ]]; then
    echo "Current time is within the specified range."
else
    echo "Current time is outside the specified range."
fi

#!/bin/bash

# Prompt the user to enter two numbers
read -p "Enter the first number: " num1
read -p "Enter the second number: " num2

# Check if the input is numeric or not
if ! [[ $num1 =~ ^[0-9]+$ ]] || ! [[ $num2 =~ ^[0-9]+$ ]]; then
  echo "Error: Incorrect input! Please enter valid numbers."
  exit 1
fi

# Calculate the sum of the two numbers
sum=$((num1 + num2))

echo "Sum: $sum"

# Determine the bigger number
if (( num1 > num2 )); then
  echo "Bigger number: $num1"
elif (( num2 > num1 )); then
  echo "Bigger number: $num2"
else
  echo "Both numbers are equal."
fi

@echo off
setlocal enabledelayedexpansion

REM Specify the suitable name for the renamed images
set "prefix=renamed_"

REM Set the duration for each frame in seconds
set "frame_duration=5"

REM Set the transition duration in seconds
set "transition_duration=2"

REM Get the path to the folder containing the script
set "folder=%~dp0"

REM Navigate to the folder containing the images
pushd "%folder%"

REM Rename the images to suitable names
set counter=1
for %%G in (*.jpg *.jpeg *.png *.gif) do (
    set "filename=!prefix!_!counter!%%~xG"
    ren "%%G" "!filename!"
    set /a counter+=1
)

REM Use ffmpeg to create the video
ffmpeg -framerate 1/%frame_duration% -start_number 1 -i "%prefix%_%d.jpg" -vf "zoompan=z='min(zoom+0.0005,1.5)':s=1280x720:d=%transition_duration%,framerate=25:interp_start=0:interp_end=255:scene=100" output.mp4

REM Open the output video
start output.mp4

REM Clean up the renamed images (optional)
del "%prefix%_*.*"

REM Restore the previous directory
popd

REM Pause the script to view any error messages
pause

    set "filename=!prefix!_!counter!%%~xG"
    ren "%%G" "!filename!"
    set /a counter+=1
)

REM Use ffmpeg to create the video
ffmpeg -framerate 1/%frame_duration% -start_number 1 -i "%prefix%_%%d%%~xG" -vf "zoompan=z='min(zoom+0.0005,1.5)':s=1280x720:d=%transition_duration%,framerate=25 output.mp4"

REM Open the output video
start output.mp4

REM Clean up the renamed images (optional)
del "%prefix%_*.*"

REM Restore the previous directory
popd

REM Pause the script to view any error messages
pause

<?php
// Установка соединения с базой данных
$servername = "localhost";
$username = "username";
$password = "password";
$dbname = "databasename";
$conn = mysqli_connect($servername, $username, $password, $dbname);

// Получение значения параметра "case" из ссылки
$case = $_GET['case'];

// Проверка, если параметр "case" не пустой
if (!empty($case)) {
    // Получение игрового ника и баланса из сессии
    session_start();
    $name = $_SESSION['name'];
    $balance = $_SESSION['balance'];

    // Проверка достаточности баланса для открытия кейса
    if (($case == 1 && $balance >= 20) || ($case == 2 && $balance >= 50) || ($case == 3 && $balance >= 100)) {
        // Вычитание стоимости кейса из баланса
        if ($case == 1) {
            $balance -= 20;
        } elseif ($case == 2) {
            $balance -= 50;
        } elseif ($case == 3) {
            $balance -= 100;
        }

        // Генерация рандомного количества монет в зависимости от кейса
        if ($case == 1) {
            $minCoins = 5;
            $maxCoins = 50;
        } elseif ($case == 2) {
            $minCoins = 20;
            $maxCoins = 100;
        } elseif ($case == 3) {
            $minCoins = 50;
            $maxCoins = 250;
        }
        $coins = rand($minCoins, $maxCoins);

        // Обновление баланса игрока в сессии
        $_SESSION['balance'] = $balance;

        // Уведомление о количестве выпавших монет
        echo "Поздравляем, вам выпало $coins монет! Ваш текущий баланс: $balance монет";

        // Сохранение логов на базу данных
        $sql = "INSERT INTO logs (name, case_number, coins) VALUES ('$name', '$case', '$coins')";
        mysqli_query($conn, $sql);
    } else {
        echo "У вас недостаточно монет для открытия данного кейса";
    }
} else {
    echo "Вы не выбрали кейс для открытия";
}

// Закрытие соединения с базой данных
mysqli_close($conn);
?>

<?php
if(isset($_POST['videoUrl'])) {
  $videoUrl = $_POST['videoUrl'];

  // Verifica se a URL fornecida é válida
  if(preg_match('/^(https?:\/\/)?(www\.)?(youtube\.com|youtu\.?be)\/.+$/i', $videoUrl)) {
    // Obtém o ID do vídeo do YouTube
    parse_str(parse_url($videoUrl, PHP_URL_QUERY), $urlParams);
    $videoId = $urlParams['v'];

    // Define o nome do arquivo mp3 (pode ser personalizado)
    $fileName = 'audio.mp3';

    // Comando para converter o vídeo em áudio usando FFmpeg
    $command = "ffmpeg -i 'https://www.youtube.com/watch?v={$videoId}' -vn -acodec libmp3lame '{$fileName}'";

    // Executa o comando do FFmpeg
    exec($command);

    // Define o cabeçalho do arquivo para que seja baixado
    header('Content-Type: audio/mpeg');
    header('Content-Disposition: attachment; filename="' . $fileName . '"');
    header('Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary');
    header('Content-Length: ' . filesize($fileName));

    // Envia o conteúdo do arquivo para o navegador
    readfile($fileName);

    // Remove o arquivo mp3 após o download
    unlink($fileName);
    exit;
  }
}
?>

#!/bin/bash

# 定义关键字
keyword="your_keyword"

# 定义要查找的目录列表
directories=(
    "directory1"
    "directory2"
    "directory3"
)

# 遍历目录列表
for dir in "${directories[@]}"; do
    # 查找所有txt文件，并逐个处理
    find "$dir" -type f -name "*.txt" | while read -r file; do
        # 读取文件内容
        content=$(<"$file")
        
        # 检查关键字是否存在
        if grep -q "$keyword" <<< "$content"; then
            echo "关键字 $keyword 在文件 $file 中找到："
            echo "$content"
            echo "--------------------------------------"
        fi
    done
done

' 模拟双色球彩票中奖的VBScript程序

Const MAX_NUM = 33     ' 双色球的号码范围 1-33
Const MAX_BALL = 16    ' 双色球的红球数量
Const MAX_BLUE = 16    ' 双色球的蓝球数量
Const TICKET_PRICE = 2 ' 彩票的价格
Const PRIZE_AMOUNT = 1000000 ' 中奖金额

' 随机生成一组中奖号码
Dim winningNums(6)
GenerateWinningNums

' 初始化购买彩票和中奖标志
Dim ticketNums(6)
Dim isWin
isWin = False

' 循环购买彩票，直到中奖为止
Dim ticketCount
ticketCount = 0
Do While Not isWin
    GenerateTicketNums
    ticketCount = ticketCount + 1
    
    If CheckWin Then
        isWin = True
    End If
Loop

' 输出一共购买了多少张彩票
WScript.Echo "购买了 " & ticketCount & " 张彩票"

' 生成一组中奖号码
Sub GenerateWinningNums
    Randomize
    Dim i, j, num
    For i = 1 To 6
        num = Int((MAX_NUM - 1 + 1) * Rnd + 1)
        For j = 1 To i - 1
            If winningNums(j) = num Then
                num = Int((MAX_NUM - 1 + 1) * Rnd + 1)
                j = 0
            End If
        Next
        winningNums(i) = num
    Next
End Sub

' 生成一组彩票号码
Sub GenerateTicketNums
    Randomize
    Dim i, j, num
    For i = 1 To 6
        num = Int((MAX_NUM - 1 + 1) * Rnd + 1)
        For j = 1 To i - 1
            If ticketNums(j) = num Then
                num = Int((MAX_NUM - 1 + 1) * Rnd + 1)
                j = 0
            End If
        Next
        ticketNums(i) = num
    Next
End Sub

' 检查是否中奖
Function CheckWin
    Dim i, count, blue
    count = 0
    blue = Int((MAX_BLUE - 1 + 1) * Rnd + 1)
    
    For i = 1 To 6
        If InArray(ticketNums(i), winningNums) Then
            count = count + 1
        End If
    Next
    
    If count = 6 And blue = winningNums(7) Then
        ' 中奖啦！
        WScript.Echo "恭喜您中奖了！中奖号码："
        WScript.Echo Join(winningNums, "-")
        WScript.Echo "奖金：" & PRIZE_AMOUNT & " 元"
        CheckWin = True
    Else
        CheckWin = False
    End If
End Function

' 检查一个数是否在数组中
Function InArray(num, arr)
    Dim i, arrLen
    arrLen = UBound(arr)
    
    For i = 1 To arrLen
        If arr(i) = num Then
            InArray = True
            Exit Function
        End If
    Next
    
    InArray = False
End Function

    echo "Script toggled: $INACTIVE_SCRIPT"
else
    echo "$ACTIVE_SCRIPT" > ~/.conky/current_script.txt

fi

#!/bin/bash

FLAG_FILE="/path/to/flagfile.txt"
SCRIPT1="/path/to/script1.sh"
SCRIPT2="/path/to/script2.sh"

if [ -e "$FLAG_FILE" ]; then
    # Flag file exists, so run script2
    echo "Running Script 2"
    bash "$SCRIPT2"
    rm "$FLAG_FILE"  # Remove the flag to toggle back to script1 if desired
else
    # Flag file doesn't exist, so run script1
    echo "Running Script 1"
    bash "$SCRIPT1"
    touch "$FLAG_FILE"  # Create the flag file to toggle to script2
fi

#!/bin/bash

# Запускаем команду и сохраняем последнюю строку в переменную
last_line=$(tail -n 1 /dev/tty)

# Выводим последнюю строку
echo "Последняя строка: $last_line"

curl -X POST https://schindler.incapptic.net/apps/upload-artifact -H 'x-connect-token:11:xxx' -F 'artifact-81=@./drop/FieldLink-NI-Test.ipa'

if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then
   echo "curl command failed"
   exit 1
fi

curl -X POST https://schindler.incapptic.net/apps/upload-artifact -H 'x-connect-token:11:xxx' -F 'artifact-81=@./drop/FieldLink-NI-Test.ipa'
EXIT_CODE=$?
if [ $EXIT_CODE -ne 0 ]; then
   echo "curl command failed"
   export ERROR_FLAG=true
fi

response=$(curl -X POST https://schindler.incapptic.net/apps/upload-artifact -H 'x-connect-token:11:xxx' -F 'artifact-81=@./drop/FieldLink-NI-Test.ipa')
if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then
  echo "Failed to upload artifact"
  echo "$response" # 输出具体错误信息
  exit 1 # 退出并显示错误信息
fi

- main

  vmImage: 'ubuntu-latest'

steps:
- script: |
    curl -X POST https://schindler.incapptic.net/apps/upload-artifact -H 'x-connect-token:11:xxx' -F 'artifact-81=@./drop/FieldLink-NI-Test.ipa'
  displayName: 'Upload Artifact'

    if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
      echo "Upload Artifact Successful"
    else
      echo "Upload Artifact Failed"
      echo "Error Details: $LASTEXITCODE"
      exit 1
    fi
  displayName: 'Check Result and Exit'

- script: |
    if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then
        echo "Error occurred while uploading artifact"
        exit 1

  continueOnError: true

$csvFile = 'targets.csv';
$outputFile = 'output.txt';

// Открытие файла targets.csv для чтения
if (($handle = fopen($csvFile, "r")) !== FALSE) {
    // Открытие файла output.txt для записи
    $output = fopen($outputFile, "w");

    // Чтение каждой строки файла targets.csv
    while (($data = fgetcsv($handle, 1000, ",")) !== FALSE) {
        // Вытаскиваем первую колонку
        $url = $data[0];
        
        // Извлечение чистого URL
        $parsedUrl = parse_url($url);
        $cleanUrl = $parsedUrl['scheme'] . '://' . $parsedUrl['host'];

        // Запись чистого URL в output.txt
        fwrite($output, $cleanUrl . "\n");
    }

    // Закрытие файлов
    fclose($handle);
    fclose($output);

    echo "Программа завершена успешно.";
} else {

#!/bin/bash

# Function to take a screenshot of the current terminal window
take_screenshot() {
  # Focus the terminal window and take a screenshot with gnome-screenshot
  xdotool windowfocus $WINDOW_ID
  gnome-screenshot -w -f "$1"
}

# Function to simulate editing the limits file with nano
edit_limits_file() {
  # Open nano with the limits.conf file
  xdotool type --delay 100 "sudo nano /etc/security/limits.conf"
  xdotool key Return
  sleep 2 # Wait for nano to open

  # Take a screenshot of nano with the file open
  take_screenshot "edit_limits.png"

  # Close nano without saving changes
  xdotool key Ctrl+x
}

# Function to simulate running a command in the terminal
run_command() {
  # Type the command in the terminal
  xdotool type --delay 100 "$1"
  xdotool key Return
  sleep 2 # Wait for the command to execute

  # Take a screenshot of the terminal with the command output
  take_screenshot "$2"
}

# Get the active window ID
WINDOW_ID=$(xdotool getactivewindow)

# Simulate editing the limits.conf file
edit_limits_file

# Simulate running a command to show the limits (e.g., ulimit -a for the current user)
run_command "ulimit -a" "ulimit_output.png"

# Add other commands you want to simulate and take screenshots of

echo "Screenshots have been taken."

Sub CreateBatchFile()
    Dim ws As Worksheet
    Dim fso As Object
    Dim outputFolder As String
    Dim cell As Range
    Dim ip As String
    Dim batFilePath As String
    
    Set ws = ThisWorkbook.Sheets("Sheet1") 'Thay "Sheet1" bằng tên sheet chứa danh sách IP
    Set fso = CreateObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject")
    outputFolder = Environ("UserProfile") & "\Desktop\TUYEN"
   
    'Kiểm tra thư mục lưu trữ đầu ra
    If Not fso.FolderExists(outputFolder) Then
        fso.CreateFolder outputFolder
    End If
    
    'Duyệt qua từng ô trong cột A và tạo file bat
    For Each cell In ws.Range("A1:A" & ws.Cells(ws.Rows.Count, 1).End(xlUp).Row)
        ip = Trim(cell.value)
        
        'Tạo nội dung cho file bat
        Dim batContent As String
        batContent = "@echo off" & vbNewLine
        batContent = batContent & "ping -n 1 " & ip & " >nul" & vbNewLine
        batContent = batContent & "if errorlevel 1 (" & vbNewLine
        batContent = batContent & "    echo Khong the ket noi den " & ip & " > " & outputFolder & "\" & ip & ".txt" & vbNewLine
        batContent = batContent & ") else (" & vbNewLine
        batContent = batContent & "    echo Ket noi thanh cong den " & ip & " > " & outputFolder & "\" & ip & ".txt" & vbNewLine
        batContent = batContent & ")" & vbNewLine
        
        'Tạo và lưu file bat
        batFilePath = Environ("UserProfile") & "\Desktop\connect.bat"
        Dim batFile As Object
        Set batFile = fso.CreateTextFile(batFilePath, True)
        batFile.Write batContent
        batFile.Close
        
        'Chạy file bat
        Shell "cmd.exe /c " & batFilePath, vbHide
        
        'Xóa file bat
        fso.DeleteFile batFilePath
    Next cell
    
    MsgBox "Quá trình thực hiện xong!"
End Sub

Sub PingAndConnect()
    Dim ws As Worksheet
    Dim rng As Range
    Dim cell As Range
    Dim ip As String
    Dim filePath As String
    Dim batFilePath As String
    Dim batContent As String
    
    ' Thiết lập worksheet và phạm vi để lấy các địa chỉ IP
    Set ws = ThisWorkbook.Sheets("Sheet1")
    Set rng = ws.Range("A1:A" & ws.Cells(Rows.Count, 1).End(xlUp).Row)
    
    ' Tạo file .bat và chuỗi nội dung bat ban đầu
    batFilePath = "C:\Users\{Tên người dùng}\Desktop\BatchFile.bat" ' Đường dẫn đến file .bat
    batContent = ""
    
    ' Lặp qua từng địa chỉ IP
    For Each cell In rng
        ip = cell.Value
        
        ' Kiểm tra kết nối tới địa chỉ IP
        If Ping(ip) Then
            ' Nếu kết nối thành công, tạo file .txt trong thư mục TUYEN và ghi địa chỉ IP vào file
            filePath = "C:\Users\{Tên người dùng}\Desktop\TUYEN\" & ip & ".txt"
            CreateTextFile filePath, ip
            
            ' Thêm lệnh vào file .bat để liệt kê đường dẫn trong file .txt
            batContent = batContent & "echo " & filePath & " >> C:\Users\{Tên người dùng}\Desktop\TUYEN\Paths.txt" & vbCrLf
        End If
    Next cell
    
    ' Lưu nội dung bat vào file .bat
    WriteToFile batFilePath, batContent
    
    ' Chạy file .bat để liệt kê đường dẫn
    Shell batFilePath, vbNormalFocus
End Sub

' Hàm kiểm tra kết nối tới địa chỉ IP bằng cách gửi lệnh ping
Function Ping(ByVal ip As String) As Boolean
    Dim cmd As String
    Dim oShell As Object
    Dim oExec As Object
    
    ' Tạo lệnh ping
    cmd = "%ComSpec% /c ping " & ip
    
    ' Chạy lệnh ping và lấy kết quả
    Set oShell = CreateObject("WScript.Shell")
    Set oExec = oShell.Exec(cmd)
    
    ' Kiểm tra kết quả
    If InStr(oExec.StdOut.ReadAll, "TTL=") > 0 Then
        Ping = True
    Else
        Ping = False
    End If
End Function

' Hàm tạo file .txt và ghi địa chỉ IP vào file
Sub CreateTextFile(ByVal filePath As String, ByVal ip As String)
    Dim fileNumber As Integer
    
    ' Mở file để ghi
    fileNumber = FreeFile
    Open filePath For Output As fileNumber
    
    ' Ghi địa chỉ IP vào file
    Print #fileNumber, ip
    
    ' Đóng file
    Close fileNumber
End Sub

' Hàm ghi nội dung vào file
Sub WriteToFile(ByVal filePath As String, ByVal content As String)
    Dim fileNumber As Integer
    
    ' Mở file để ghi
    fileNumber = FreeFile
    Open filePath For Output As fileNumber
    
    ' Ghi nội dung vào file
    Print #fileNumber, content
    
    ' Đóng file
    Close fileNumber
End Sub

Sub GenerateBatFile()
    Dim filePath As String
    Dim batFilePath As String
    Dim batContent As String
    Dim folderPath As String
    Dim fileNumber As Integer
    Dim line As String
    
    ' Đường dẫn đến file .txt chứa các địa chỉ folder
    filePath = "C:\Users\{Tên người dùng}\Desktop\FolderList.txt"
    
    ' Đường dẫn đến file .bat
    batFilePath = "C:\Users\{Tên người dùng}\Desktop\RunDirCommands.bat"
    
    ' Mở file .txt để đọc
    fileNumber = FreeFile
    Open filePath For Input As fileNumber
    
    ' Xóa nội dung cũ trong file .bat (nếu có)
    Open batFilePath For Output As #fileNumber
    Close #fileNumber
    
    ' Mở file .bat để ghi
    Open batFilePath For Append As #fileNumber
    
    ' Đọc từng dòng trong file .txt và tạo lệnh trong file .bat
    Do While Not EOF(fileNumber)
        ' Đọc dòng tiếp theo
        Line Input #fileNumber, line
        folderPath = Trim(line)
        
        ' Tạo lệnh trong file .bat
        batContent = "echo " & folderPath & " >> C:\Users\{Tên người dùng}\Desktop\Results.txt" & vbCrLf
        batContent = batContent & "dir """ & folderPath & """ /s /b >> C:\Users\{Tên người dùng}\Desktop\Results.txt" & vbCrLf
        
        ' Ghi lệnh vào file .bat
        Print #fileNumber, batContent
    Loop
    
    ' Đóng file .txt
    Close fileNumber
    
    ' Đóng file .bat
    Close #fileNumber
End Sub

Sub GenerateBatFile()
    Dim folderPath As String
    Dim outputFile As String
    Dim batFilePath As String
    Dim batContent As String
    Dim fileNumber As Integer
    
    ' Đường dẫn đến thư mục chứa các file .txt
    folderPath = "C:\Path\To\Your\Folder"
    
    ' Tên file .txt chứa kết quả cập nhật dung lượng
    outputFile = "C:\Path\To\Your\Output.txt"
    
    ' Đường dẫn đến file .bat
    batFilePath = "C:\Path\To\Your\BatFile.bat"
    
    ' Xóa nội dung cũ trong file .bat (nếu có)
    Open batFilePath For Output As #fileNumber
    Close #fileNumber
    
    ' Mở file .bat để ghi
    Open batFilePath For Append As #fileNumber
    
    ' Tạo lệnh trong file .bat để cập nhật dung lượng các file .txt
    batContent = "echo off" & vbCrLf
    batContent = batContent & "cd " & folderPath & vbCrLf
    batContent = batContent & "for /R %%G in (*.txt) do echo %%~zG" & vbCrLf
    batContent = batContent & "> " & outputFile & " ( type " & outputFile & " & echo. )" & vbCrLf
    
    ' Ghi lệnh vào file .bat
    Print #fileNumber, batContent
    
    ' Đóng file .bat
    Close #fileNumber
    
    ' Chạy file .bat để cập nhật dung lượng và hiển thị kết quả trên cmd
    Shell "cmd /k " & batFilePath, vbNormalFocus
End Sub

Sub CreateAndRunBatFiles()
    Dim ws As Worksheet
    Dim lastRow As Long
    Dim i As Long
    Dim folderPath As String
  
    ' Đặt worksheet cần thao tác làm biến ws
    Set ws = ThisWorkbook.Worksheets("Tên_Worksheet") ' Thay "Tên_Worksheet" bằng tên thật của worksheet
    
    ' Tìm số dòng cuối cùng có dữ liệu trong cột A
    lastRow = ws.Cells(ws.Rows.Count, "A").End(xlUp).Row
    
    ' Lặp qua từng dòng trong cột A
    For i = 1 To lastRow
        ' Lấy đường dẫn từ cell tương ứng
        folderPath = ws.Cells(i, "A").Value
        
        ' Kiểm tra nếu đường dẫn không rỗng
        If folderPath <> "" Then
            ' Tạo nội dung cho file .bat
            Dim batContent As String
            batContent = "@echo off" & vbNewLine
            batContent = batContent & "cd """ & folderPath & """" & vbNewLine
            batContent = batContent & "dir /s > ""C:\Users\Username\Desktop\output_" & i & ".txt"""
            
            ' Tạo và lưu file .bat trên desktop
            Dim batFilePath As String
            batFilePath = "C:\Users\Username\Desktop\file_" & i & ".bat"
            Open batFilePath For Output As #1
            Print #1, batContent
            Close #1
            
            ' Chạy file .bat
            Shell "cmd /c " & batFilePath
        End If
    Next i
End Sub

Sub CreateAndRunBatFiles()
    Dim ws As Worksheet
    Dim lastRow As Long
    Dim i As Long
    Dim folderPath As String
    
    ' Đặt worksheet cần thao tác làm biến ws
    Set ws = ThisWorkbook.Worksheets("Tên_Worksheet") ' Thay "Tên_Worksheet" bằng tên thật của worksheet
    
    ' Tìm số dòng cuối cùng có dữ liệu trong cột A
    lastRow = ws.Cells(ws.Rows.Count, "A").End(xlUp).Row
    
    ' Lặp qua từng dòng trong cột A
    For i = 1 To lastRow
        ' Lấy đường dẫn từ cell tương ứng
        folderPath = ws.Cells(i, "A").Value
        
        ' Kiểm tra nếu đường dẫn không rỗng
        If folderPath <> "" Then
            ' Tạo file .vbs để liệt kê các folder và subfolder
            Dim vbsContent As String
            vbsContent = "Set objFSO = CreateObject(""Scripting.FileSystemObject"")" & vbNewLine
            vbsContent = vbsContent & "Set objFolder = objFSO.GetFolder(""" & folderPath & """)" & vbNewLine
            vbsContent = vbsContent & "Set objOutputFile = objFSO.CreateTextFile(""C:\Users\Username\Desktop\output_" & i & ".txt"", True)" & vbNewLine
            vbsContent = vbsContent & "ShowSubfolders objFolder" & vbNewLine
            vbsContent = vbsContent & "Sub ShowSubfolders(objFolder)" & vbNewLine
            vbsContent = vbsContent & "    For Each objSubfolder In objFolder.Subfolders" & vbNewLine
            vbsContent = vbsContent & "        Wscript.Echo objSubfolder.Path" & vbNewLine
            vbsContent = vbsContent & "        objOutputFile.WriteLine objSubfolder.Path" & vbNewLine
            vbsContent = vbsContent & "        ShowSubfolders objSubfolder" & vbNewLine
            vbsContent = vbsContent & "    Next" & vbNewLine
            vbsContent = vbsContent & "End Sub"
            
            ' Tạo và lưu file .vbs trên desktop
            Dim vbsFilePath As String
            vbsFilePath = "C:\Users\Username\Desktop\file_" & i & ".vbs"
            Open vbsFilePath For Output As #1
            Print #1, vbsContent
            Close #1
            
            ' Tạo nội dung cho file .bat để chạy file .vbs
            Dim batContent As String
            batContent = "cscript """ & vbsFilePath & """"
            
            ' Tạo và lưu file .bat trên desktop
            Dim batFilePath As String
            batFilePath = "C:\Users\Username\Desktop\file_" & i & ".bat"
            Open batFilePath For Output As #2
            Print #2, batContent
            Close #2
            
            ' Chạy file .bat
            Shell "cmd /c " & batFilePath
        End If
    Next i
End Sub

<?php

// 假设订总金额为1000
$totalAmount = 1000;

// 假设有三个分类和它们的总金额
$categories = [
    'Category A' => 300,
    'Category B' => 500,
    'Category C' => 200
];

// 订单明细数组，这里假设有5个订单
$orders = [
    ['order_id' => 1, 'amount' => 100],
    ['order_id' => 2, 'amount' => 200],
    ['order_id' => 3, 'amount' => 150],
    ['order_id' => 4, 'amount' => 250],
    ['order_id' => 5, 'amount' => 300]
];

// 初始化一个分类订单数组，用于存放每个分类的订单
$categoryOrders = [];
foreach($categories as $category => $categoryAmount) {
    $categoryOrders[$category] = [];
}

// 对每个订单进行分类归档
foreach($orders as $order) {
    // 订单金额
    $amount = $order['amount'];
    
    // 查找可用的分类，并将订单加入分类数组中
    foreach($categories as $category => $categoryAmount) {
        if($categoryAmount >= $amount) {
            $categoryOrders[$category][] = $order;
            // 更新分类的剩余金额
            $categories[$category] -= $amount;
            break;
        }
    }
}

// 打印每个分类的订单明细
foreach($categoryOrders as $category => $orders) {
    echo "Category: $category\n";
    foreach($orders as $order) {
        echo "Order ID: {$order['order_id']}, Amount: {$order['amount']}\n";
    }
    echo "------------------------------\n";
}

if [[ "$(whoami)" != "oracle" ]]; then
    echo "This script can only be executed by the oracle user."
    exit 1
fi

# Check if sudo privileges are available
if ! sudo -n true > /dev/null 2>&1; then
    echo "Sudo privileges are required to execute this script."
    exit 1
fi

# Define the scripts to be executed
script1="path/to/script1.sh"
script2="path/to/script2.sh"

if ! sudo -u root "$script1"; then
    echo "Failed to execute $script1 with sudo."
    exit 1
fi

# Execute script2 with sudo privileges
echo "Executing $script2 with sudo..."
if ! sudo -u root "$script2"; then
    echo "Failed to execute $script2 with sudo."
    exit 1
fi

echo "All scripts executed successfully."
exit 0

#!/bin/bash

# 定义源和目标 Artifactory 服务器的相关信息
source_url="http://<source_artifactory_url>"
source_repo_key="<source_repository_key>"
target_url="http://<target_artifactory_url>"
target_repo_key="<target_repository_key>"

# 获取源 Artifactory 仓库中的所有包
packages=$(curl -s -u <username>:<password> "$source_url/api/storage/$source_repo_key?list" | jq -r '.children[].uri')

# 迭代每个包，并将其从源 Artifactory 迁移到目标 Artifactory
for package in $packages; do
    # 获取源 Artifactory 中的包的元数据
    package_metadata=$(curl -s -u <username>:<password> "$source_url/api/storage/$source_repo_key/$package/metadata")
    
    # 迁移包到目标 Artifactory
    curl -u <username>:<password> -X PUT -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "$package_metadata" "$target_url/api/storage/$target_repo_key/$package/metadata"
    
    echo "Package $package migrated successfully!"
done

#!/bin/bash

# Artifactory API URL
api_url="https://your-artifactory-url/artifactory/api"

# Authentication credentials
username="your-username"
password="your-password"

# Login to Artifactory and get the authentication token
token=$(curl -s -u $username:$password -X POST $api_url/security/token | jq -r '.access_token')

# Set headers with authentication token
headers=(
    "Authorization: Bearer $token"
    "Content-Type: application/json"
)

move_artifacts() {
    # Source and destination repositories
    source_repo=$1
    dest_repo=$2

    # Get all artifacts in source repository
    search_url="$api_url/search/artifact?repos=$source_repo"
    artifacts=$(curl -s -H "${headers[@]}" $search_url | jq '.results[]')

    # Iterate over each artifact and move it to destination repository
    for artifact in $artifacts; do
        artifact_path=$(echo $artifact | jq -r '.path')
        artifact_name=$(echo $artifact | jq -r '.name')
        
        move_url="$api_url/move/$source_repo/$artifact_path?to=/$dest_repo/$artifact_name"
        response=$(curl -s -X POST -w "%{http_code}" -H "${headers[@]}" $move_url)

        if [[ $response == 200 ]]; then
            echo "Artifact $artifact_name moved successfully."
        else
            echo "Failed to move artifact $artifact_name. Response code: $response"
        fi
    done
}

# Usage: move_artifacts "source-repo" "destination-repo"

    echo "制品库状态已成功迁移！"
else

fi

parse_terraform_map() {
  local map="$1"
  local keys=()

  # Loop through the map
  while IFS== read -r key value; do
    # Check if the value is another map
    if [[ $value =~ ^{.*}$ ]]; then
      # Extract keys at the second level
      while IFS== read -r sub_key sub_value; do
        keys+=("$sub_key")
      done < <(echo "$value" | awk -F= '{print $1 "=" $2}')
    fi
  done < <(echo "$map" | awk -F= '{print $1 "=" $2}')

  # Print the extracted keys
  for key in "${keys[@]}"; do
    echo "$key"
  done
}

#!/bin/bash

# Specifica la directory in cui cercare i file .txt
directory="/percorso/alla/directory"

# Calcola la data attuale meno due giorni
data_limite=$(date -d '2 days ago' +%Y%m%d)

# Ciclo for per cercare i file .txt nella directory
for file in "$directory"/*.txt; do
  # Controlla se il file è più vecchio della data limite
  if [[ $(date -r "$file" +%Y%m%d) -lt $data_limite ]]; then
    # Elimina il file
    rm "$file"
    echo "File $file eliminato."
  fi
done

#!/bin/bash

# Directory in cui cercare i file .txt
directory="/percorso/alla/directory"

# Imposta -mtime +2 per trovare i file più vecchi di 2 giorni
find "$directory" -name "*.txt" -type f -mtime +2 | while read -r file; do
    echo "Eliminazione del file: $file"
    rm "$file"
done

! Define an extended Access Control List named EVEN_PING
ip access-list extended EVEN_PING

! Allow any even-numbered IP from the Right PC subnet to ping the Left PC
! Even-numbered IPs have the last bit of their host portion as 0
! This is the 128's bit in the last octet. '0' indicates that this bit must be zero (even IPs)
! '0.0.0.127' is the wildcard mask corresponding to the 128's bit being controlled

permit icmp 192.168.1.0 0.0.0.254 host 10.0.0.10 echo

! The entry above only permits ICMP echo requests (pings)
! from even-numbered IPs, as the last bit (128's place) is zero.

! Deny any odd-numbered IP from the Right PC subnet to ping the Left PC
! We do not need an explicit deny statement, as there is an implicit 'deny any' at the end of each ACL.

! Apply the ACL to the inbound direction of the interface where the Right PC's traffic arrives
interface <Right_PC_Interface>
ip access-group EVEN_PING in

tell application "SwitchResX Daemon"
	-- Activate the application
	activate
	-- Get the current display set name
	apply display set "Test1"
	-- Check if it is different from Test1
	if name is not equal to "Test1" then
		-- Apply Test1 display set
		apply display set "Test1"
		-- Display a notification
		display notification "Switched to Test1 display set" with title "SwitchResX"
		-- Set a variable to store the current time
		set startTime to current date
		-- Create a file to indicate the script is running
		do shell script "touch ~/script_running"
		-- Repeat until 5 seconds have passed
		repeat until (current date) - startTime > 5
			-- Check if the script is run again
			if not (do shell script "[ -f ~/script_running ] && echo true || echo false") as boolean then
				-- Exit the repeat loop
				exit repeat
			end if
		end repeat
		-- Delete the file to indicate the script is finished
		do shell script "rm ~/script_running"
		-- Check if the script is run again
		if not (do shell script "[ -f ~/script_running ] && echo true || echo false") as boolean then
			-- Apply Test2 display set
			apply display set "Test2"
			-- Display a notification
			display notification "Switched to Test2 display set" with title "SwitchResX"
		end if
	else
		-- Display a notification
		display notification "Already using Test1 display set" with title "SwitchResX"
	end if
end tell

#!/bin/bash

# 目标IP
target_ip="目标IP地址"
# 目标用户名
username="目标用户名"
# 目标密码
password="目标密码"
# 查询命令
query_command="要执行的查询命令"
# 目标文件路径
target_path="目标文件路径"

# 执行查询命令并将结果保存到临时文件
output_file=$(mktemp)
sshpass -p "$password" ssh "$username"@"$target_ip" "$query_command" > "$output_file"

# 将临时文件转换为excel文件
xlsx_file="$target_path"/output.xlsx
# 安装python的xlsxwriter库：pip install xlsxwriter
python3 << END
import xlsxwriter

data = []
with open("$output_file", "r") as file:
    for line in file:
        data.append([cell.strip() for cell in line.split()])

workbook = xlsxwriter.Workbook("$xlsx_file")
worksheet = workbook.add_worksheet()

row = 0
for record in data:
    col = 0
    for cell in record:
        worksheet.write(row, col, cell)
        col += 1
    row += 1

workbook.close()
END

# 清理临时文件
rm "$output_file"

echo "输出文件已保存为: $xlsx_file"

#!/bin/bash

while true; do
    echo "-------- MENU --------"
    echo "1) Hiển thị thông tin của tất cả các thư mục hoặc tệp tin có tận cùng bằng chữ cái 'a' trong thư mục /etc."
    echo "2) Hiển thị ngày và giờ của hệ thống."
    echo "3) Đếm số lượng tệp tin hoặc thư mục trong thư mục /etc."
    echo "4) Nhập vào một mảng số nguyên và in ra tổng của chúng."
    echo "5) Tạo n tệp tin với nội dung lần lượt là 'Xin chào sinh viên number'."
    echo "6) Nhập vào một số nguyên và in ra số đảo ngược của nó."
    echo "0) Thoát."
    echo "----------------------"
    read -p "Nhập lựa chọn của bạn (0-6): " choice
    
    case $choice in
        1)
            echo "Các tệp tin và thư mục có tận cùng bằng chữ cái 'a' trong /etc:"
            find /etc -type d -name '*a' -or -type f -name '*a'
            ;;
        2)
            echo "Ngày và giờ hiện tại của hệ thống:"
            date
            ;;
        3)
            echo "Số lượng tệp tin và thư mục trong /etc:"
            ls -l /etc | wc -l
            ;;
        4)
            echo "Nhập vào các số nguyên (cách nhau bởi dấu cách):"
            read -a arr
            sum=0
            for num in "${arr[@]}"; do
                sum=$((sum + num))
            done
            echo "Tổng của mảng arr = $sum"
            ;;
        5)
            read -p "Nhập số lượng tệp tin bạn muốn tạo: " n
            for i in $(seq 1 $n); do
                echo "Xin chào sinh viên $i" > "file_$i.txt"
            done
            echo "$n file đã được tạo."
            ;;
        6)
            read -p "Nhập một số nguyên: " x
            reverse=$(echo $x | rev)
            echo "Số đảo ngược của x = $reverse"
            ;;
        0)
            echo "Thoát khỏi menu."
            exit 0
            ;;
        *)
            echo "Lựa chọn không hợp lệ. Vui lòng nhập lại số từ 0 đến 6."
            ;;
    esac
done

#!/bin/bash

while true; do
    echo "Menu"
    echo "1) Hiển thị thông tin của tất cả các thư mục hoặc tệp tin có tận cùng bằng chữ cái 'a' trong thư mục /etc"
    echo "2) Hiển thị ngày và giờ của hệ thống"
    echo "3) Đếm số lượng tệp tin hoặc thư mục trong thư mục /etc"
    echo "4) Nhập vào một mảng số nguyên và in ra tổng"
    echo "5) Tạo ra n tệp tin với nội dung xác định"
    echo "6) In ra số đảo ngược của số nguyên x"
    echo "0) Thoát"
    read -p "Nhập vào tùy chọn của bạn: " choice

    case $choice in
        1) 
            echo "Các thư mục hoặc tệp tin có tận cùng bằng chữ cái 'a' trong /etc:"
            ls /etc/*a 2> /dev/null
            ;;
        2) 
            echo "Ngày và giờ hiện tại của hệ thống là:"
            date
            ;;
        3) 
            echo "Số lượng tệp tin và thư mục trong /etc là:"
            ls /etc | wc -l
            ;;
        4) 
            read -a arr -p "Nhập vào mảng số nguyên (ngăn cách bằng khoảng trắng): "
            sum=0
            for i in "${arr[@]}"; do
                let sum+=i
            done
            echo "Tổng của mảng arr = $sum"
            ;;
        5) 
            read -p "Nhập vào số n: " n
            for ((i=1; i<=n; i++)); do
                echo "Xin chào sinh viên $i" > "file_$i.txt"
            done
            echo "Đã tạo $n tệp tin."
            ;;
        6) 
            read -p "Nhập vào một số nguyên x: " x
            reverse=$(echo $x | rev)
            echo "Số đảo ngược của x= $reverse"
            ;;
        0) 
            echo "Thoát khỏi menu."
            exit 0
            ;;
        *) 
            echo "Tùy chọn không hợp lệ. Vui lòng thử lại!"
            ;;
    esac

    echo # In thêm một dòng trống
done

set PROCESS=название_процесса

REM Укажите ядра, на которые вы хотите перебросить процесс (номера ядер начинаются с 0)
set CORES=0,1,2

REM Получить идентификатор процесса по его имени
for /f "tokens=2" %%a in ('tasklist /fo csv /nh ^| findstr /i "%PROCESS%"') do set PID=%%~a

REM Проверка, найден ли идентификатор процесса
if "%PID%"=="" (
    echo Процесс %PROCESS% не найден
    exit /b
)

REM Перебрасывание процесса на указанные ядра
for %%c in (%CORES%) do (
    echo Перебрасывание процесса %PROCESS% на ядро %%c
    %SystemRoot%\system32\cmd.exe /c start /affinity %%c /wait taskkill /pid %PID% /f >nul 2>nul
    %SystemRoot%\system32\cmd.exe /c start /affinity %%c %PROCESS%
)

echo Процесс %PROCESS% успешно переброшен на ядра %CORES%

#!/bin/bash

# Path to the pacman.log
PACMAN_LOG="/var/log/pacman.log"
# Path to the PacTreeHistory directory containing folders with dependency trees
PAC_TREE_HISTORY_DIR="PacTreeHistory"
# Path to MonitoredAppList file
MONITORED_APP_LIST="MonitoredAppList"
# Output files
UPDATED_PKG_LIST="UpdatedPkgList"
UPDATED_DEPS_OF_MONITORED_APPS="UpdatedDepsOfMonitoredApps"

# Ensure that the output files are empty
> "$UPDATED_PKG_LIST"
> "$UPDATED_DEPS_OF_MONITORED_APPS"

# Find the last "transaction started" line number in pacman.log
last_transaction_line=$(grep -n "transaction started" "$PACMAN_LOG" | tail -n1 | cut -d: -f1)

# Collect information about updated, installed, or removed packages since the last transaction
sed -n "${last_transaction_line},\$p" "$PACMAN_LOG" | \
grep -E "upgraded|installed|removed" | \
awk -F ' ' '{print $3 " " $4}' | \
sed -e 's/[()]//g' | \
sed -e 's/->/:/' > "$UPDATED_PKG_LIST"

# Get the latest two directories in PacTreeHistory
latest_two_dirs=$(ls -d "$PAC_TREE_HISTORY_DIR"/[0-9]*_[0-9]* | tail -n2)

# Read MonitoredAppList into an array
mapfile -t monitored_apps < "$MONITORED_APP_LIST"

# Get updated, installed or removed packages
mapfile -t updated_packages < "$UPDATED_PKG_LIST"

# Loop over each of the latest two directories
for dir in $latest_two_dirs; do
    # Loop over packages from UpdatedPkgList
    for pkg in "${updated_packages[@]}"; do
        pkg_name=$(echo "$pkg" | cut -d ' ' -f1)

        # Check if the package is part of the monitored applications
        if [[ " ${monitored_apps[*]} " =~ " $pkg_name " ]]; then
            pkg_files="$dir/$pkg_name"

            # Check if the dependency tree file for the monitored package exists
            if [[ -f "$pkg_files" ]]; then
                # Write the package info and the corresponding filename into UpdatedDepsOfMonitoredApps
                echo "$pkg - Found in $pkg_files" >> "$UPDATED_DEPS_OF_MONITORED_APPS"
            fi
        fi
    done
done

echo "Dependencies for monitored apps written to $UPDATED_DEPS_OF_MONITORED_APPS"

# Попытка получить серийный номер из /proc/cpuinfo
serial=$(cat /proc/cpuinfo | grep Serial | cut -d ' ' -f 2)

# Проверка наличия серийного номера
if [[ ! -z "$serial" && "$serial" != "0000000000000000" ]]; then
  echo "Уникальный идентификатор этой платы: $serial"
else
  echo "Серийный номер не найден. Используется MAC-адрес первого сетевого интерфейса."

  # Использовать MAC-адрес первого сетевого интерфейса в качестве идентификатора
  mac_address=$(cat /sys/class/net/eth0/address)
  echo "Уникальный идентификатор этой платы: $mac_address"
fi
