#!/bin/sh

    # Путь к флаговому файлу
    FLAG_FILE="/path/to/.init_done"

    if [ ! -f "$FLAG_FILE" ]; then
        echo "Первый запуск, выполняем инструкции..."

        # Здесь ваши команды, которые необходимо выполнить один раз

        # Создаем флаговый файл
        touch "$FLAG_FILE"
    else
        echo "Файл инициализации найден, пропускаем шаги первого запуска."
    fi

    # Здесь ваши обычные команды, которые должны выполняться при каждом запуске

# Enable IP forwarding
echo 1 > /proc/sys/net/ipv4/ip_forward

# Flush existing iptables rules
iptables -F
iptables -t nat -F

# Apply MASQUERADE target for outbound traffic on the external interface (eth0 in this example)
# This changes the source IP but retains the original source port, mimicking a non-symmetric NAT for simplicity
iptables -t nat -A POSTROUTING -o eth0 -j MASQUERADE

# To mimic more symmetric behavior, limit outbound connections to a specific range of ports
iptables -t nat -A POSTROUTING -p tcp --sport 1024:5000 -o eth0 -j SNAT --to-source YOUR_PUBLIC_IP:1024-5000
iptables -t nat -A POSTROUTING -p udp --sport 1024:5000 -o eth0 -j SNAT --to-source YOUR_PUBLIC_IP:1024-5000

# Enable IP forwarding
echo 1 > /proc/sys/net/ipv4/ip_forward

# Flush existing iptables rules
iptables -F
iptables -t nat -F

# Apply a masquerade for all outbound packets, which is a form of Source NAT (SNAT) that dynamically chooses the port
iptables -t nat -A POSTROUTING -o eth0 -j MASQUERADE

#!/bin/bash

# Ruta del archivo donde se guardará el resultado
RESULT_FILE="disk_usage_report.txt"

# Asegurándose de que el fichero de resultados esté vacío.
> "$RESULT_FILE"

# Función para comprobar si el usuario tiene directorio en /home
check_user_directory() {
    USERNAME=$1
    HOME_DIR="/home/$USERNAME"

    # Comprobar si el directorio existe
    if [ -d "$HOME_DIR" ]; then
        # Calcular el uso de disco del directorio
        DISK_USAGE=$(du -sh "$HOME_DIR" 2>/dev/null | cut -f1)
        echo "Usuario: $USERNAME, Uso de Disco: $DISK_USAGE" | tee -a "$RESULT_FILE"
    else
        echo "El directorio $HOME_DIR no existe." | tee -a "$RESULT_FILE"
    fi
}

# Leer /etc/passwd y filtrar los usuarios con directorio /home/nombreusuario
grep '/home/' /etc/passwd | while IFS=: read -r name _ _ _ _ directory _; do
    # Comprobar que el directorio del usuario sigue el patrón /home/nombreusuario
    if [[ "$directory" == "/home/"* ]]; then
        USERNAME="${directory##*/home/}" # Extraer el nombre del usuario del directorio
        # Llamando a la función para chequear y escribir el uso de disco de este usuario
        check_user_directory "$USERNAME"
    fi
done

echo "El reporte de uso del disco se ha completado."

#!/bin/bash

# Comprobamos que existen los usuarios en /etc/passwd y que tienen directorio /home
for user in $(cat /etc/passwd | grep "/home/" | cut -d: -f1)
do
    if [ -d "/home/$user" ]; then
        echo "Usuario: $user" >> disco_ocupado.txt
        du -sh /home/$user >> disco_ocupado.txt
    fi
done

echo "Se ha generado el fichero disco_ocupado.txt con la información de ocupación de disco de cada usuario en /home"

#!/bin/bash

# Definir el archivo donde se guardarán los resultados.
resultado="/home/$(whoami)/usuarios_y_espacio.txt"

# Comprobar y crear (si no existe) el archivo de resultados.
if [ ! -f "$resultado" ]; then
    touch "$resultado"
fi

# Limpiar el archivo de resultados para esta ejecución.
echo "" > "$resultado"

# Recorrer cada línea en /etc/passwd
while IFS=: read -r usuario _ _ _ _ homedir _; do
    # Comprobar que el directorio home está en /home (ajustar según sea necesario)
    if [[ "$homedir" == /home/* ]]; then
        # Comprobar si el directorio existe.
        if [ -d "$homedir" ]; then
            # Usar el comando du para calcular el espacio utilizado por el directorio del usuario.
            # Ajustar los parámetros de du según necesidades (ej. -h para human-readable)
            espacio=$(du -sh "$homedir" 2>/dev/null | cut -f1)
            echo "Usuario: $usuario, Espacio utilizado: $espacio" | tee -a "$resultado"
        else
            echo "Usuario: $usuario, Error: El directorio $homedir no existe" | tee -a "$resultado"
        fi
    fi
done </etc/passwd

echo "Resultado guardado en $resultado"

for env in $(conda env list | awk '{print $1}' | grep -v '^#'); do
    echo "Environment: $env"
    conda activate $env
    conda list
done

#!/bin/bash

# Loop over all *.csv files in the current directory
for file in *.csv; do
    echo "============================================="
    echo "Processing file: $file"
    echo "============================================="

    # Check if the file contains '(' or ')'
    if grep -qE "[()]" "$file"; then
        echo "The file '$file' contains either '(' or ')'."
    else
        echo "The file '$file' does not contain '(' or ')'."
    fi
done

#!/bin/bash

# Loop through all CSV files in the current directory
for file in *.csv; do
    # Check if the file contains '(' or ')'
    if grep -qE '(\(|\))' "$file"; then
        # If found, print the filename
        echo "File: $file"
        echo "Content with '(' or ')':"
        # Print lines containing '(' or ')'
        grep -E '(\(|\))' "$file"
        echo # Print a new line for better readability
    fi
done

#!/bin/bash

    # Check if the file contains '(' or ')' using grep
    if grep -q "[(|)]" "$file"; then
        # Print the file name if '(' or ')' exists
        echo "$file"
    fi
done

<?php

$url = "http://example.com"; // URL المراد طباعته
$printerIp = "192.168.1.123"; // IP الطابعة
$printerPort = 9100; // منفذ الطابعة، 9100 غالباً ما يكون منفذ أجهزة الطباعة

// استخدام cURL لجلب محتوى الصفحة
$ch = curl_init();
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
$content = curl_exec($ch);
curl_close($ch);

// إغلاق الاتصال بالطابعة بعد إرسال المحتوى
$socket = socket_create(AF_INET, SOCK_STREAM, SOL_TCP);
if ($socket === false) {
    echo "socket_create() failed: reason: " . socket_strerror(socket_last_error()) . "\n";
} else {
    $result = socket_connect($socket, $printerIp, $printerPort);
    if ($result === false) {
        echo "socket_connect() failed.\nReason: ($result) " . socket_strerror(socket_last_error($socket)) . "\n";
    } else {
        // إرسال المحتوى إلى الطابعة
        socket_write($socket, $content, strlen($content));
        socket_close($socket);
    }
}

    staff_id INT,
    order_date DATE,
    total DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

    customer_name NVARCHAR(50),
    phone NVARCHAR(15),
    address NVARCHAR(100),
    total_purchase DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE vendas (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    data_venda DATE NOT NULL,
    produto VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    quantidade INT NOT NULL,
    preco_unitario DECIMAL(8,2) NOT NULL,
    cliente_id INT REFERENCES clientes(id),
    vendedor_id INT REFERENCES vendedores(id)
);

CREATE TABLE compras (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    data_compra DATE NOT NULL,
    produto VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    quantidade INT NOT NULL,
    preco_unitario DECIMAL(8,2) NOT NULL,
    fornecedor_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (fornecedor_id) REFERENCES fornecedores(id)
);

CREATE TABLE `orders` (
  `id` INT(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,  /* 订单号 */
  `product` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,  /* 商品信息 */
  `price` DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,  /* 价格 */
  `quantity` INT(11) NOT NULL,  /* 数量 */
  `consignee` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,  /* 收货人 */
  `consignor` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,  /* 发货人 */
  `order_date` DATE NOT NULL,  /* 订单日期 */
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `orders` (
  `id` INT(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `consignee` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  `consignor` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  `order_date` DATE NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `order_items` (
  `id` INT(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `order_id` INT(11) NOT NULL,
  `product` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  `product_type` VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  `gross_weight` DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  `net_weight` DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  `volume` DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  CONSTRAINT `fk_order_id` FOREIGN KEY (`order_id`) REFERENCES `orders` (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

<!DOCTYPE clinique [
<!ELEMENT clinique (nom, adresse, telephone, email, medecins, patients, personnels, equipements)>
<!ELEMENT nom (#PCDATA)>
<!ELEMENT adresse (rue, ville, code-postal, pays)>
<!ELEMENT rue (#PCDATA)>
<!ELEMENT ville (#PCDATA)>
<!ELEMENT code-postal (#PCDATA)>
<!ELEMENT pays (#PCDATA)>
<!ELEMENT telephone (#PCDATA)>
<!ENTITY % telephone "(05|06|07)[0-9]{8}">
<!ELEMENT email (#PCDATA)>
<!ELEMENT patients (patient*)>
<!ELEMENT patient (nom,prenom,age,adresse,telephone,email)>
<!ATTLIST patient id ID #REQUIRED>
<!ELEMENT prenom (#PCDATA)>
<!ELEMENT age (#PCDATA)>
<!ELEMENT medecins (medecin*)>
<!ELEMENT medecin (nom, prenom, specialite, telephone_med, email, rendez-vous*)>
<!ATTLIST medecin id ID #REQUIRED>
<!ELEMENT specialite (#PCDATA)>
<!ELEMENT telephone_med (#PCDATA)>
<!ENTITY % telephone_med "(05|06|07)[0-9]{8}">
<!ELEMENT rendez-vous (rdv*)>
<!ELEMENT rdv (patient_ref, date, heure)>
<!ATTLIST rdv id ID #REQUIRED>
<!ELEMENT patient_ref EMPTY>
<!ATTLIST patient_ref idref IDREF #REQUIRED>
<!ELEMENT date (#PCDATA)>
<!ENTITY % date "([0-9]{4})-([0-9]{2})-([0-9]{2})">
<!ELEMENT heure (#PCDATA)>
<!ENTITY % heure "(8|9|1[0-6])h(-)(8|9|1[0-7])h">
<!ELEMENT personnels (personnel*)>
<!ELEMENT personnel (nom, prenom, fonction, telephone)>
<!ELEMENT fonction (#PCDATA)>
<!ELEMENT equipements (equipement*)>
<!ELEMENT equipement (nom, type, quantite)>
<!ATTLIST equipement consommable (oui|non) "non">
<!ELEMENT type (#PCDATA)>
<!ELEMENT quantite (#PCDATA)>
<!ELEMENT facture (rdvref,montant)>
<!ELEMENT rdvref EMPTY>
<!ATTLIST rdvref idref IDREF #REQUIRED>
<!ELEMENT montant (#PCDATA)>]>

<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
    android:orientation="horizontal"
    android:padding="8dp">

    <!-- Imageview for displaying the photo -->
    <ImageView
        android:id="@+id/photo_image_view"
        android:layout_width="64dp"
        android:layout_height="64dp"
        android:layout_gravity="center_vertical"
        android:scaleType="centerCrop"/>

    <!-- Textview for displaying the filename of the photo -->
    <TextView
        android:id="@+id/photo_filename_text_view"
        android:layout_width="0dp"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:layout_gravity="center_vertical"
        android:layout_weight="1"
        android:textColor="@android:color/black"
        android:textSize="18sp"
        android:layout_marginStart="16dp"/>

    <!-- Checkbox for selecting the photo item -->
    <CheckBox
        android:id="@+id/photo_checkbox"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:layout_gravity="center_vertical"/>

</LinearLayout>

<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent"
    android:padding="16dp">

    <ImageView
        android:id="@+id/imageView"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="0dp"
        android:contentDescription="@string/image_description"
        app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@+id/guideline"
        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent"
        tools:srcCompat="@tools:sample/avatars" />

    <TextView
        android:id="@+id/textView"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:text="@string/sample_text"
        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="@+id/imageView"
        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="@+id/imageView"
        app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="@+id/imageView"
        app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="@+id/imageView" />

    <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.Guideline
        android:id="@+id/guideline"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:orientation="horizontal"
        app:layout_constraintGuide_percent="0.7" />

    <TextView
        android:id="@+id/rateTextView"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:text="@string/rating_prompt"
        android:layout_marginTop="8dp"
        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/guideline" />

    <com.zhanghai.android.materialratingbar.MaterialRatingBar
        android:id="@+id/ratingBar"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:numStars="5"
        android:stepSize="1.0"
        app:mrbi_isIndicator="false"
        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="@+id/rateTextView"
        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/rateTextView"
        app:mrbi_drawableSize="48dp"
        app:mrbi_useCompatPadding="true" />

</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `API_LOG` (
    `id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment,
    `invoke_time` datetime NOT NULL,
    `api_name` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
    `request_param` text,
    `response_result` text,
    `exception_info` text,
    PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

    <EditText
        android:id="@+id/etInput"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"

        android:layout_marginLeft="8dp"
        android:layout_marginRight="16dp"
        android:layout_marginBottom="16dp"
        android:layout_width="0dp"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:layout_weight="1"
        android:text="Cancel" />

</LinearLayout>

#!/usr/bin/env bash

# Set your Cloudflare API credentials
CF_EMAIL="your_email@example.com"
CF_API_KEY="your_api_key"
CF_ZONE_ID="your_zone_id"
CF_RECORD_ID="your_record_id"
CF_RECORD_NAME="your_subdomain.example.com"
CF_RECORD_TYPE="A"

# Get your current public IP address
IP=$(curl -s https://api.ipify.org)

# Update Cloudflare DNS record if the IP address has changed
RECORD_IP=$(curl -s -X GET "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/${CF_ZONE_ID}/dns_records/${CF_RECORD_ID}" \
-H "X-Auth-Email: ${CF_EMAIL}" \
-H "X-Auth-Key: ${CF_API_KEY}" \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" | jq -r '.result.content')

if [ "$IP" != "$RECORD_IP" ]; then
  curl -s -X PUT "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/${CF_ZONE_ID}/dns_records/${CF_RECORD_ID}" \
  -H "X-Auth-Email: ${CF_EMAIL}" \
  -H "X-Auth-Key: ${CF_API_KEY}" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  --data '{"type":"'${CF_RECORD_TYPE}'","name":"'${CF_RECORD_NAME}'","content":"'${IP}'","ttl":1}'
fi

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout
    xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
    xmlns:gl="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
    app:layout_behavior="@string/appbar_scrolling_view_behavior"
    tools:context=".NewScreen.NewFirstScreen"
    tools:showIn="@layout/app_bar_main_new"
    style="@style/parent.contentLayout"
    android:background="#00000000">


        <androidx.core.widget.NestedScrollView
            android:layout_width="match_parent"
            android:layout_height="match_parent"
            app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
            app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
            app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
            app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent">

            <LinearLayout
                android:layout_width="match_parent"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:layout_gravity="center"
                android:orientation="vertical"
                android:padding="16dp">

                <LinearLayout
                    android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                    android:layout_gravity="center"
                    android:background="@drawable/border_file"
                    android:gravity="center"
                    android:padding="8dp">

                    <Button
                        android:id="@+id/ChatBtn"
                        android:layout_width="50dp"
                        android:layout_height="50dp"
                        android:layout_marginStart="5dp"
                        android:background="@drawable/snedicon"
                        android:textColor="@color/white" />

                    <Space
                        android:layout_width="60dp"
                        android:layout_height="wrap_content"/>

                    <Button
                        android:id="@+id/HistoryButton"
                        android:layout_width="50dp"
                        android:layout_height="50dp"
                        android:layout_marginEnd="5dp"
                        android:background="@drawable/historyicon"
                        android:textColor="@color/colorPrimaryDark" />

                </LinearLayout>


                <com.google.android.gms.ads.AdView
                    android:id="@+id/FirstAd"
                    android:layout_width="match_parent"
                    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                    android:layout_marginTop="20dp"
                    app:adSize="LARGE_BANNER"
                    app:adUnitId="ca-app-pub-4549371353711345/3368986480" />

                <LinearLayout
                    android:layout_width="match_parent"
                    android:layout_height="match_parent"
                    android:layout_marginTop="20dp"
                    android:gravity="center"
                    android:orientation="vertical">

                    <LinearLayout
                        android:layout_width="match_parent"
                        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                        android:background="@drawable/bg_season_tab"
                        android:orientation="horizontal"
                        android:padding="8dp">

                        <com.hbb20.CountryCodePicker
                            android:id="@+id/countryCode"
                            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                            android:ems="10"
                            android:padding="12dp"
                            android:textColor="#267C01"
                            android:textColorHint="#267C01"
                            android:textSize="13sp"
                            app:ccpDialog_showTitle="false"
                            app:ccp_defaultPhoneCode="20"
                            app:ccp_textSize="16sp" />

                        <EditText
                            android:id="@+id/et_title"
                            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                            android:layout_height="match_parent"
                            android:layout_marginStart="5dp"
                            android:autofillHints=""
                            android:ems="10"
                            android:background="@android:color/transparent"
                            android:drawablePadding="10dp"
                            android:hint="@string/mobile_number"
                            android:inputType="number"
                            android:padding="15dp"
                            android:singleLine="true"
                            android:textColor="#267C01"
                            android:textColorHint="#267C01"
                            android:textSize="15sp" />

                        <ImageView
                            android:id="@+id/paste_btn"
                            android:layout_gravity="center"
                            android:layout_width="30dp"
                            android:layout_height="30dp"
                            android:layout_marginStart="5dp"
                            android:background="@drawable/paste"
                            android:contentDescription="@string/phone" />

                    </LinearLayout>

                    <EditText
                        android:id="@+id/et_note"
                        android:layout_width="match_parent"
                        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                        android:layout_margin="5dp"
                        android:autofillHints=""
                        android:autoLink="web|email"
                        android:ems="10"
                        android:gravity="center"
                        android:hint="@string/EnterYourMessage"
                        android:imeOptions="flagNoExtractUi"
                        android:inputType="textCapSentences|textMultiLine"
                        android:linksClickable="true"
                        android:paddingStart="8dp"
                        android:paddingEnd="8dp"
                        android:textCursorDrawable="@null"
                        android:textSize="18sp"
                        android:textStyle="bold"
                        android:background="@drawable/bg_season_tab"
                        app:layout_constraintLeft_toLeftOf="parent"
                        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/title"
                        tools:ignore="TouchTargetSizeCheck" />

                    <LinearLayout
                        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                        android:layout_gravity="center"
                        android:layout_marginTop="20dp"
                        android:background="@drawable/border_file"
                        android:gravity="center"
                        android:padding="8dp">

                        <Button
                            android:id="@+id/ShareMgsBtn"
                            android:layout_width="50dp"
                            android:layout_height="50dp"
                            android:layout_marginStart="5dp"
                            android:background="@drawable/shareico"
                            android:textColor="@color/white" />

                        <Space
                            android:layout_width="60dp"
                            android:layout_height="wrap_content"/>

                        <Button
                            android:id="@+id/sendbtn"
                            android:layout_width="60dp"
                            android:layout_height="60dp"
                            android:layout_marginEnd="5dp"
                            android:background="@drawable/send"/>


                        <Space
                            android:layout_width="60dp"
                            android:layout_height="wrap_content"/>

                        <Button
                            android:id="@+id/sharefiles"
                            android:layout_width="50dp"
                            android:layout_height="50dp"
                            android:layout_marginEnd="5dp"
                            android:background="@drawable/sharelocation"/>

                    </LinearLayout>





                    <com.google.android.gms.ads.AdView
                        android:id="@+id/SecondAd"
                        android:layout_marginBottom="25dp"
                        android:layout_width="match_parent"
                        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                        android:layout_alignParentBottom="true"
                        android:layout_centerHorizontal="true"
                        android:layout_marginTop="20dp"
                        app:adSize="BANNER"
                        app:adUnitId="ca-app-pub-4549371353711345/3368986480" />


                </LinearLayout>


            </LinearLayout>
        </androidx.core.widget.NestedScrollView>


</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

<RelativeLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="match_parent"
        android:padding="16dp">

    <TextView
        android:id="@+id/dateTextView"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:text="Select a date and time:"
        android:textColor="@android:color/black"
        android:textSize="18sp"/>

    <TimePicker
        android:id="@+id/timePicker"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:layout_below="@id/dateTextView"
        android:layout_marginTop="16dp"
        android:layout_centerHorizontal="true"
        android:timePickerMode="spinner"/>

    <DatePicker
        android:id="@+id/datePicker"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:layout_below="@id/timePicker"
        android:layout_marginTop="16dp"/>

    <EditText
        android:id="@+id/messageEditText"

        android:layout_height="wrap_content"

<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent"
    tools:context=".MainActivity">

    <TextView
        android:id="@+id/tv_game_title"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:text="Guess the Number"
        android:textSize="24sp"
        app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@id/tv_game_instruction"
        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />

    <TextView
        android:id="@+id/tv_game_instruction"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:text="Enter a number between 1 and 100:"
        app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@id/et_guess"
        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/tv_game_title" />

    <EditText
        android:id="@+id/et_guess"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:ems="10"
        android:inputType="number"
        app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@id/btn_submit"
        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/tv_game_instruction" />

    <Button
        android:id="@+id/btn_submit"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:text="Submit"
        app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@id/tv_game_result"
        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/et_guess" />

    <TextView
        android:id="@+id/tv_game_result"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="0.478"
        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/btn_submit" />

</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

CREATE TABLE Employees (
  employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  last_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  birth_date DATE NOT NULL,
  position VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  department VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Maintenance (
  maintenance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  aircraft_id INT NOT NULL,
  maintenance_date DATE NOT NULL,
  aircraft_mileage INT NOT NULL,
  required_work VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (aircraft_id) REFERENCES Aircraft(aircraft_id)
    ON UPDATE CASCADE
    ON DELETE CASCADE
);

CREATE TABLE Flight_preparation (
  preparation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  aircraft_id INT NOT NULL,
  preparation_date DATE NOT NULL,
  completed_work VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  food_supply VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (aircraft_id) REFERENCES Aircraft(aircraft_id)
    ON UPDATE CASCADE
    ON DELETE CASCADE
);

-- 创建用户表
CREATE TABLE 用户 (
  用户ID NUMBER,
  用户名 VARCHAR2(50),
  状态变更记录 CLOB
);

-- 更新用户表，记录状态变更记录
UPDATE 用户
SET 用户名 = '新用户名',
    状态变更记录 = JSON_ARRAY_APPEND(状态变更记录, '$', JSON_OBJECT('时间', TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), '变更内容', '用户名由原用户名变更为新用户名'))
WHERE 用户ID = 1;

<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
    android:orientation="vertical"
    android:background="@drawable/rounded_background"
    android:padding="8dp"
    android:layout_marginTop="8dp"
    android:layout_marginBottom="8dp">

    <com.google.android.material.imageview.ShapeableImageView
        android:id="@+id/imageView"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="200dp"
        android:scaleType="centerCrop"
        android:adjustViewBounds="true"
        android:src="@drawable/sample_image"
        app:shapeAppearanceOverlay="@style/ImageViewShape" />

    <TextView
        android:id="@+id/titleTextView"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:textAppearance="?android:textAppearanceLarge"
        android:text="Title" />

    <TextView
        android:id="@+id/descriptionTextView"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:textAppearance="?android:textAppearanceMedium"
        android:text="Description" />

</LinearLayout>

<androidx.cardview.widget.CardView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent"
    android:layout_marginStart="4dp"
    android:layout_marginTop="8dp"
    android:layout_marginEnd="4dp"
    android:layout_marginBottom="8dp"
    android:backgroundTint="@color/transparent">

    <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView
        android:layout_width="150dp"
        android:layout_height="200dp"
        android:layout_marginStart="220dp"
        android:layout_marginTop="8dp"
        android:layout_marginEnd="4dp"
        android:layout_marginBottom="8dp"
        android:elevation="2dp">

        <ImageView
            android:id="@+id/right_image"
            android:layout_width="match_parent"
            android:layout_height="match_parent"
            android:adjustViewBounds="true"
            android:rotationX="0"
            android:scaleType="centerCrop" />
    </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>

    <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView
        android:layout_width="150dp"
        android:layout_height="200dp"
        android:layout_marginStart="20dp"
        android:layout_marginTop="8dp"
        android:layout_marginEnd="4dp"
        android:layout_marginBottom="8dp"
        android:elevation="2dp">

        <ImageView
            android:id="@+id/left_image"
            android:layout_width="match_parent"
            android:layout_height="match_parent"
            android:adjustViewBounds="true"
            android:scaleType="centerCrop" />
    </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>

    <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView
        android:layout_width="150dp"
        android:layout_height="200dp"
        android:layout_marginStart="120dp"
        android:layout_marginTop="4dp" <!-- Передвинули вверх на 4dp -->
        android:layout_marginEnd="4dp"
        android:layout_marginBottom="8dp"
        android:elevation="10dp">

        <ImageView
            android:id="@+id/middle_image"
            android:layout_width="match_parent"
            android:layout_height="match_parent"
            android:adjustViewBounds="true"
            android:scaleType="centerCrop"
            />
    </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>

</androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>

    android:layout_width="150dp"
    android:layout_height="200dp"

    android:layout_marginTop="8dp"

    android:rotationY="16">

    <ImageView
        android:id="@+id/image"

<androidx.constraintlayout.motion.widget.MotionLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
    android:id="@+id/motionLayout"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent"
    android:backgroundTint="@color/transparent">

    <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView
        android:id="@+id/rightCard"
        android:layout_width="150dp"
        android:layout_height="200dp"
        app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@+id/middleCard"
        app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
        app:cardElevation="2dp"
        app:rotationY="16">

        <ImageView
            android:id="@+id/right_image"
            android:layout_width="match_parent"
            android:layout_height="match_parent"
            android:adjustViewBounds="true"
            android:rotationX="0"
            android:scaleType="centerCrop" />
    </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>

    <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView
        android:id="@+id/leftCard"
        android:layout_width="150dp"
        android:layout_height="200dp"
        app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@+id/middleCard"
        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
        app:cardElevation="2dp"
        app:rotationY="-16">

        <ImageView
            android:id="@+id/left_image"
            android:layout_width="match_parent"
            android:layout_height="match_parent"
            android:adjustViewBounds="true"
            android:scaleType="centerCrop" />
    </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>

    <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView
        android:id="@+id/middleCard"
        android:layout_width="150dp"
        android:layout_height="200dp"
        app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@+id/rightCard"
        app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@+id/leftCard"
        app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
        app:cardElevation="10dp">

        <ImageView
            android:id="@+id/middle_image"
            android:layout_width="match_parent"
            android:layout_height="match_parent"
            android:adjustViewBounds="true"
            android:scaleType="centerCrop" />
    </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>

</androidx.constraintlayout.motion.widget.MotionLayout>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<androidx.cardview.widget.CardView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:cardview="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
    android:layout_margin="8dp"
    android:background="@drawable/cardview_background"
    cardview:cardCornerRadius="8dp"
    cardview:cardElevation="4dp">

    <RelativeLayout
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content">

        <ImageView
            android:id="@+id/imageView"
            android:layout_width="match_parent"
            android:layout_height="200dp"
            android:scaleType="centerCrop"
            android:src="@drawable/image" />

        <LinearLayout
            android:layout_width="match_parent"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:layout_below="@id/imageView"
            android:orientation="vertical"
            android:padding="8dp">

            <TextView
                android:id="@+id/titleTextView"
                android:layout_width="match_parent"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:text="Title"
                android:textAppearance="?android:textAppearanceLarge" />

            <TextView
                android:id="@+id/descriptionTextView"
                android:layout_width="match_parent"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:layout_marginTop="8dp"
                android:text="Description"
                android:textAppearance="?android:textAppearanceMedium" />

        </LinearLayout>

        <LinearLayout
            android:layout_width="match_parent"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:layout_below="@id/descriptionTextView"
            android:orientation="vertical"
            android:padding="8dp">

            <TextView
                android:id="@+id/genreTextView"
                android:layout_width="match_parent"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:text="Genre"
                android:textAppearance="?android:textAppearanceMedium" />

            <TextView
                android:id="@+id/otherTextView"
                android:layout_width="match_parent"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:layout_marginTop="8dp"
                android:text="Other information"
                android:textAppearance="?android:textAppearanceMedium" />

        </LinearLayout>

    </RelativeLayout>

</androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>

<ScrollView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent">

    <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:background="@color/bg"
        tools:context=".main_Fragments.BlankHomeFragment">

        <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView
            android:id="@+id/cardView"
            android:layout_width="match_parent"
            android:layout_height="300dp"
            app:cardCornerRadius="40dp"
            app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
            app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
            app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent">

            <ImageView
                android:id="@+id/blankImage"
                android:layout_width="match_parent"
                android:layout_height="match_parent"
                android:adjustViewBounds="true"
                android:scaleType="centerCrop" />
        </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>

        <TextView
            android:id="@+id/Title"
            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:layout_marginStart="16dp"
            android:layout_marginTop="28dp"
            android:text="Enkanto"
            android:textColor="@color/white"
            android:textSize="32dp"
            android:textStyle="bold"
            app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
            app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/cardView" />

        <LinearLayout
            android:id="@+id/squaresLayout"
            android:layout_width="394dp"
            android:layout_height="47dp"
            android:layout_marginTop="24dp"
            android:orientation="horizontal"
            app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
            app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="0.515"
            app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
            app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/Title" />

        <TextView
            android:id="@+id/Runtime"
            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:layout_marginStart="16dp"
            android:layout_marginTop="172dp"
            android:text="Runtime"
            android:textColor="@color/white"
            android:textSize="16dp"
            android:textStyle="bold"
            app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
            app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/cardView" />

        <TextView
            android:id="@+id/Runtime_Timer"
            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:layout_marginStart="4dp"
            android:layout_marginTop="172dp"
            android:text="1h 22m"
            android:textColor="@color/silver"
            android:textSize="16dp"
            android:textStyle="bold"
            app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@+id/Runtime"
            app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/cardView" />

        <TextView
            android:id="@+id/description"
            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:layout_marginStart="16dp"
            android:layout_marginTop="216dp"
            android:text="description"
            android:textColor="@color/silver_text"
            android:textSize="13dp"
            android:textStyle="bold"
            app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
            app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/cardView" />

        <VideoView
            android:layout_width="match_parent"
            android:layout_height="200dp"
            android:layout_marginTop="8dp"
            app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/description"
            tools:layout_editor_absoluteX="0dp" />

    </androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>
</ScrollView>

<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent"
    tools:context=".MainActivity">

    <Button
        android:id="@+id/hintButton"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:text="Подсказка"
        app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
        android:layout_marginBottom="16dp"/>

    <ImageView
        android:id="@+id/finddiff1"
        android:layout_width="0dp"
        android:layout_height="0dp"
        android:src="@drawable/finddiff1"
        android:scaleType="fitXY"
        app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@+id/guideline"
        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintWidth_default="percent" />

    <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.Guideline
        android:id="@+id/guideline"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:orientation="vertical"
        app:layout_constraintGuide_percent="0.5" />

    <ImageView
        android:id="@+id/finddiff2"
        android:layout_width="0dp"
        android:layout_height="0dp"
        android:src="@drawable/finddiff2"
        android:scaleType="fitXY"
        app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"

        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"

</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<androidx.coordinatorlayout.widget.CoordinatorLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent"
    android:background="@drawable/bg"
    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
    tools:context=".Fragments.InventoryFragment">

    <com.google.android.material.appbar.AppBarLayout
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:theme="@style/ThemeOverlay.AppCompat.Dark.ActionBar">

        <com.google.android.material.appbar.CollapsingToolbarLayout
            android:layout_width="match_parent"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            app:layout_scrollFlags="scroll|exitUntilCollapsed"
            app:contentScrim="?attr/colorPrimary">

            <androidx.appcompat.widget.Toolbar
                android:id="@+id/toolbar"
                android:layout_width="match_parent"
                android:layout_height="?attr/actionBarSize"
                app:layout_collapseMode="pin"
                app:popupTheme="@style/ThemeOverlay.AppCompat.Light">

                <!-- Добавьте здесь свои элементы, такие как title (заголовок), кнопки и TextView -->
                <TextView
                    android:id="@+id/toolbarTitle"
                    android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                    android:layout_gravity="center"
                    android:text="Инвентарь"
                    android:textAppearance="@style/TextAppearance.Widget.AppCompat.Toolbar.Title" />

            </androidx.appcompat.widget.Toolbar>

            <!-- Поместите кнопки и другие элементы ниже Toolbar для скрытия при прокрутке -->
            <LinearLayout
                android:layout_width="match_parent"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:orientation="horizontal"
                app:layout_collapseMode="pin">

                <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
                    android:id="@+id/selectAllButton"
                    android:layout_width="0dp"
                    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                    android:layout_weight="1"
                    android:layout_margin="8dp"
                    android:text="Выбрать всё"
                    style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton"/>

                <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
                    android:id="@+id/sellAllButton"
                    android:layout_width="0dp"
                    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                    android:layout_weight="1"
                    android:layout_margin="8dp"
                    android:text="Продать всё"
                    style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton"/>
            </LinearLayout>

        </com.google.android.material.appbar.CollapsingToolbarLayout>
    </com.google.android.material.appbar.AppBarLayout>

    <androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView
        android:id="@+id/inventorRecyclerView"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="match_parent"
        app:layout_behavior="@string/appbar_scrolling_view_behavior"/>

</androidx.coordinatorlayout.widget.CoordinatorLayout>

Введите целое число: 123456789
Байты числа: 15 cd 5b 07 
Введите номер байта (от 0 до 3): 2
Выбранный байт числа: 5b
Байты числа в двоичной и шестнадцатеричной форме:
Байт 0 в двоичной форме: 00001111
Байт 0 в шестнадцатеричной форме: 0f
Байт 1 в двоичной форме: 11001101
Байт 1 в шестнадцатеричной форме: cd
Байт 2 в двоичной форме: 01011011
Байт 2 в шестнадцатеричной форме: 5b
Байт 3 в двоичной форме: 00000111
Байт 3 в шестнадцатеричной форме: 07

CREATE TABLE Клиенты (
  ID_клиента AUTOINCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  Наименование VARCHAR(255),
  Н_счета VARCHAR(50),
  Адрес VARCHAR(255),
  Тип_фирмы VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Заказы (
  ID_заказа AUTOINCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  ID_клиента INTEGER,
  ID_товара INTEGER,
  Дата_заказа DATE,
  Размер_заказа INTEGER,
  Дата_выполнения_заказа DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (ID_клиента) REFERENCES Клиенты(ID_клиента),
  FOREIGN KEY (ID_товара) REFERENCES Товары(ID_товара)
);

CREATE TABLE Кредитные_Учреждения
(
    ID_Учреждения AUTOINCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    Название TEXT(255),
    Адрес TEXT(255),
    Контакты TEXT(255)
);

CREATE TABLE Проверяющие
(
    ID_Проверяющего AUTOINCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    ФИО TEXT(255),
    Должность TEXT(255),
    Телефон TEXT(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Проверки
(
    ID_Проверки AUTOINCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    ID_Учреждения LONG,
    Дата_План DATE,
    Дата_Факт DATE,
    ID_Проверяющего LONG,
    Нарушения TEXT(255),
    Дата_Устранения DATE,
    Штраф CURRENCY,
    FOREIGN KEY (ID_Учреждения) REFERENCES Кредитные_Учреждения(ID_Учреждения),
    FOREIGN KEY (ID_Проверяющего) REFERENCES Проверяющие(ID_Проверяющего)
);

=IF(AND($A$3="", $B$3="", $C$3="", $D$3="", $E$3=""), "Silahkan tulis detail jaringan",
    IFERROR(
        FILTER($F$3:$F$282,
            (IF($A$3<>"", PRODUCT(ISNUMBER(SEARCH(TRIM(SPLIT($A$3, " ")), UPPER($A$3:$A$282))))+($A$3=""), 1)) *
            (IF($B$3<>"", PRODUCT(ISNUMBER(SEARCH(TRIM(SPLIT($B$3, " ")), UPPER($B$3:$B$282))))+($B$3=""), 1)) *
            (IF($C$3<>"", PRODUCT(ISNUMBER(SEARCH(TRIM(SPLIT($C$3, " ")), UPPER($C$3:$C$282))))+($C$3=""), 1)) *
            (IF($D$3<>"", PRODUCT(ISNUMBER(SEARCH(TRIM(SPLIT($D$3, " ")), UPPER($D$3:$D$282))))+($D$3=""), 1)) *
            (IF($E$3<>"", PRODUCT(ISNUMBER(SEARCH(TRIM(SPLIT($E$3, " ")), UPPER($E$3:$E$282))))+($E$3=""), 1))
        ),
        "Master tidak ditemukan"
    )
)

=IF(
    AND($A$3="", $B$3="", $C$3="", $D$3="", $E$3=""),
    "Silahkan tulis detail jaringan",
    IFERROR(
        FILTER($F$3:$F$282,
            (IF($A$3="", TRUE, ISNUMBER(SEARCH(UPPER($A$3), UPPER($A$3:$A$282))))) *
            (IF($B$3="", TRUE, ISNUMBER(SEARCH(UPPER($B$3), UPPER($B$3:$B$282))))) *
            (IF($C$3="", TRUE, ISNUMBER(SEARCH(UPPER($C$3), UPPER($C$3:$C$282))))) *
            (IF($D$3="", TRUE, ISNUMBER(SEARCH(UPPER($D$3), UPPER($D$3:$D$282))))) *
            (IF($E$3="", TRUE, ISNUMBER(SEARCH(UPPER($E$3), UPPER($E$3:$E$282)))))
        ),
        "Master tidak ditemukan"
    )
)

(IF(AND($A$3="", $B$3="", $C$3="", $D$3="", $E$3=""), "Silahkan tulis detail jaringan",
    IFERROR(
        FILTER($F$3:$F$282,
            (ISNUMBER(SEARCH(UPPER($A$3), UPPER($A$3:$A$282)))) *
            (ISNUMBER(SEARCH(UPPER($B$3), UPPER($B$3:$B$282)))) *
            (ISNUMBER(SEARCH(UPPER($C$3), UPPER($C$3:$C$282)))) *
            (ISNUMBER(SEARCH(UPPER($D$3), UPPER($D$3:$D$282)))) *
            (ISNUMBER(SEARCH(UPPER($E$3), UPPER($E$3:$E$282))))
        ),
        "Master tidak ditemukan"
    )
)

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
    role ENUM('employee', 'manager') NOT NULL,
    team_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (team_id) REFERENCES teams(team_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ARTISTE (
    idArtiste INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
    idG INT,  -- Clé étrangère facultative pouvant être NULL si l'artiste n'est pas dans un groupe
    nom VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    prenom VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    nomDeScene VARCHAR(50),
    bio TEXT,
    PRIMARY KEY (idArtiste),
    FOREIGN KEY (idG) REFERENCES GROUPE (idG) ON DELETE SET NULL
);

$pdo->prepare("
    INSERT INTO questions (uuid, type, label, choices, correct) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
")->execute([
    $question['uuid'],
    $question['type'],
    $question['label'],
    isset($question['choices']) ? json_encode($question['choices']) : null,
    is_array($question['correct']) ? json_encode($question['correct']) : $question['correct'],
]);

$pdo->prepare("
    INSERT INTO questions (uuid, quiz_id, type, label, choices, correct) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
")->execute([
    $question['uuid'],
    $question['quiz_id'], // this is the missing piece
    $question['type'],
    $question['label'],
    isset($question['choices']) ? json_encode($question['choices']) : null,
    is_array($question['correct']) ? json_encode($question['correct']) : $question['correct'],
]);

CREATE TABLE photo_upload_events (
  upload_event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  photo_id INT,
  start_time TIMESTAMP,
  end_time TIMESTAMP,
  status VARCHAR(50),
  error_type VARCHAR(255),
  upload_method VARCHAR(50),
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (photo_id) REFERENCES photos(photo_id)
);

CREATE TABLE error_log_dim (
  error_log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  upload_event_id INT,
  error_date TIMESTAMP,
  error_type VARCHAR(255),
  error_message TEXT,
  resolution_status VARCHAR(50),
  FOREIGN KEY (upload_event_id) REFERENCES upload_event_fact(upload_event_fact_id)
);

CREATE TABLE item_count_history (
    history_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    item_id INT NOT NULL,
    count INT,
    record_time TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT timezone('utc', now()) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (item_id) REFERENCES items(id)
);

CREATE TABLE items_count_history (
    history_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    item_id INT NOT NULL,
    count INT,
    count_updated TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT timezone('utc', now()) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (item_id) REFERENCES items(id)
);

CREATE TABLE items (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    count INT,
    initial_count INT,
    category VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT timezone('utc', now()) NOT NULL
);

    -- Assuming a short interval for illustration; in real cases, prev_login_before_last_login would be calculated based on actual data.

    (1, '2023-03-03 10:00:00', '2023-03-03 09:00:00', 'login', 'iOS'),

    (1, '2023-03-03 16:00:00', '2023-03-03 14:00:00', 'login', 'android'),

    (1, '2023-03-03 20:00:00', '2023-03-03 16:00:00', 'login', 'iOS');

#!/bin/bash

pid=<pid>
output_file="/tmp/maps_snapshot_$pid"

# Сохраняем первоначальное содержимое файла
cat /proc/$pid/maps > $output_file

while true; do
    # Сравниваем снимок с новыми данными
    diff -q $output_file <(cat /proc/$pid/maps)
    
    # Обновляем снимок
    cat /proc/$pid/maps > $output_file

    sleep 1
done

CREATE TABLE chat_members (
    chat_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
    user_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
    role VARCHAR(255) CHECK (role IN ('Начальник', 'Сотрудник')), -- Или другие роли, если требуется
    PRIMARY KEY (chat_id, user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (chat_id) REFERENCES chats(chat_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);
